senses.definition: 可以俾人入住生活同有人照顧嘅社區服務機構（量詞：間） (residential care home)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: on1 lou5 jyun2 se5
examples.translation: residential care home for the elderly

senses.definition: 同#猶太人 有關 (Jewish)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: jau4 taai3 jan4
examples.translation: the Jews

senses.definition: 唱歌或者演奏樂器嘅時候#預 開始嗰個拍子 (to land on a beat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jap6 co3 paak3
examples.translation: to land on the wrong beat

senses.definition: 一種#畫；將顏料同油溝埋一齊，嚟到上色（量詞：幅／張） (oil painting)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種文具；好實淨，可以夾實好多張紙（量詞：隻） (binder clip)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 志向；意圖 (intention; purpose; preference)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ji3 hoeng3 syu1
examples.translation: letter of intent

senses.definition: 形容一啲性感妖豔嘅女性，可能帶有貶義 (seductress)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你打扮成咁，會俾人覺得你係淫娃。
examples.jyutping: nei5 daa2 baan6 sing4 gam2, wui5 bei2 jan4 gok3 dak1 nei5 hai6 jam4 waa1.
examples.translation: You might be mistaken as a seductress if you dress like that.

senses.definition: 兩樣嘢嘅相逢 (to encounter; to meet)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 hai2 saan1 deng2 jyu6 soeng5 daai6 fung1.
examples.translation: We encounter strong blow on the hilltop.

senses.definition: 形容女性內心放蕩 ((of females) slutty)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 咁凍仲着短裙肯定淫底。
examples.jyutping: gam3 dung3 zung6 zoek3 dyun2 kwan4 hang2 ding6 jam4 dai2.
examples.translation: Wearing short skirts in such cold weather, she must be rather promiscuous.

senses.definition: #燃燒 所需要嘅三項要素，即係#燃料、#氧氣 同#熱力 (combustion triangle i.e. fire triangle)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 裸露、不雅嘅相（量詞：張） (sex photo; lewd photo; photos that depict nudity, people in sexually suggestive positions, or people engaging in sexual acts)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 警察喺佢部電腦入面揾到大量嘅淫照。
examples.translation: The police found a large number of lewd photos in his computer.

senses.definition: 其中一方面嘅使費多咗，其他方面亦隨之增加 (the spending on one part rises, and so on other parts)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我報咗個興趣班，使費一闊三大，要買新工具。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 bou3 zo2 go3 hing3 ceoi3 baan1, sai2 fai3 jat1 fut3 saam1 daai6, jiu3 maai5 san1 gung1 geoi6.
examples.translation: I applied for an interest class, and I had to spend on new equipment too.

senses.definition: 植物生長得好茂盛 (thriving; flourishing)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: faa1 jyun2 ge3 syu6 muk6 jan1 jan1 hoeng3 wing4.
examples.translation: The plants in the garden are flourishing.

senses.definition: 發展好蓬勃，一片繁榮 (flourish; prosperous)

examples.text: 民主改革後，社會一片欣欣向榮。
examples.jyutping: man4 zyu2 goi2 gaak3 hau6, se5 wui2 jat1 pin3 jan1 jan1 hoeng3 wing4.
examples.translation: The democratic reform leads to a flourishing society.

senses.definition: 短期去國外一邊學嘢一邊去玩嘅#鴨仔團（量詞：個） (study tour)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我個女今個暑假報咗個去澳洲嘅遊學團，等佢見下世面吖嘛。
examples.translation: My daughter joined a study tour to Australia this summer so as to let her explore the world.

senses.definition: （天文學）一個 #星座，天文符號係♐，每年七月七號子夜經過上中天，入面最光嗰粒星叫箕宿三 ((astronomy) Sagittarius)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: （占星學）黃道十二星座嘅第九個，十一月尾到十二月中出世嘅人就屬於人馬座；亦可以用嚟形容有人馬座性格特質嘅人 ((astrology) Sagittarius)
曲式同編曲好似倒模咁、分節簡單又重複、樂句易記、一般人#唱K 嗰時唔覺得難唱嘅歌（量詞：首／隻） (very singable songs in the framework of pop songs, which do not require high techniques to sing)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 以2嘅倍數去計算位值嘅記錄數目嘅方法，可以用0同1兩個數字去表示數值；呢個概念喺#電腦 運作中廣泛應用 (binary number system)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 電腦用二進制處理資料。
examples.jyutping: din6 nou5 jung6 ji6 zeon3 zai3 cyu5 lei5 zi1 liu2.
examples.translation: Computers use binary to process data.

senses.definition: 同一時間進行多過一個動作 (at the same time; simultaneously; literally: one side)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 bin1 sik6 faan6 jat1 bin1 gong2 je5.
examples.translation: When he was eating, he was talking.

senses.definition: 任何喺#野外 唔係人類嘅動物，特別係好大隻，四隻腳行嘅動物（量詞：隻） (wild beast)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢哋拎住枝火把趕走啲野獸。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei2 ling1 zyu6 zi1 fo2 baa2 gon2 zau2 di1 je5 sau3.
examples.translation: They held up a blazing torch to drive those beasts away.

senses.definition: 唔太出色嘅男人 ((metaphorically) man who is not outstanding)

examples.text: 佢哋係美女與野獸嘅組合。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei2 hai6 mei5 neoi5 jyu5 je5 sau3 ge3 zou2 hap6.
examples.translation: They are like Beauty and the Beast.

senses.definition: 培養形成；開始做一樣嘢，令嗰樣嘢變得更加穩定、成熟 (to form; to cultivate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: joeng5 sing4 gin6 hong1 zaap6 gwaan3
examples.translation: to cultivate healthy habits

senses.definition: 加喺動詞第一音節嘅重疊之中，表示動作短暫，其中「一」字可以弱化成好短嘅音節或者拉高前字嘅浮動調 (do a bit of something, an infix between the duplication of the first syllable of a verb, meaning the action occurs for a short amount of time, the syllable 一 jat1 may be reduced to a shorter sound or a floating tone that raises the pitch of the previous syllable)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: ho6 jat1 ho6 keoi5
examples.translation: to celebrate (do a bit of celebration)

senses.definition: 一種小稱中綴，用喺單音節、可以分級嘅形容詞嘅重疊，表示「非常」 (a diminutive infix between the duplication of a monosyllabic gradable adjective, meaning "really")

examples.jyutping: faa3 dou3 go3 zong1 leng3 jat1 leng3
examples.translation: really pretty makeup

senses.definition: 唔係人養，嚟野外捉嚟食嘅#動物（量詞：隻） (wild game)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你唔可以帶野味返香港㗎！
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 ho2 ji5 daai3 je5 mei2 faan1 hoeng1 gong2 gaa3!
examples.translation: You are not allowed to bring wild game back to Hong Kong.

senses.definition: 一種專門行野外凹凸地形而特別設計嘅車，主要特點有四輪驅動、較高底盤、抓地性較好嘅#軚、較高嘅排氣管、較大馬力同扭力、結實車身 (off-road vehicle)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一個可以充氣嘅魚內臟，用嚟調節浮沉；可以做食材，曬乾咗嗰啲就係#魚肚 (swim bladder, fish maw; literally: fish bubble)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #寧願；好想 (rather; let (used when expressing a wish, a curse, etc.))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: He wants you to get away now.

senses.definition: 踏入社會 (to integrate into society; to be wordly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jap6 sai3 mei6 sam1
examples.translation: not integrated into society

senses.definition: 生物；五大脊椎物種之一，冷血動物；喺水度生活，有#鰓，靠#鰭 嚟活動，用#魚鰾 嚟控制浮沉（量詞：條／群） (fish)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gam1 jyu2
examples.translation: goldfish

senses.definition: 形容人對某件事唔清唔楚，有好多問題，覺得迷惑 (uncertain; puzzled)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 大家都好疑惑點解佢會無端端辭職。
examples.jyutping: daai6 gaa1 dou1 hou2 ji4 waak6 dim2 gaai2 keoi5 wui2 mou4 dyun1 dyun1 ci4 zik1.
examples.translation: We are puzzled about his sudden resignation.

senses.definition: #虐待#兒童，危害到兒童嘅身心健康發展 (to abuse children; to maltreat children)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: joek6 ji4 go3 on3
examples.translation: child abuse cases

senses.definition: 組成一切物質最基本嘅嘢，並以一般#化學 反應唔能夠進一步分解為止，將#原子 以相同#質子 數目分類成過百種元素 ((chemistry) element)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jyun4 sou3 zau1 kei4 biu2
examples.translation: periodic table

senses.definition: 物件、概念、事情嘅基本成份（量詞：個） (basic component or constituent)

examples.text: 本節目將會介紹五部具有北韓元素嘅電影。
examples.jyutping: bun2 zit3 muk6 zoeng1 wui5 gaai3 siu6 ng5 bou6 geoi6 jau5 bak1 hon4 jyun4 sou3 ge3 din6 jing2.
examples.translation: This programme will introduce 5 movies with North Korean elements.

senses.definition: （數學）一個#集 入面嘅嘢 ((mathematics) element in a set)

examples.text: 一個冇元素嘅集叫做空集。
examples.jyutping: jat1 go3 mou5 jyun4 sou3 ge3 zaap6 giu3 zou6 hung1 zaap6.
examples.translation: A set with no elements is called an empty set.

senses.definition: 通常形容#食物，被認為係#天然 製造，冇人工#化學 物質成分，種植過程用咗較少農藥 (organic (foodstuff, etc))
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: di1 jau5 gei1 coi3 hou2 gwai3 wo3
examples.translation: The organic vegetables are really expensive.

senses.definition: 研究同#碳#化合物 相關嘅學科 (organic (chemistry))

examples.text: 佢博士論文係關於有機金屬化學。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bok3 si6 leon6 man4 hai5 gwaan1 jyu1 jau5 gei1 gam1 suk6 faa3 hok6
examples.translation: His doctoral dissertation is on organometallic chemistry.

senses.definition: 有機會；有可能 (possible; likely)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你都好有機入呢間大學喎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 dou1 hou2 jau5 gei1 jap6 ni1 gaan1 daai6 hok6 wo3.
examples.translation: It's very likely that you will be admitted into this university.

senses.definition: #屎；#糞便；響未有#抽水馬桶 嘅年代，政府會派人凌晨時份清倒#屎塔（馬桶），意指「響半夜聞到嘅異香（臭味）」 (excrement, "night soil", "shit", the smell from the chamber pot pouring in mid-night; literally: night fragrance)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 灣仔藍屋有70幾年歷史，由於裏面冇裝抽水馬桶，係少數仲要倒夜香嘅古老住宅。
examples.jyutping: waan1 zai2 laam4 uk1 jau5 cat1 sap6 gei2 nin4 lik6 si2, jau4 jyu1 leoi5 min6 mou5 zong1 cau1 seoi2 maa5 tung2, hai6 siu2 sou3 zung6 jiu3 dou2 je6 hoeng1 ge3 gu2 lou5 zyu6 zaak2.
examples.translation: The blue house in Wanchai has over seventy years of history. As it lacks flush toilets, it is one of the few old buildings where people must empty chamber pots at night.

senses.definition: 人同埋出身嘅地方都咁優秀 (a place of prosperity and talents; illustrious person and glorious place)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 貴校人傑地靈，人文氣息濃厚。
examples.jyutping: gwai3 haau6 jan4 git6 dei6 ling4, jan4 man4 hei3 sik1 nung4 hau5.
examples.translation: Your esteemed university is renowned for its talented individuals and embodies a strong humanistic spirit.

senses.definition: 雖然想見到對方，但係始終都係無常見嘅緣份 (that fate has never brought people to meeting each other)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 之前一直想親自答謝佢，但係大家都公事繁忙，永遠都係緣慳一面。
examples.jyutping: zi1 cin4 jat1 zik6 soeng2 can1 zi6 daap3 ze6 keoi5, daan6 hai6 daai6 gaa1 dou1 gung1 si6 faan4 mong4, wing5 jyun5 dou1 hai6 jyun4 haan1 jat1 min6.
examples.translation: I have wished to express my gratitude in person, but we are too busy and our paths never seem to cross.

senses.definition: 有好多能力高嘅人 (have many capable people; a wealth of talents)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我哋公司人才濟濟，個個都好做得嘢。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 gung1 si1 jan4 coi4 zai2 zai2, go3 go3 dou1 hou2 zou6 dak1 je5.
examples.translation: Our company is replete with talented people who perform excellently.

senses.definition: 一種未得到宣泄嘅不滿同憎恨 (resentment; grudge; enmity)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢帶住怨恨離開咗呢個世界。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 daai3 zyu6 jyun3 han6 lei4 hoi1 zo2 ni1 go3 sai3 gaai3.
examples.translation: He died harboring resentment.

senses.definition: 所嚮往嘅#前景，可以實現嘅夢，通常係企業、公司層面嘅#目標 先會用願景嚟表達 (vision)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋嘅願景好清晰，就係喺一年之內打入國際市場。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ge3 jyun6 ging2 hou2 cing1 sik1, zau6 hai6 hai2 jat1 nin4 zi1 noi6 daa2 jap6 gwok3 zai3 si5 coeng4.
examples.translation: We have a clear vision to enter the international market within a year.

senses.definition: 跑步或者行路嗰陣腳步唔穩，又行又跌咁嘅狼狽樣 (to stagger; to shamble; to trip repeatedly while moving; literally: to fall down and roll on the floor)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個賊畀隻狗追到一仆一碌。
examples.jyutping: go3 caak2 bei2 zek3 gau2 zeoi1 dou3 jat1 puk1 jat1 luk1.
examples.translation: The thief kept tripping up as he was being chased by a dog.

senses.definition: 窮到乜都冇得剩 (in extreme poverty)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 快啲到月尾出糧啦，我而家真係一貧如洗。
examples.jyutping: faai3 di1 dou3 jyut6 mei5 ceot1 loeng4 laa1, ngo5 ji4 gaa1 zan1 hai6 jat1 pan4 jyu4 sai2.
examples.translation: I'm so longing for payday. I'm so broke already.

senses.definition: 競賽嗰陣唔出全力，以#遷就 能力較差嘅對手 (to compete in half effort as a give way to the opponent. Literally: to give way by using half the arm only)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 對住班細路，我讓半臂都打贏佢哋啦。
examples.jyutping: deoi3 zyu6 baan1 sai3 lou6, ngo5 joeng6 bun3 bei3 dou1 daa2 jeng4 keoi5 dei6 laa1.
examples.translation: To compete with those kids, I can win even with one hand tied.

senses.definition: 本指#士兵 同#馬，借指#軍隊（量詞：隊／路） (forces; troops)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 全部人馬都已經安全過河。
examples.jyutping: cyun4 bou6 jan4 maa5 dou1 ji5 ging1 on1 cyun4 gwo3 ho4.
examples.translation: All the troops have safely crossed the river.

senses.definition: 引申指一班做同一件事嘅人 (a team worked on something)

examples.jyutping: jyun4 baan1 jan4 maa5
examples.translation: same team of people

senses.definition: 希臘神話裏面一種半人半馬嘅生物，上半身係人嘅身體，包括手同頭，下半身係馬身，包括四隻腳（量詞：隻） (centaur; hippocentaur)

examples.text: 人馬係一種只存在喺幻想中嘅生物。
examples.jyutping: jan4 maa5 hai6 jat1 zung2 zi2 cyun4 zoi6 hai2 waan6 soeng2 zung1 ge3 sang1 mat6.
examples.translation: Centaurs are only a kind of imaginative creature.

senses.definition: 睇完之後唔回覆，特別係經即時通訊軟件傳達嘅信息，帶有冷待、無視嘅意思 (to read a message and not reply, especially with intentional disregard; to leave on read)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個女仔成日對我已讀不回，仲揾唔揾佢好？
examples.jyutping: go3 neoi5 zai2 seng4 jat6 deoi3 ngo5 ji5 duk6 bat1 wui4, zung6 wan2 m4 wan2 keoi5 hou2?
examples.translation: That girl always leaves me on read. Should I continue seeing her?

senses.definition: 用同一標準審視唔同嘅對象 ((usu. used in a negative sense) to treat different matters as the same)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你唔可以一概而論話坐過監嘅就係衰人嘅。
examples.translation: You shouldn't make a blanket assumption that all ex-prisoners are bad.

senses.definition: 對事物有病態嘅依賴（量詞：鋪／條） (addiction; habitual craving)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: duk6 jan5
examples.translation: drug addiction

senses.definition: 對一件事極端沉迷（量詞：鋪） (strong obsession)

examples.jyutping: daa2 gei1 daa2 soeng5 jan5
examples.translation: to be obsessed with playing video games

senses.definition: 對一件事嘅興趣，通常會組成詞組「#冇癮」同「#過癮」 (mood on doing something)

examples.text: 拍拍吓拖，佢拎部收音機出嚟聽馬，咩癮都冇晒啦！
examples.jyutping: paak3 paak3 haa2 to1, keoi5 ling1 bou6 sau1 jam1 gei1 ceot1 lai4 teng1 maa5, me1 jan5 dou1 mou5 saai3 laa1!
examples.translation: We were on a romantic date and then he took his radio out for the horse-betting broadcast. What a killjoy!

senses.definition: 口頭表達中，音量、語調嘅高低轉折以及中間嘅停頓 (variation in volume, articulation, intonation and pauses in verbal expression i.e. for speech, poems, etc.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 朗誦比賽參賽者嘅抑揚頓挫好誇張。
examples.jyutping: long5 zung6 bei2 coi3 caam1 coi3 ze2 ge3 jik1 joeng4 deon6 co3 hou2 kwaa1 zoeng1
examples.translation: The participants exaggerated their articulation in the recitation competition.

senses.definition: 聲音畀#咪高峰 接收咗 (for sounds to be effectively captured by the microphone)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 咪以為你兩個咬耳仔無人聽到啦，入晒咪喇。
examples.jyutping: mai5 ji5 wai4 nei5 loeng5 go3 ngaau5 ji5 zai2 mou5 jan4 teng1 dou2 laa1, jap6 saai3 mai1 laa3.
examples.translation: Have no illusion that you can whisper to each other without being heard. The microphone is recording.

senses.definition: 保險，尤其指汽車嘅保險（量詞：份） (insurance policy, especially insurance of cars; transliteration of the English word 'insurance')
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 睇在係舊同學份上，同我買份燕梳吖。
examples.jyutping: tai2 zoi6 hai6 gau6 tung4 hok6 fan6 soeng6, tung4 ngo5 maai5 fan6 jin3 so1 aa1.
examples.translation: For old times' sake, would you buy insurance from me?

senses.definition: 表達厭惡，會拖長尾音 (to express one's disgust towards something, same as "ew"; the nuclei of the word (-i) would be extended)
senses.label: 感嘆詞

examples.text: 噫，咁核突㗎你，當街撩鼻屎……
examples.jyutping: ji2, gam3 wat6 dat6 gaa3 nei5, dong1 gaai1 liu1 bei6 si2
examples.translation: Ew! That's disgusting, picking your nose in public.

senses.definition: #詐嬌 嗰陣會用到嘅，同#㖿 一樣 (the interjection which one uses when trying to be cute, especially by talking like a baby girl)

examples.text: 噫，好衰㗎，你唔好係咁撩我啦！
examples.jyutping: ji2, hou2 seoi1 gaa3, nei5 m4 hou2 hai6 gam2 liu4 ngo5 laa1!
examples.translation: Ah, naughty you, stop flirting with me like that!

senses.definition: 其他人；佢 (other people; him; her; they)

senses.definition: 意思係無論好事定壞事，今日有人唔做，第日都會有人接替頂上；用嚟形容唔同人對同一件事有唔同取態，或某啲事情永遠都有人#趨之若鶩 (proverb; for anything no matter good or bad, some people get tired of doing it, whereas others are willing to do anything for a chance at it; literally: some people quit their posts and return home, while others rush non-stop to take the imperial examination in the dead of night)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: #無所事事；冇嘢做；漫無目的噉周圍 #hea (to idle about; to loaf around)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 中學畢業之後，佢唔去揾工，成日遊手好閒。
examples.jyutping: zung1 hok6 bat1 jip6 zi1 hau6, keoi5 m4 heoi3 wan2 gung1, seng4 jat6 jau4 sau2 hou3 haan4.

senses.definition: 深夜時候，人聲寂靜、冇噪音 (describes the eerie quietness at night; literally: deep in the night lies only silence)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 夜闌人靜嘅時候，我好鍾意一個人坐喺廳度睇書。
examples.jyutping: je6 laan4 jan4 zing6 ge3 si4 hau6, ngo5 hou2 zung1 ji3 jat1 go3 jan1 co5 hai2 teng1 dou6 tai2 syu1.
examples.translation: During the quiet night, I like sitting in the living room by myself and read a book.

senses.definition: 唔再計較以前嘅壞事同恩怨 (to cancel the past bad record; literally: to write off in one stroke)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋要合作先可以生存，以前嘅事就一筆勾銷啦。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 jiu3 hap6 zok3 sin1 ho2 ji5 sang1 cyun4, ji5 cin4 ge3 si6 zau6 jat1 bat1 ngau1 siu1 laa1.

senses.definition: 缺乏認受性、冇咩機構承認嘅學校（量詞：間） (unlicensed school; school with no status; diploma mill)

senses.definition: 指某件事單靠一個人嘅能力完成 ((of people) individually; single-handedly)

senses.definition: 加喺動詞之前，指負面結果係由某啲人直接引起嘅 (directly; used when the result is directly caused by a specific person or group of people)

senses.definition: 直接由源頭（例如賣家）或者親身觀察、經驗所得返嚟嘅嘢，冇經過其他人嘅使用（而唔係#二手） (first-hand)

senses.definition: 物質四種基本狀態之一；可以自由流動，有固定嘅體積，但冇固定嘅形狀，會因應容器形狀改變 (liquid)

senses.definition: 喺一件事發生之前，祈求果件事可以圓滿完成 (to congratulate beforehand; to wish)

examples.jyutping: gaau3 sai3 lou6 zai2 jau5 si4 jiu3 jyun5 ngaang6 gim1 si1, keoi5 dei6 sin1 wui5 fuk6 nei5 gaa3.
examples.translation: Teaching children requires a balance of discipline and kindness; they will respond to you better that way.

senses.definition: 立場經常轉換，難以捉摸 (wavering)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個總統喺#賓州 嘅民意搖擺不定。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 zung2 tung2 hai2 ban1 zau1 ge3 man4 ji3 jiu4 baai2 bat1 ding6
examples.translation: Public opinion in Philadelphia towards this president has been wavering.

senses.definition: #鉛筆 中間嘅筆芯；唔同筆芯用H（硬度），B（黑）標示，粘土成分（H）越多，筆芯越硬，顏色越淺；#石墨 成分（B）越多，筆芯越軟，顏色越黑；最多人用嘅係用HB鉛芯嘅鉛筆，石墨同粘土各一半。（量詞：支） (pencil lead)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #鉛芯筆 用嘅筆芯；用石墨同粘土按一定比例整成；硬度同顏色（黑色深淡）分類同鉛筆鉛芯一樣；但比鉛筆鉛芯幼，直徑由0.2到1.4釐米不等，最多人用嘅係0.5釐米；易斷；引申為任何可以用係鉛芯筆裏面嘅筆芯，包括幼顏色筆筆芯。（量詞：支） (lead refill; eversharp pencil lead)

examples.text: 我支鉛芯筆嘅鉛芯斷咗。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zi1 jyun4 sam1 bat1 ge3 jyun4 sam1 tyun5 zo2.
examples.translation: The lead in my eversharp pencil broke.

senses.definition: #虐待#動物 (to abuse animal)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 港女放貓入洗衣機被指虐畜。
examples.jyutping: gong2 neoi2 fong3 maau1 jap6 sai2 ji1 gei1 pei5 zi2 joek6 cuk1.
examples.translation: A Hong Kong woman was accused of animal cruelty after putting her cat in a washing machine.

senses.definition: 經過研究而發明、生產一樣新產品 (to research and develop; to invest)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢間藥廠最近研發咗新嘅流感藥。
examples.translation: This pharmaceutical company has recently developed a new drug for the flu.

senses.definition: 形容地方寧靜而且雅致 ((of places) quiet and in a tasteful manner)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個花園真係幽雅，好適合一個人喺度睇書。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 faa1 jyun2 zan1 hai6 jau1 ngaa5, hou2 sik1 hap6 jat1 go3 jan4 hai2 dou6 tai2 syu1.
examples.translation: This garden is peaceful and beautiful, perfect for reading alone.

senses.definition: 可以見到鬼魂嘅特殊能力 (the special ability to see ghosts; literally, Yin-yang eye)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 聽聞喺眼上面搽牛眼淚就會有陰陽眼。
examples.jyutping: ting3 man4 hai2 ngaan5 soeng6 min6 caa4 ngau4 ngaan5 leoi6 zau6 wui5 jau5 jam1 joeng4 ngaan5.
examples.translation: It's rumored that applying ox tears to one's eyes can give them the ability to see ghosts.

senses.definition: 人面上面分泌出嚟嘅油分，因為望落去會有輕微反光所以叫油光 (facial surface oil)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你成面油光，快啲去洗吓面。
examples.jyutping: nei5 seng4 min6 jau4 gwong1, faai3 di1 heoi3 sai2 haa5 min6.
examples.translation: Your face is very oily, please go wash it.

phonetic.original: jat1 gau2 gau2 gau2:jat1 gau1 gau6 gau6

senses.definition: 即係「一鳩嚿嚿」，指人言語表達累贅唔清晰 (very clumsy  and ambiguous on speaking)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: He speaks unclearly and ambiguously, making it difficult to understand.

keywords: jat1 gau2 gau2 gau2:jat1 gau1 gau6 gau6

senses.definition: 俾學生喺 #夜晚 上堂嘅學校，通常返學嘅都係啲做緊嘢嘅人（量詞：間） (night or evening school)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 讀夜校好辛苦㗎，日頭又要返工，點温書呀？
examples.jyutping: duk6 je6 haau6 hou2 san1 fu2 gaa3, jat6 tau2 jau6 jiu3 faan1 gung1, dim2 wan1 syu1 aa3?
examples.translation: Studying at night school while working during the day is very challenging, how can you manage to study after work?

senses.definition: 慶祝或者喜慶時候嘅説話，之後大家會一齊舉杯或#碰杯，然後飲晒杯裏面嘅飲料（#勝 有「盡」嘅意思，又可避諱「乾」字） (a phase used when toasting, like saying "cheers !" to each others before drinking wine; literally: drink up all)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 嚟！慶祝我地畢業！呢杯飲勝嘅！
examples.jyutping: lei4! hing3 zuk1 ngo5 dei6 bat1 jip6! ni1 bui1 jam2 sing3 ge3!
examples.translation: Come! Let's cheers to celebrate our graduation!

senses.definition: 指某樣嘢唔提起佢又或者冇事都仲得、尚且可以接受，或者依然能夠容忍、隻眼開隻眼閉，但係相反情況就絕對唔得 (to describe that a condition is still acceptable or tolerable, but definitely not its opposite)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 唔講猶自可，一講#把幾火。
examples.jyutping: m4 gong2 jau4 zi6 ho2, jat1 gong2 baa2 gei2 fo2.
examples.translation: I could still suppress my emotions if we don't talk about it, but once somebody mentions it, I become enraged.

senses.definition: 指水道被淤泥阻塞 (to silt up; to block up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 夏天為大地帶嚟雨水，渠道淤塞嘅話就好容易會水浸。
examples.translation: With summer comes the rain, and if the sewers become clogged, there may be flooding on the streets.

senses.definition: 形容人好混亂；不知所措 (at loose ends; confused)

examples.translation: I've been extremely busy with my work recently.

senses.definition: 指冇咗一筆大錢 (a figurative way of saying "have lost a great deal of money"; literally, neck covered in blood)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 以月份作單位嘅入場票或者車飛（量詞：張） (monthly ticket)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你月頭就唔見咗張地鐵月飛，真係唔抵。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jyut6 tau4 zau6 m4 gin3 zo2 zoeng1 dei6 tit3 jyut6 fei1, zan1 hai6 m4 dai2.
examples.translation: It's such a shame that you lost your monthly subway ticket at the beginning of the month.

senses.definition: 養育他人所生子女之母親，與 #生娘 相對 (foster mother)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: a foster mother is more intimate to the child than the biological mother

senses.definition: 夜晚經營嘅成人娛樂場所，喺入面可以飲酒、跳舞、聽歌、唱K、睇表演等等（量詞：間） (nightclub; cabaret)

examples.jyutping: git3 zo2 fan1 zau6 m4 zeon2 zoi3 heoi3 je6 zung2 wui2 laa3.

senses.definition: 講嘅嘢成道理而且令人信服 (to deliver a claim in a rational and convincing manner)

examples.text: 佢講嘢言之成理，抵佢做大狀。

senses.definition: 開始畀某樣嘢吸引住 (to get hooked; to be strongly attracted; to be into something)

examples.text: 佢上個月先入攝影坑，已經買咗幾支鏡頭。

senses.definition: #電郵（#電子郵件）（量詞：封） (email; electronic mail)

senses.definition: 泛指所有可以接駁電子發聲器材，將聲音集中引導入耳仔嘅聽筒；有啲耳機會有埋咪，可以收音（量詞：副） (earphone; headset; headphone)

senses.definition: #冇面 (Literally "face full of fart", figuratively "humiliated".)

examples.text: 阿松佢當住班女仔面前撩個大隻佬打交，諗住威。結果個大隻佬兇一兇佢，阿松就嚇到瀨咗尿。阿松呢嘢真係一面屁！

senses.definition: 做咗壞事之後，好快就得到嘅#報應 ((for people who have done wrong) immediate and just punishment/retribution)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢打完人之後就畀車撞到，呢啲咪現眼報囉。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 daa2 jyun4 jan4 zi1 hau6 zau6 bei2 ce1 zong6 dou2, ni1 di1 mai6 jin6 ngaan5 bou3 lo1.

senses.definition: 響一個地方住；亦可解將一個地方當成屋企 (to shelter; to be housed)

examples.text: 呢度唔單止係我做嘢地方，仲係呢個咁波譎雲詭嘅世界入邊唯一可以容身嘅地方。
examples.translation: This is not only my workplace but also my sole refuge in this unpredictable world.

senses.definition: 短時間之內 (half a month or so)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 使做幾耐吖，最多咪一頭半個月！
examples.jyutping: sai2 zou6 gei2 noi6 aa1, zeoi3 do1 mai6 jat1 tau4 bun3 go3 jyut6!
examples.translation: It doesn't take much time, around half a month at most!

senses.definition: 好悠閒咁坐船周圍去 (to travel on a boat, yacht, or cruise, etc. for pleasure)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 joek3 zo2 ngo5 heoi3 jau4 syun4 ho2.
examples.translation: She invited me on a boat trip.

senses.definition: 想做乜嘢就做乜嘢 (wilful; wayward)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你太任性喇，淨係諗自己鐘意做乜就做乜，有冇諗下後果架？

examples.translation: Stop being wayward. You can't do whatever you want. Have you ever thought about the consequence?

senses.definition: 野蠻，唔講道理 (rebellious; nonsense)

examples.text: 小姐唔好咁任性啦，佢地舖頭賣晒都無計，唔好再鬧佢地啦。
examples.translation: Madam, please understand that their store has sold out and they cannot help you anymore. Please do not be unreasonable or rude to them.

senses.definition: 喺法律上首先提出訴訟，告人嗰一方（量詞：個／位／名） (plaintiff)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: The plaintiff accused the man of sexual harassment.

senses.definition: #同歸於盡，#攬炒 (to defeat with self-sacrifice; literally: to burn both jade and stone)

senses.definition: 狹義指元朗市中心 (Yuen Long town centre)

examples.text: 好多住天水圍嘅人都會出元朗買餸。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 zyu6 tin1 seoi2 wai4 ge3 jan4 dou1 wui5 ceot1 jyun4 long5 maai5 sung3.
examples.translation: Many people living in Tin Shui Wai go to Yuen Long town centre to buy ingredients for cooking.

senses.definition: 香港#上市#公司 被納入做#恆生指數 嘅成份股 (a listed company to become a constituent of Hang Seng Index)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 中資公司入股香港上市公司 (Chinese enterprise to become a major shareholder of a listed company)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 國家名；位於#中東，首都係#巴格達；係石油輸出國，原油儲量係全球第三 (Iraq)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 有感受；有感觸 (to have a feeling)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: X

senses.definition: 蓋（通常係甲殼類動物嘅） ((often of crustaceans) lid; flap; cover)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: haai5 jim2
examples.translation: crab apron, the under side of a crab

senses.definition: 人工咁改變頭髮嘅顏色 (to dye hair)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我上年啲頭髮未剪短，嗰時有染髮。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 soeng6 nin2 di1 tau4 faat3 mei6 zin2 dyun2, go2 si4 jau5 jim5 faat3.
examples.translation: Last year I did not cut my hair yet. At that time I dyed my hair.

senses.definition: 緩慢噉、漸進噉 (slowly, gradually)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: kei4 ci3 ceoi4 ceoi4 sing1 hei2.
examples.translation: The flag raises gradually.

senses.definition: 用嚟裝著#染料 嘅大瓦缸（量詞：個） (dye vat)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢細個嗰陣跌咗入個染缸度，好彩入便咩都冇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 sai3 go3 go2 zan6 dit3 zo2 jap6 go3 jim5 gong1 dou6, hou2 coi2 jap6 bin6 me1 dou1 mou5.
examples.translation: He fell into a dye vat when he was a child; fortunately, it was empty.

senses.definition: 令人變壞嘅環境 (a corrupting environment)

examples.text: 呢間辦公室係個大染缸，一個滿腔熱誠嘅畢業生入咗去，一個唯唯諾諾嘅打工仔出返嚟。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 baan6 gung1 sat1 hai6 go3 daai6 jim5 gong1, jat1 go3 mun5 hong1 jit6 sing4 ge3 bat1 jip6 sang1 jap6 zo2 heoi3, jat1 go3 wai2 wai2 nok6 nok6 ge3 daa2 gung1 zai2 ceot1 faan1 lei4.
examples.translation: This office is soul crushing. In goes an aspiring graduate, out comes a brownnosing wageslave.

senses.definition: #感染#疫症 (to get infected)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 一名護士喺照顧病人嘅時候，不幸染疫。
examples.jyutping: jat1 ming4 wu6 si6 hai2 ziu3 gu3 beng6 jan4 ge3 si4 hau6, bat1 hang6 jim5 jik6.
examples.translation: Unfortunately, a nurse gets infected when taking care of a patient.

senses.definition: #新抱 嘅書面語（量詞：個） (written language of daughter-in-law)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 san1 pou5 deoi3 ngo5 hou2 hou2.
examples.translation: My daughter-in-law treats me well.

senses.definition: 限於某個用途嘅土地（量詞：幅／塊） (land for a certain use)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zung2 jung6 dei6
examples.translation: total land area

senses.definition: 進入冬季 (to enter winter; to begin the winter season)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今日係入冬以嚟最凍嘅一日。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 hai6 jap6 dung1 ji5 lai4 zeoi3 dung3 ge3 jat1 jat6.
examples.translation: Today has been the coldest day since winter started.

senses.definition: 曾經大範圍#整容 嘅人 (person who did a lot of plastic surgery, literally: artificial human)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 非常之吸引，通常用嚟形容風景或者故事 ((of scenery, literary works) fascinating; enchanting; bewitching)

examples.jyutping: ni1 bun2 syu1 jan5 jan4 jap6 sing3, duk6 ze2 go3 go3 dou1 tai2 dou3 m4 hang2 fong3 sau2.
examples.translation: The book is so fascinating that those who started reading wouldn’t want to put it down.

senses.definition: #標點符號；用嚟標示直接引述、對白，或者表示強調、反話或者特殊含意；用#開引號 開始，用#閂引號 結束；如果有多過一重，會用#單引號（「」‘’）及#雙引號（『』“”）嚟到區別（量詞：個） (quotation mark)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 油脂變壞嘅氣味 ((of smell or taste) rancid; having the smell or taste of oils and greasy food that have gone bad)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: jau4 jik1 mei6
examples.translation: rancid smell

senses.definition: 遮住前額嘅頭髮（量詞：擗／執） (bangs or fringe; hair in front of the forehead)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lau4 jam1
examples.translation: to keep the fringe

senses.definition: 中國哲學嘅概念，同「#陽」相對，指自然界二元對立嘅事物入面，同「地」、「暗」、「月」、「死亡」、「女性」、「被動」、「負」、「下」等概念有關聯嘅一方 (Yin, a concept in Chinese philosophy, as opposed to Yang (#陽 joeng4), used to refer to concepts commonly associated with earth, darkness, moon, death, femininity, passiveness, negative, downward, etc., when describing natural phenomena that fall into a dichotomy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jam1 cam4
examples.translation: gloomy

senses.definition: 用手段去令人做錯決定；陷害 (to trick; to trap; to betray; to treat)

examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 bei2 tiu4 tai4 muk6 jam1 dou2 aa3!
examples.translation: Don't get tricked by the question.

senses.definition: 由人類製造出嚟，嘗試模擬人類嘅智能同判斷能力嘅系統 (artificial intelligence)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 科學家擔心人工智能終有一日會取代人類。
examples.jyutping: fo1 hok6 gaa1 daam1 sam1 jan4 gung1 zi3 nang4 zung1 jau5 jat1 jat6 wui5 ceoi2 doi6 jan4 leoi6.
examples.translation: Scientists worry that artificial intelligence will replace humanity someday.

senses.definition: 充滿；充份咁流動 (to overflow with; to be permeated with)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: coi4 waa4 joeng4 jat6
examples.translation: talented

senses.definition: 指情侶偷偷摸摸噉約會、攬攬錫錫 ((of couple) to have a secret date; to hug and kiss when no one is around)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢對情侶喺公園入邊咿咿挹挹。
examples.jyutping: ni1 deoi3 cing4 leoi5 hai2 gung1 jyun4 jap6 bin1 ji1 ji1 jap1 jap1.
examples.translation: This couple was hugging and kissing each other in the park.

senses.definition: 未成年嘅人；比「#細路」、「#小朋友」更正式（量詞：個／名） (child; kid; more formal than #細路 sai3 lou6 and #小朋友 siu2 pang4 jau5)

examples.jyutping: ji4 tung4 bat1 ji4
examples.translation: not suitable for children

senses.definition: 唱畀兒童聽嘅歌；一般旋律、歌詞簡單，適合小朋友收聽（量詞：首／隻／支） (children's song; nursery rhyme)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 sai3 go3 seng4 jat6 dou1 coeng3 ji4 go1.
examples.translation: I used to sing nursery rhymes always when I was small.

senses.definition: 為幼童提供學前教育同託管照顧嘅機構，訓練兒童嘅自理能力同教授簡單學術知識（量詞：間） (nursery school)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你個仔歲半喇喎，有冇幫佢揾定幼兒園啊？
examples.jyutping: nei5 go3 zai2 seoi3 bun3 laa3 wo3, jau5 mou5 bong1 keoi5 wan2 ding6 jau3 ji4 jyun2 aa3?
examples.translation: Your son is one and a half years old. Have you found a nursery school for him?

senses.definition: 排成一行，形容整齊有序 (arranged in a row, and thus neatly and orderly; literally: to be arranged like the character "一")
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: cyun4 bou6 jan4 tung4 ngo5 jat1 zi6 paai4 hoi1!
examples.translation: Every one of you line yourselves up!

senses.definition: 責任重大，歷程漫長 (to bear a great responsibility, and the path towards the ideal is long)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 做老師真係任重道遠、責任重大，唔係淨係為咗份糧㗎！
examples.translation: Being a teacher is a great responsibility. It's not only for earning a paycheck.

senses.definition: 冇遺漏噉達到一件事要求嘅目標；做晒所有可以做嘅步驟，冇得再做落去 (to complete; to fulfil; to finish something according to plan)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: seon6 lei6 jyun4 sing4
examples.translation: to finish smoothly

senses.definition: 覺得某樣嘢令自己唔舒服，都仍然面對佢 (to endure; to bear; to tolerate; to withstand)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jan2 noi6
examples.translation: to exercise patience; to exercise restraint; to restrain oneself

senses.definition: 節制；保持克制 (to hold back; to refrain)

examples.text: 係人都唔中意畀老闆鬧啦，你忍住度氣先啦。
examples.jyutping: hai6 jan4 dou1 m4 zung1 ji3 bei2 lou5 baan2 naau6 laa1, nei5 jan2 zyu6 dou6 hei3 sin1 laa1.
examples.translation: No one wants to be scolded by the boss. You should hold back your anger.

senses.definition: 自己或者下屬犯咗錯，負起責任請辭 (to take the blame on oneself and resign)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢帶領嘅球隊一場波都冇贏過，佢決定引咎辭職。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 daai3 ling5 ge3 kau4 deoi2 jat1 coeng4 bo1 dou1 mou5 jeng4 gwo3, keoi5 kyut3 ding6 jan5 gau3 ci4 zik1.
examples.translation: Since the team he leads has never won a match, he takes the blame and resigns.

senses.definition: 形容人卓越、傑出、有成就 ((of person) outstanding; successful; with talent)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: jing1 zeon3
examples.translation: handsome

senses.definition: 同英國有關嘅 (related to United Kingdom)

examples.jyutping: jing1 bong2
examples.translation: pound

senses.definition: 一種天文現象，當#月球 運行到#地球 同#太陽 之間，喺地球見到太陽被月亮遮住嘅情況 (solar eclipse)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 新聞話今日下晝兩點會見到日蝕。
examples.jyutping: san1 man2 waa6 gam1 jat6 haa6 zau3 loeng5 dim2 wui5 gin3 dou2 jat6 sik6.
examples.translation: The news says there will be an eclipse of the sun at 2pm today.

senses.definition: 結咗婚嘅女人同佢家翁 (married woman and her father-in-law)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jung1 sik1 gwaan1 hai6
examples.translation: relationship between a married woman and her father-in-law

senses.definition: 任何一個圍繞#太陽 公轉嘅天體，最遠太陽嘅位置 (aphelion)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容啲嘢好#熱，通常係啲我哋日常接觸到嘅嘢 (extremely and uncomfortably hot; sweltering)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 啲蛋撻新鮮出爐，仲熱辣辣㗎。
examples.jyutping: di1 daan6 taat1 san1 sin1 ceot1 lou4, zung6 jit6 laat6 laat6 gaa3.
examples.translation: The egg tarts are fresh out of the oven. They're still hot.

senses.definition: 回應其他人，通常係靠儀器 (to answer or respond, usually via a device)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我又send WhatsApp又打電話畀你，你都唔應機。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jau6 sen1 WHATSAPP jau6 daa2 din6 waa2 bei2 nei5, nei5 dou1 m4 jing3 gei1.
examples.translation: I WhatsApped you and phoned you. You didn't answer.

senses.definition: 特登將一啲自己嘅優勢、長處、成就表現出嚟或者拎出嚟講，意圖令其他人羨慕妒忌 (to show off; to flaunt; to brag)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢成日炫耀自己嘅學問。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 seng4 jat6 jyun4 jiu6 zi6 gei2 ge3 hok6 man6.
examples.translation: He always flaunts his knowledge.

senses.definition: 味道好、突出 (yummy; tasty; tasting outstanding)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: dip6 caau2 haai5 caau2 dak1 hou2 je5 mei6 aa3!
examples.translation: The dish of stir-fried crabs are wonderful!

senses.definition: #撳 住自己；唔俾情緒、不滿爆發 (to suppress (one's feeling))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 喺度開咪好辛苦，要抑壓住唔講粗口。
examples.jyutping: hai2 dou6 hoi1 mai1 hou2 san1 fu2, jiu3 jik1 aat3 zyu6 m4 gong2 cou1 hau2.
examples.translation: It's really tough doing live stream here, as I have to suppress myself not to swear.

senses.definition: 喺日頭嘅時候（強調做啲多數夜晚先做，或者唔見得光嘅嘢） (in broad daylight; used to emphasise that something happens, surprisingly, during daytime because of its clandestine nature)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 日光日白打劫？你真係大膽啊！
examples.jyutping: jat6 gwong1 jat6 baak6 daa2 gip3? nei5 zan1 hai6 daai6 daam2 aa3!
examples.translation: Looting in broad daylight? How dare you!

senses.definition: #侮辱#中國 或者同中國相關嘅人或者事物 (to insult China)

senses.definition: 好搶眼 (catch somebody 's eyes)

examples.translation: Your clothes are catching people 's eyes

senses.definition: 喺有錢屋企出世，揮霍無度又冇咩建樹嘅人 (big-spending son; spoilt rich boy; literally: second generation ancestor)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢正一二世祖，乜都唔識剩係識使錢。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zing3 jat1 ji6 sai3 zou2, mat1 dou1 m4 sik1 zing6 hai6 sik1 sai2 cin2.
examples.translation: He knows nothing apart from spending money. A typical big-spending and spoiled kid.

senses.definition: 形容人唔會企硬去爭取自己要嘅嘢，唔識去對抗自己唔想要嘅嘢 (weak; fickle; irresolute)

examples.text: 你咁軟弱，點樣可以保護你女神？
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam3 jyun5 joek6 dim2 joeng2 ho2 ji3 bou2 wu6 nei5 neoi5 san4.
examples.translation: How could you protect your love when you are weak?

examples.jyutping: daai6 zyun1 jyun2 haau6
examples.translation: tertiary educational institutions

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
形容講嘢細聲，好似冇氣噉 (softly-spoken)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢病到講嘢都好陰吱細氣。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 beng6 dou3 gong2 je5 dou1 hou2 jam1 zi1 sai3 hei3.
examples.translation: She could only speak softly because of her illness.

senses.definition: 一個人講嘢，另一個人即刻呼應。用嚟形容兩個人好夾，兼互相呼應。 (to echo each other)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢哋兩個一唱一和，講到天花龍鳳咁，搞到我頭都暈。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 loeng5 go3 jat1 coeng3 jat1 wo4, gong2 dou3 tin1 faa1 lung4 fung6 gam2, gaau2 dou3 ngo5 tau4 dou1 wan4.
examples.translation: They echo each other and paint a rosy picture of the company's future. I didn't even get the chance to react.

senses.definition: 一種#桌球 玩法，開始時枱上面有一個白波同15個紅波、6個#顏色波，兩個人輪流跟據規則將顏色波打入枱邊袋 (snooker; English Billiards)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #玉 同#石 合稱 (jade)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: juk6 sek6 si5 coeng4
examples.translation: jade market

senses.definition: 黃種人皮肉嘅#顏色 (nude colour; peach colour; very pale yellow; literally: flesh colour)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 受到異性歡迎嘅程度 (popularity among the opposite sex)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿源其貌不揚，無乜異性緣。
examples.jyutping: aa3 jyun4 kei4 maau6 bat1 joeng4, mou5 mat1 ji6 sing3 jyun4.
examples.translation: Ah Yuen isn't very attractive and popular with the ladies.

senses.definition: 未正式做一件事之前，估計一下佢嘅成本或者利潤 (to estimate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hoi1 zi1 jyu6 syun3
examples.translation: Estimates of expenditure

senses.definition: 由基本或者低職位開始做 (to start out in junior positions)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 學師要由低做起，唔能夠一步登天。
examples.jyutping: hok6 si1 jiu3 jau4 dai1 zou6 hei2, m4 nang4 gau3 jat1 bou6 dang1 tin1.
examples.translation: Apprentices should start from scratch rather than aiming high.

senses.definition: 有目的咁去曬太陽，通常係為咗美黑，或者健康 (sunbathing)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 難得放假，今日天氣又咁好，好多人都帶埋一家大細去沙灘曬日光浴。
examples.jyutping: naan4 dak1 fong3 gaa3, gam1 jat6 tin1 hei3 jau6 gam3 hou2, hou2 do1 jan4 dou1 daai3 maai4 jat1 gaa1 daai6 sai3 heoi3 saa1 taan1 saai3 jat6 gwong1 juk6.
examples.translation: Today is a holiday and the weather is nice. Many people brought their families to the beach to enjoy sunbathing.

senses.definition: 一口氣飲晒杯入面嘅酒或其他飲品；一啖過 (to drink up in one gulp)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 做事過於急進 (describe people who want to attain the highest level in one step)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 慢慢嚟，做嘢唔可能一步登天嘅。
examples.jyutping: maan6 maan2 lei4, zou6 je5 m4 ho2 nang4 jat1 bou6 dang1 tin1 ge3.
examples.translation: Relax, nothing can be done in one step.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
因此可以得出、推斷出以下嘅結論，用嚟承接上文嘅#理據 同之後嘅#結論 (therefore; thus; it goes to show)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 由此可見，佢係一個壞人
examples.translation: Therefore, we can see that he is the villain.

senses.definition: 學定技能等將來用 (to equip oneself with a skill)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 生活喺今時今日嘅香港，無一技傍身點生存啊？
examples.translation: In today's Hong Kong, how can one survive without any skills?

senses.definition: 以#當兵 為主要#職業，半世人都喺戰場上度過 (to dedicate half of one's life to the army or battlefield)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 大將軍戎馬半生，換嚟嘅只係被人陷害，身首異處。
examples.jyutping: daai6 zoeng1 gwan1 jung4 maa5 bun3 sang1, wun6 lei4 ge3 zi2 hai6 bei6 jan4 ham6 hoi6, san1 sau2 ji6 cyu3.
examples.translation: The general dedicated half his life to the battlefield. But in the end, he was framed and executed.

senses.definition: 一件事非常急切，去到隨時都要發生嘅地步 (describes something or someone to be on the verge of something)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: jyu4 zin3 zoi6 jin4, bat1 dak1 bat1 faat3.
examples.translation: We are on the verge of success and there's no turning back now.

senses.definition: 請#醫生#診治 (to see a doctor; to seek medical attention)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 俾黃蜂拮傷完要即刻求醫診治。
examples.jyutping: bei2 wong4 fung1 gat1 soeng1 jyun4 jiu3 zik1 hak1 kau4 ji1 can2 zi6.
examples.translation: Seek medical attention immediately after being stung by a wasp.

senses.definition: 被敵方射中一箭嘅仇恨，泛指因某件事而結下嘅舊怨 (grievance)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢努力練習乒乓波，為嘅就係報上次比賽嘅一箭之仇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 nou5 lik6 lin6 zaap6 bing1 bam1 bo1, wai6 ge3 zau6 hai6 bou3 soeng6 ci3 bei2 coi3 ge3 jat1 zin3 zi1 sau4.
examples.translation: He puts in a lot of effort to practice table tennis to settle an old score.

senses.definition: 指最初的版本或原始的版本；未經翻譯嘅#原作 (original edition; the original or initial version of something)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 睇翻譯小説邊夠過癮，梗係要揾番英文原版啦！
examples.jyutping: tai2 faan1 jik6 siu2 syut3 bin1 gau3 gwo3 jan5, gang2 hai6 jiu3 wan2 faan1 jing1 man2 jyun4 baan2 laa1!
examples.translation: I won't settle for a translated version of the novel. I will, of course, find the original English version to read.

senses.definition: 飲#酒 飲到#醉；#神智 唔清晰、腦部協調變得#遲鈍 (to get drunk)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jam2 zeoi3 mai5 zaa1 ce1
examples.translation: no driving drunk

senses.definition: 熔鍊金屬嘅火爐（量詞：個） (smelter)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 比喻融合文化、語言、種族嘅地方（量詞：個） (melting pot)
