jyutping: jan4 sei2 bat1 nang4 fuk6 sang1

senses.definition: 人死咗之後，無辦法復活；通常用嚟安慰死者嘅親屬 (that dead man rise up never; living well is the greatest comfort to the deceased)
senses.label: 語句

keywords: jan4 sei2 bat1 nang4 fuk6 sang1
jan sei bat nang fuk sang

senses.definition: 香港#天文台 形容空氣中佈滿#懸浮粒子，造成#能見度 下降之污染現象 (haze)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 本港今早天晴，陽光充沛，但有煙霞。
examples.jyutping: bun2 gong2 gam1 zou2 tin1 cing4, joeng4 gwong1 cung1 pui3, daan6 jau5 jin1 haa4.
examples.translation: It was sunny this morning in Hong Kong, but haze shrouded the sky.

senses.definition: 生意；行業嘅工作事務 (vocational work; professional work; business)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋開多咗兩間舖去拓展業務。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 hoi1 do1 zo2 loeng5 gaan1 pou3 heoi3 tok3 zin2 jip6 mou6.
examples.translation: We've expanded our business by opening two more stores.

senses.definition: 冇需要地長 (unnecessarily long; long-winded)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢講嘢不著邊際，行文亦都同樣咁冗長。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gong2 je5 bat1 zoek6 bin1 zai3, hang4 man4 jik6 dou1 tung4 joeng6 gam3 jung2 coeng4.
examples.translation: His speech is empty and his words are long-winded.

senses.definition: 一套用嚟修身養性嘅方法，包括活動自己嘅肢體，調整呼吸同心靈 (yoga)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jyu4 gaa1 fu3
examples.translation: yoga pants

senses.definition: 十九至二十世紀發展出嚟嘅文化思潮，批判傳統，重視主觀意識，肯定人有改變環境嘅能力 (modernism)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 意識流係一種現代主義文學嘅敍述手法。
examples.jyutping: ji3 sik1 lau4 hai6 jat1 zung2 jin6 doi6 zyu2 ji6 man4 hok6 ge3 zeoi6 seot6 sau2 faat3.
examples.translation: Stream of conscience is a kind of narrative device of literary modernism.

senses.definition: 形容人着嘅衫好破爛，顯出佢景況唔好 (shabby; ragged)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 啲難民個個都衣衫襤褸。
examples.jyutping: di1 naan6 man4 go3 go3 dou1 ji1 saam1 laam4 lau5.
examples.translation: The refugees were all shabby.

phonetic.original: jit1 ci1 baan1:it1 ci1 baan1:jit1 zi1 baan1

senses.definition:
#質素 非常高，#無得頂，來自日文「一番（いちばん）」 (of top quality; first-rate; loanword from Japanese
jpn:一番（いちばん）)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 啲雞又有咬口，又新鮮，配埋個汁，真係ichiban！
examples.jyutping: di1 gai1 jau6 jau5 ngaau5 hau2, jau6 san1 sin1, pui3 maai4 go3 zap1, zan1 hai6 it1 ci1 baan1!
examples.translation: The chicken is stringy, fresh, and superb with the sauce!

keywords: jit1 ci1 baan1:it1 ci1 baan1:jit1 zi1 baan1

senses.definition: 冇#必要；冇一定要做一件事嘅#需要 (not necessarily; to have no necessity)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 雖然要儲錢買樓，你哋都唔駛一日淨係食一餐呀嘛？
examples.jyutping: seoi1 jin4 jiu3 cou5 cin2 maai5 lau2, nei5 dei6 dou1 m4 sai2 jat1 jat6 zing6 hai6 sik6 jat1 caan1 aa6 maa5?
examples.translation: Although you are saving money for a flat, you don't have to eat only one meal a day!

senses.definition: 限制某個人喺特定範圍入面，並且監察佢嘅行動 (to house arrest; to confine to one's quarters, rather than prison, by judicial order)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 作為皇帝竟然畀人軟禁。
examples.jyutping: zok3 wai4 wong4 dai3 ging2 jin4 bei2 jan4 jyun5 gam3.
examples.translation: As the emperor of the country, he was detained to his quarters.

senses.definition: 一樣動作所需要嘅物件（量詞：件／項） (product; stuff; material)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ji1 liu4 jung6 ban2
examples.translation: medical supplies

senses.definition: （文雅噉指）諗返起之前嘅事並且記述；根據回憶嚟敍述 ((decent) to recall and to narrate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zing3 jan4 jik1 seot6 si6 faat3 ging1 gwo3.
examples.translation: The witness recounts what happened.

senses.definition: #聲音 嘅#特色，係每一種樂器或者人聲都會有嘅，因為非常#獨特 所以喺同一 #音高 同 #音量 下都可以分辨到由邊個樂器或邊個人發出 (sound quality; timbre)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: siu2 hou6 ge3 jam1 sik1 liu4 loeng6.
examples.translation: Trumpets have a loud and clear sound.

senses.definition: 將剩低嘅肉切薄加汁嘅烹調方式 (émincé)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: ji1 wan4 si6 guk6 ngau4 juk6 faan6
examples.translation: baked émincé de beef rice

senses.definition: 一種研究、檢核同處方#藥物 嘅專業 (pharmacy (as a profession or field of study))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: joek6 zai1 si1
examples.translation: pharmacist; chemist

senses.definition: #袋 嘅一種，孭好之後，個袋嘅位置大約喺條#腰 咁上下（量詞：個） (waist pack; fanny pack)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢個腰包裏面有好多實用嘢，連指南針都有。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 go3 jiu1 baau1 leoi5 min6 jau5 hou2 do1 sat6 jung6 je5, lin4 zi2 naam4 zam1 dou1 jau5.
examples.translation: His fanny pack is full of useful gadgets. He even has a compass.

senses.definition: 用嚟寫#日記 嘅#簿（量詞：本） (diary book)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我想開始寫日記，所以我係書店買咗本日記簿。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 soeng2 hoi1 ci2 se2 jat6 gei3, so2 ji5 ngo5 hai2 syu1 dim3 maai5 zo2 bun2 jat6 gei3 bou2.
examples.translation: I wanted to start keeping my diary, so I bought a diary from the bookstore.

senses.definition: 好多人認為佢好偉大嘅人物；原因可能係因為佢才能出眾，或者因為佢帶嚟勝利等等（量詞：位／個） (hero; heroine)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: man4 zuk6 jing1 hung4
examples.translation: national hero

senses.definition: 忍受痛苦（肉體上或心靈上） ((lit.) to endure the pain silently; (fig.) to endure sth that troubles you)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你忍住痛，救護車就到喇。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jan2 zyu6 tung3, gau3 wu6 ce1 zau6 dou3 laa3.
examples.translation: Please endure the pain. The ambulance is coming very soon.

senses.definition: 把聲同容貌都好似重喺人間，指死者遺留落嚟俾人嘅記憶重係好深刻；常見於弔唁 (to describe how deep the impression of someone who passes away is as if his voice and appearance were still here;  a common phrase in condolences)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 恩師喺我哋心目中音容宛在，我哋時刻銘記住佢嘅教誨。
examples.jyutping: jan1 si1 hai2 ngo5 dei6 sam1 muk6 zung1 jam1 jung4 jyun2 zoi6, ngo5 dei6 si4 haak1 ming5 gei3 zyu6 keoi5 ge3 gaau3 fui3.
examples.translation: Our (late) beloved teacher will always live in our hearts. We shall remember his teaching all the time.

senses.definition: #認出；#識別 (to know; to recognise)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我認得呢個人，佢住我哋樓上𠺢嘛。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jing6 dak1 ni1 go3 jan4, keoi5 zyu6 ngo5 dei6 lau4 soeng6 gaa1 maa3.
examples.translation: I know that man. He lives above our home.

senses.definition: 開始 (to start with)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 廣東話好易學㗎咋，唔使驚入唔到手。
examples.jyutping: gwong2 dung1 waa2 hou2 ji6 hok6 gaa3 zaa3, m4 sai2 geng1 jap6 m4 dou2 sau2.
examples.translation: Cantonese is easy to learn, you need not worry that you can't start.

senses.definition: 得到；#到手；買入 (to obtain; to buy)

examples.text: 呢隻絕版CD今日終於入咗手喇！
examples.jyutping: ni1 zek3 zyut6 baan2 si1 di1 gam1 jat6 zung1 jyu1 jap6 zo2 sau2 laa3!
examples.translation: I finally obtained this out-of-print CD today!

senses.definition: 應用嘅方面（量詞：個） ((of an object) usage; use; application)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: di1 cit3 bei6 jau5 hou2 do1 jung6 tou4.
examples.translation: The equipment is versatile.

senses.definition: 一個充滿商機或者賺錢機會嘅地方（量詞：笪） (a place or an area which offers many possibilities for making money)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 渠務署成日要同判頭打交道，係笪油水地。
examples.jyutping: keoi4 mou6 cyu5 sing4 jat6 jiu3 tung4 pun3 tau4 daa2 gaau1 dou6, hai6 daat3 jau4 seoi2 dei6.
examples.translation: The drainage service department often deals with contractors; it's a real gold mine if you're looking for profit.

senses.definition: 聚精會神 (to concentrate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢凝神一睇，覺得紙上面嘅字不斷跳動。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jing4 san4 jat1 tai2, gok3 dak1 zi2 soeng6 min6 ge3 zi6 bat1 dyun6 tiu3 dung6.
examples.translation: He concentrates and takes a closer look. It seems that the words jump and leap on the paper.

senses.definition: #生物 死咗之後#離開#身體 嘅#靈魂（量詞：隻） (ghost; phantom; spirit of the dead)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢成日話自己有陰陽眼，可以睇到幽靈。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 seng4 jat6 waa6 zi6 gei2 jau5 jam1 joeng4 ngaan5, ho2 ji5 tai2 dou2 jau1 ling4.
examples.translation: He always claims that he has the ability to see ghosts.

senses.definition: 跟隨一定嘅規則或者路線 (along; alongside)
senses.label: 介詞

examples.text: 沿住條路行 10 分鐘就到。
examples.jyutping: jyun4 zyu6 tiu4 lou6 haang4 sap6 fan1 zung1 zau6 dou3.
examples.translation: Walk along the road for about 10 mins and then you're there.

senses.definition: 字面上指紙元寶同埋蠟燭，泛指#燒 畀先人嘅嘢。 (ceremonial paper money and candles, means all the burnt offerings for the  ancestors)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 掃墓嗰陣，小祝燒啲元寶蠟燭畀祝叔叔。
examples.jyutping: sou3 mou6 go2 zan6, siu2 zuk1 siu1 di1 jyun4 bou2 laap6 zuk1 bei2 zuk1 suk1 suk1.
examples.translation: While tomb sweeping, Little Jok burnt some paper money and candle for Uncle Jok.

senses.definition: #養殖#蜜蜂，目的主要係想攞#蜜糖、蜂蠟、或者蜂花粉。 (Beekeeping)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿松走去學養蜂，結果畀啲蜜蜂針到佢入咗醫院。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 zau2 heoi3 hok6 joeng5 fung1, git3 gwo2 bei2 di1 mat6 fung1 zam1 dou3 keoi5 jap6 zo2 ji1 jyun2.
examples.translation: A-chung went to learn beekeeping. He ended up stung so badly he got sent to the hospital.

senses.definition: 係咁望住一樣嘢 (to stare; to look fixedly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢凝視著虛無，然後發現虛無沉悶非常。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jing4 si6 zoek6 heoi1 mou4, jin4 hau6 faat3 jin6 heoi1 mou4 cam4 mun6 fei1 soeng4.
examples.translation: He stares into the void, only to find the void not that interesting.

senses.definition: 距離自己遠嘅地方、位置 (a place or location that is far away)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jyun5 cyu5 jau5 zek3 syun4.
examples.translation: There is a boat far away.

phonetic.original: jau5 je5 zau6 gong2 jau5 pei3 zau6 fong3
jyutping: jau5 je5 zau6 gong2 jau5 pei3 zau6 fong3

senses.definition: 叫對方直接講重點 (ask the other for main point. an expression of impatience, "get on with it!", "say what's on your mind!"; literally "Say it if you have something to say, fart if you want.")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 「陳總，我覺得我哋可能⋯⋯或者⋯⋯」「有嘢就講，有屁就放！」
examples.jyutping: "can4 zung2, ngo5 gok3 dak1 ngo5 dei6 ho2 nang4... waak6 ze2... " "jau5 je5 zau6 gong2, jau5 pei3 zau6 fong3!"
examples.translation: Chairman Chan, I believe... we... maybe..." "Give me your main point!

keywords: jau5 je5 zau6 gong2 jau5 pei3 zau6 fong3
jau je zau gong jau pei zau fong

senses.definition: #聽 嘢聽得唔#清楚 (can't hear well)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 講大聲啲啦，#阿伯 耳聾㗎。
examples.jyutping: gong2 daai6 seng1 di1 laa1, aa3 baak3 ji5 lung4 gaa3.
examples.translation: Speak louder, the old man can't hear well.

senses.definition: #喪失#聽覺；完全聽唔到嘢 (hearing-impaired; deaf)

examples.text: 耳聾嘅人聽唔到#水滾 聲。
examples.jyutping: ji5 lung4 ge3 jan4 teng1 m4 dou2 seoi2 gwan2 seng1.
examples.translation: The deaf can't hear the sound of boiling water.

senses.definition: 吸引人，甚至令人迷惑 (to tempt; to seduce)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 蘇聯特務擅長利用美色嚟誘惑，以套取情報。
examples.jyutping: sou1 lyun4 dak6 mou6 sin6 coeng4 lei6 jung6 mei5 sik1 lai4 jau5 waak6, ji5 heoi3 tou3 ceoi2 cing4 bou3.
examples.translation: Soviet spies were adept at sexpionage.

senses.definition: 以備不時之需 (to prepare against unexpected needs)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: di1 cin2 hai6 lo2 lai4 jing3 gap1 gaa3!
examples.translation: This is no usual money, it is the rainy day fund.

senses.definition: 吸引人嘅，導致人會作出某種行為嘅條件或者利益（量詞：種） (seduction; temptation; allure)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tou4 sik1 jau5 waak6
examples.translation: (sex) seduction

senses.definition: 天光之後、天黑之前嘅時間 (daytime)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 為咗買屋，佢日頭返工之餘，夜晚仲要做兼職。
examples.jyutping: wai6 zo2 maai5 uk1, keoi5 jat6 tau2 faan1 gung1 zi1 jyu4, je6 maan5 zung6 jiu3 zou6 gim1 zik1.
examples.translation: In order to buy a flat, he needs to work not only during daytime, but also a part-time job at night.

senses.definition: #陽光、日光；太陽 (sun light; the sun)

examples.text: 今日日頭咁猛，出街記得搽返啲太陽油。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 jat6 tau2 gam3 maang5, ceot1 gaai1 gei3 dak1 caa4 faan1 di1 taai3 joeng4 jau4.
examples.translation: The sun is so bright today, remember to apply some sun cream when you go out.

senses.definition: 令兩個人互相相愛結婚嘅#緣份（量詞：段） (the happy fate which brings lovers together in marriage)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢哋兩個最終可以走埋一齊，呢段姻緣真係羨慕死人。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 loeng5 go3 zeoi3 zung1 ho2 ji5 zau2 maai4 jat1 cai4, ni1 dyun6 jan1 jyun4 zan1 hai6 sin6 mou6 sei2 jan4.
examples.translation: I envy their fate which has brought them together eventually.

senses.definition: 被屠宰成為食材嘅豬、牛或者羊（量詞：隻） (carcass (to be cut up as meat))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 肉殼需要沖洗過先可以運送出售。
examples.jyutping: juk6 hok3 seoi1 jiu3 cung1 sai2 gwo3 sin1 ho2 ji5 wan6 sung3 ceot1 sau6.
examples.translation: The carcass has to be rinsed before delivery for sale.

senses.definition: 形容某啲動作合乎#責任、#規範 或者情理 (should; ought to; used to indicate duty or propriety)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 如果有人浸親，你應該跳落去救佢。
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 jau5 jan4 zam3 can1, nei5 jing1 goi1 tiu3 lok6 heoi3 gau3 keoi5.
examples.translation: Should you see anyone drowning, you should save him.

senses.definition: 表示動作或者情況合理、適合、得當嘅動作 (to indicate a sensible, suitable or expedient thing to do or situation)

examples.jyutping: nei5 ji4 gaa1 jing1 goi1 heoi3 wan1 syu1.
examples.translation: You should do revision now.

senses.definition: 法律用語；當甲國嘅通緝犯逃走去到乙國，甲國會要求乙國交返個犯出嚟，如果乙國同意就會將個犯送返去甲國，交返個犯畀甲國呢個過程就叫引渡；通常兩個國家要簽咗引渡協議先會咁做 (to extradite)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 匿埋喺澳洲嗰個殺人犯終於要引渡返香港。
examples.jyutping: nei1 maai4 hai2 ou3 zau1 go2 go3 saat3 jan4 faan2 zung1 jyu1 jiu3 jan5 dou6 faan1 hoeng1 gong2.
examples.translation: The murderer hiding in Australia would be extradited to Hong Kong finally.

senses.definition: 推動某樣嘢一直前進嘅原因（量詞：股） (motivation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 雖然份工好辛苦，但我兩個仔就係令我堅持落去嘅原動力。
examples.jyutping: seoi1 jin4 fan6 gung1 hou2 san1 fu2, daan6 ngo5 loeng5 go3 zai2 zau6 hai6 ling6 ngo5 gin1 ci4 lok6 heoi3 ge3 jyun4 dung6 lik6.
examples.translation: Although my work is tough, my sons are the motivation that keeps me going.

senses.definition: 人或者動物身體上面除內臟以外嘅柔軟組織（量詞：嚿） (meat; flesh)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sau3 juk6
examples.translation: lean pork

senses.definition: #果實 可以食嘅部份 (pulp; flesh of fruit)

examples.jyutping: sai1 gwaa1 jau6 do1 juk6 jau6 do1 zap1.
examples.translation: Watermelon is juicy and full of flesh.

senses.definition: 為咗做一樣嘢或者達到目的，而行使工具、方法 (to use; to employ a tool or method to achieve an end)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 fuk1 waa2 ngo5 jung6 din6 nou5 waak6 ge2.
examples.translation: This picture was drawn by me using a computer.

senses.definition: #消耗 資源 (to use up; to expend resources, whether physical or temporal)

examples.jyutping: zi1 ngaa4 gou1 jung6 zo2 jat1 bun3.
examples.translation: The toothpaste in the tube is half-used up.

senses.definition: 呢樣又懷疑，嗰樣又懷疑；形容人多疑，疑心重 (extremely suspicious; literally, suspicious of gods and ghosts)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢成日疑神疑鬼，驚死有人落毒害佢。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 seng4 jat6 ji4 san4 ji4 gwai2, geng1 sei2 jau5 jan4 lok6 duk6 hoi6 keoi5.
examples.translation: He is very suspicious, especially afraid that someone will poison him.

senses.definition: #家下；而家（通常用嚟描述最近嘅狀況） (now; at present (a formal word used to describe the current situation))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 現時最迫切要解決嘅係人口老化問題。
examples.jyutping: jin6 si4 zeoi3 bik1 cit3 jiu3 gaai2 kyut3 ge3 hai6 jan4 hau2 lou5 faa3 man6 tai4.
examples.translation: For now, ageing population is the most urgent problem we need to solve.

senses.definition: 將原本坐住嘅位讓俾其他人坐 (to offer a seat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cing2 joeng6 zo6 jyu5 jau5 seoi1 jiu3 jan4 si6.
examples.translation: Please offer your seat to those in need.

phonetic.original: jat1 hiu3 bat1 tung1:jat1 kiu3 bat1 tung1

senses.definition: 對某啲事情完全唔識 (to be utterly ignorant of; to know nothing about a particular matter)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我讀文學嘅，對機械嘅嘢一竅不通。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 duk6 man4 hok6 ge3, deoi3 gei1 haai6 ge3 je5 jat1 hiu3 bat1 tung1.
examples.translation: I study literature and I know nothing about mechanics.

keywords: jat1 hiu3 bat1 tung1:jat1 kiu3 bat1 tung1

senses.definition: 不把要説的意思明説出來,而借用別的詞句來表示;一種隱晦的語言 (To express something indirectly by using other words or phrases instead of stating it directly; a kind of implicit language.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 美麗嘅夢; 有時指#咸濕 嘅夢、#春夢 (pleasant and romantic dream; sometimes means erotic dream)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢尋晚一定係發綺夢啦，成晚都笑瞇瞇咁。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 cam4 maan5 jat1 ding6 hai6 faat3 ji2 mung6 laa1, sing4 maan5 dou1 siu3 mi1 mi1 gam2.
examples.translation: He dreamed with a smiling face, he must have a pleasant and romantic one.

senses.definition: 各種診治方法、藥物都無效 (medicine and acupuncture are of no avail)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢有末期癌症，而家都藥石無靈啦！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jau5 mut6 kei4 ngaam4 zing3, ji4 gaa1 dou1 joek6 sek6 mou4 ling4 laa1!
examples.translation: He has an advanced cancer so the medicine and acupuncture are of no avail.

senses.definition: 熱天嘅時候，因為毛孔堵塞咗，導致汗流唔到出嚟而引起嘅毛囊發炎。 (millaria; heat rash; prickly heat)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: di1 jit6 fai2 zan1 hai6 hou2 han4 aa3!
examples.translation: The heat rash is so itchy!

senses.definition: 俾一樣嘢依附住，多數唔係好嘢 (to have contracted something, to be clanged onto by a foreign substance)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gin6 saam1 jim5 jau5 hyut3 zik1.
examples.translation: There is a bloodstain on his clothes.

senses.definition: 受傳染病所感染 (to be infected by something)

examples.text: 超過兩成入口牛肉都染有瘋牛症病毒。
examples.jyutping: ciu1 gwo3 loeng5 sing4 jap6 hau2 ngau4 juk6 dou1 jim5 jau5 fung1 ngau4 zing3 beng6 duk6.
examples.translation: Over twenty percent of imported beef is infected by BSE.

senses.definition: 輕微；有少少 (a bit; slightly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 ji4 gaa1 jau5 di1 ngaan5 fan3.
examples.translation: I am a bit sleepy right now.

senses.definition: 要有嘅嘢全部都有 (to have everything that one wishes for; to have an abundant supply of a large variety)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢間百貨公司貨品齊全，衣食住行用品應有盡有。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 baak3 fo3 gung1 si1 fo3 ban2 cai4 cyun4, ji1 sik6 zyu6 hang4 jung6 ban2 jing1 jau5 zeon6 jau5.
examples.translation: This department store is really well stocked.  It literally has everything one needs in a modern setting.

senses.definition: #支出 多過#收入 (income falling short of expenditure; unable to make ends meet)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢失業之後淨係靠兼職生活，每個月都入不敷支。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 sat1 jip6 zi1 hau6 zing6 hai6 kaau3 gim1 zik1 sang1 wut6, mui5 go3 jyut6 dou1 jap6 bat1 fu1 zi1.
examples.translation: After losing his original job, he earns his living by doing a part-time job, but his income falls short of expenditure every month.

senses.definition: 語言同文字嘅合稱（量詞：種） (language (spoken and written))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 近年香港學生嘅語文水平上升。
examples.jyutping: gan6 nin4 hoeng1 gong2 hok6 saang1 ge3 jyu5 man4 seoi2 ping4 soeng6 sing1.
examples.translation: In the last few years there has been an increase in the language proficiency of Hong Kong students.

senses.definition: 已婚男人（量詞：個） (husband; married man)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 珍妮愛上咗個人夫，因為貪佢成熟又有經驗。
examples.jyutping: zan1 nei4 oi3 soeng5 zo2 go3 jan4 fu1, jan1 wai6 taam1 keoi5 sing4 suk6 jau6 jau5 ging1 jim6.
examples.translation: Jenny is in love with a married man because he is mature and experienced.

senses.definition: 一種未爆發嘅不滿情緒 （量詞:股） (sentiment of discontent)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 經濟不景，失業率高企，社會充滿怨氣。
examples.jyutping: ging1 zai2 bat1 ging2, sat1 jip6 leot6 gou1 kei5, se5 wui2 cung1 mun5 jyun3 hei3.
examples.translation: The economy is weak and the unemployment rate is high. The Hong Kong society is filled with a sentiment of discontent.

senses.definition: 一次過畀全數，唔供分期（尤其指買樓） (to pay in full upfront, not in installments (especially for buying a property))
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢買樓一炮過，費事蝕息。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 maai5 lau2 jat1 paau3 gwo3, fai3 si6 sit6 sik1.
examples.translation: She bought the apartment with full payment upfront, saving her the interest.

senses.definition: #外表；包括佢嘅衣着、戴啲乜嘢飾品、同埋髮型等等。 (appearance, grooming.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hok6 saang1 jing1 goi1 jiu3 ji4 biu2 zing2 git3.
examples.translation: A student should be well-groomed.

senses.definition: 物種長年累月嘅變化 (biological evolution; to evolve in a biological sense)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 鳥類係由恐龍演化而成。
examples.jyutping: niu5 leoi6 hai6 jau4 hung2 lung4 jin2 faa3 ji4 sing4.
examples.translation: Birds are evolved from dinosaurs.

senses.definition: 未經證實、未有根據嘅消息 (rumour; hearsay; hoax)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hing1 seon3 jiu4 cyun4
examples.translation: to give credence to rumours

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
社會經驗不足，有好多#人情世故 都未知 (unsophisticated; inexperienced; naive)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 sip3 sai3 mei6 sam1, m4 hou2 gwaai3 keoi5.
examples.translation: He is very unsophisticated, so don't blame him.

senses.definition: 用嚟調節沖涼房温度、濕度同通風嘅裝置 (thermo ventilator)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 裝咗浴室寶之後，個沖涼房冬暖夏涼。
examples.jyutping: zong1 zo2 juk6 sat1 bou2 zi1 hau6, go3 cung1 loeng4 fong2 dung1 lyun5 haa6 loeng4.
examples.translation: After having the thermo ventilator, the bathroom is cool in summer and warm in winter.

senses.definition: 將兩件事分開嚟講或者分開嚟處理 (to treat two things separately; to argue that two things should be treated separately; literally: one sum belongs to one sum)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 嗱，你一筆還一筆，貪污還貪污，外遇還外遇，唔好將兩樣嘢撈埋嚟講。
examples.jyutping: naa4, nei5 jat1 bat1 waan4 jat1 bat1, taam1 wu1 waan4 taam1 wu1, ngoi6 jyu6 waan4 ngoi6 jyu6, m4 hou2 zoeng1 loeng5 joeng6 je5 lou1 maai4 lai4 gong2.
examples.translation: Hey one thing after another, corruption is one thing, and affair is another, don't mix them up.

senses.definition: 佢；嗰個人 (he; she; that person)
senses.label: 代詞

examples.jyutping: so2 wai6 ji1 jan4, zoi6 seoi2 jat1 fong1.
examples.translation: The person I am seeking for, is over that side of the river.

senses.definition: 高興；開心而且放鬆 (happy; pleased; delightful)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 老師會盡量畀學生空間，等佢哋可以喺愉快嘅氣氛下學習。
examples.jyutping: lou5 si1 wui5 zeon6 loeng6 bei2 hok6 saang1 hung1 gaan1, dang2 keoi5 dei6 ho2 ji5 hai2 jyu6 faai3 ge3 hei3 fan1 haa6 hok6 zaap6.
examples.translation: Teachers will give their students as much room as they can, so they can learn in a relaxing and lifting atmosphere.

senses.definition: 喺正規語體表示#超過 ((formal) to exceed; to go beyond)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jyu6 si4 bat1 hau6
examples.translation: latecomers will not be entertained

senses.definition: 荒淫奢侈 (promiscuous and extravagant)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 紂王係一個中國歷史上出名淫靡嘅皇帝。
examples.jyutping: zau6 wong4 hai6 jat1 go3 zung1 gwok3 lik6 si2 soeng6 ceot1 meng2 jam4 mei5 ge3 wong4 dai3.
examples.translation: King Zhou is renowned as a promiscuous and extravagant king in Chinese history.

senses.definition: 形容一個行為或者一件事發生得好唔頻密，比#經常 低，比#冇幾何 多 (sometimes; occasionally)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 我嘅心情有時好，有時差。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ge3 sam1 cing4 jau5 si4 hou2, jau5 si4 caa1.
examples.translation: My mood is sometimes good, sometimes bad.

senses.definition: 用比較冇咁強硬嘅語氣去講一啲道理 (used to proclaim a statement less assertively)

examples.text: 有時啲嘢唔係咁容易返到轉頭。
examples.jyutping: jau5 si4 di1 je5 m4 hai6 gam3 jung4 ji6 faan1 dou3 zyun3 tau4
examples.translation: Sometimes, it's not easy to backtrack once something has happened.

senses.definition: 形容一個行為或者一件事發生得好唔頻密，比#經常 低，比#冇幾何 多 (sometimes; occasionally)
senses.label: 副詞

senses.definition: 承認自己犯錯 (to admit one's fault; to acknowledge one's mistake)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zou6 co3 si6 jiu3 jing6 co3.
examples.translation: You have to admit the mistakes that you have made.

senses.definition: 錯誤咁識別一個人或者事物 (to wrongly recognise someone or something)

examples.jyutping: deoi3 m4 zyu6, ngo5 jing6 co3 jan4 laa3.
examples.translation: Sorry, I mistook you for someone else.

senses.definition: 憂慮國事同民眾疾苦 (to worry about national affairs and to be concerned about the people's sufferings)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 當時憂國憂民嘅知識份子都希望揾到救國良方。
examples.jyutping: dong1 si4 jau1 gwok3 jau1 man4 ge3 zi1 sik1 fan6 zi2 dou1 hei1 mong6 wan2 dou2 gau3 gwok3 loeng4 fong1.
examples.translation: At that time, the intellectuals worrying about national affairs and people's sufferings hoped to find a solution to save the country.

senses.definition: #人間 嘅世情 (humanly ways; worldly affairs)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jan4 cing4 laang5 nyun5
examples.translation: the fickleness of human nature

senses.definition: #情面；念在雙方交情而幫手做一啲事 (deed performed in light of existing friendly terms between both parties; favour)

examples.jyutping: luk1 jan4 cing4 kaat1
examples.translation: to ask a friend for a favour

senses.definition: 禮金，特別指結婚送畀新人嘅禮金（量詞：份） (present in the form of cash, usually for a wedding)

examples.jyutping: zou6 jan4 cing4
examples.translation: to give money as a wedding gift

senses.definition: 令原本係一個地方嘅嘢去咗另一個地方嘅動作 (to move; to remove; to shift)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ji4 man4
examples.translation: migration

senses.definition: 將事物分類而成嘅不同類別 (model; type; category)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hyut3 jing4
examples.translation: blood type

senses.definition: 形容所有煩惱、麻煩都解決晒，令人鬆返口氣 (everything is finally solved; all bad things have gone; feeling relieved; literally: the sky finally brightens up)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 終於傾得成，今次一天都光晒喇。
examples.jyutping: zung1 jyu1 king1 dak1 seng4, gam1 ci3 jat1 tin1 dou1 gwong1 saai3 laa3.
examples.translation: I have finally closed the deal. Everything is going to be alright now.

senses.definition: 用嚟裝#衫 嘅箱形傢俬（量詞：個） (wardrobe; closet)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我老闆每日返工都着唔同衫，睇嚟個衣櫃都有我間屋咁大。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 lou5 baan2 mui5 jat6 faan1 gung1 dou1 zoek3 m4 tung4 saam1, tai2 lai4 go3 ji1 gwai6 dou1 jau5 ngo5 gaan1 uk1 gam3 daai6.
examples.translation: My boss never wears the same outfit to work. Her wardrobe must be the size of my flat.

senses.definition: 靜靜雞噉；側偷地噉；逐啲逐啲；多數係做啲唔見得光嘅嘢 (discreetly and slowly; usually regarding something that cannot be made known)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 陰啲陰啲噉就呃晒阿婆啲棺材本！
examples.jyutping: jam1 di1 jam1 di1 gam2 zau6 ngaak1 saai3 aa3 po4 di1 gun1 coi4 bun2!
examples.translation: Grandma’s entire life savings are defrauded bit by bit.

senses.definition: 單獨一個人或者一樣嘢 (alone)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: saam1 cin1 cung2 oi3 zoi6 jat1 san1
examples.translation: beloved thousandfold

senses.definition: 全身以至覆蓋喺身上面嘅嘢 (one's body and even coverings)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 san1 dou1 hai6 man4 san1.
examples.translation: Tattoos are all over his body.

senses.definition: 一個人嘅特質 (one's properties)

examples.jyutping: jat1 san1 cung1 ging3
examples.translation: full of spirit

senses.definition: 喺短時間內連續密集發生 (frequent and successive)
senses.label: 數詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 lin4 cyun3 coeng1 seng1
examples.translation: frequent gunshots

senses.definition: 係耳仔側邊細細聲講嘢 (whisper in ear)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 嗰兩條友匿埋喺度耳語，唔知有乜嘢陰謀。
examples.jyutping: go2 loeng5 tiu4 jau2 nei1 maai4 hai2 dou6 ji5 jyu5, m4 zi1 jau5 mat1 je5 jam1 mau4.
examples.translation: Those two guys are whispering to each other at the back. They might be planning something.

senses.definition: 向第三方介紹並且推舉有交情嘅人（同#推薦 有分別，通常易啲承擔後果） (to recommend and endorse somebody)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 之前你引薦嗰個人乜都唔識嘅！
examples.jyutping: zi1 cin4 nei5 jan5 zin3 go2 go3 jan2 mat1 dou1 m4 sik1 ge2!
examples.translation: The guy you recommend knows nothing at all.

senses.definition: 嚴格#禁止，通常用喺#警告 標語度 (to strictly prohibit; to strictly forbid; commonly used in warning signage)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jim4 gam3 noi6 zeon3
examples.translation: Unauthorised entry is strictly prohibited.

senses.definition: 香港嘅兒童節係四月四號，而國際兒童節係六月一號。兒童節唔係香港嘅法定假期。家長通常會喺呢日送禮物俾小朋友。 (Children's Day)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 兒童節係小朋友最鍾意嘅節日。
examples.jyutping: ji4 tung4 zit3 hai6 siu2 pang4 jau5 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 ge3 zit3 jat6.
examples.translation: Children's day is the favourite festival of children.

senses.definition: 唔當做一回事；唔會看待成好重要嘅嘢 (to take something easily; literally: to dismiss something with a laugh)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢好有自信，對於其他人嘅批評只會一笑置之。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hou2 jau5 zi6 seon3, deoi3 jyu1 kei4 taa1 jan4 ge3 pai1 ping4 zi2 wui5 jat1 siu3 zi3 zi1.
examples.translation: He is so confident that he takes all others' comments easily.

phonetic.original: jau5 si2 ji5 loi4:jau5 si2 ji5 lai4:jau5 si2 ji5 lei4

senses.definition: 有紀錄以嚟；由一開始到而家 (throughout history; from the very beginning)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 嗰次係人類有史以來第一次踏足月球。
examples.jyutping: go2 ci3 hai6 jan4 leoi6 ji5 loi4 dai6 jat1 ci3 daap6 zuk1 jyut6 kau4.
examples.translation: That was the first time for humans to land on the moon throughout history.

keywords: jau5 si2 ji5 loi4:jau5 si2 ji5 lai4:jau5 si2 ji5 lei4

senses.definition: 唔屬於該地方嘅物體 (foreign matter)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 點解我碟飯裏面有啲異物嘅？
examples.jyutping: dim2 gaai2 ngo5 dip6 faan6 leoi5 min6 jau5 di1 ji6 mat6 ge2?
examples.translation: Why is some foreign matter in my food?

senses.definition: 認購、認領 (to sign up for purchase, to claim ownership)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 獨立屋一直都比較少有，所以每次一有新盤推出，好快就會有人認頭。
examples.jyutping: duk6 laap6 uk1 jat1 zik6 dou1 bei2 gaau3 siu2 jau5, so2 ji5 mui5 ci3 jat1 jau5 san1 pun2 teoi1 ceot1, hou2 faai3 zau6 jau5 jan4 jing6 tau4.
examples.translation: Stand alone houses are rare (in Hong Kong). So, whenever a developer offers these for sale, they are sold out quickly.

senses.definition: 承認責任、承擔責任 (to claim one's responsibility; to accept responsibility)

examples.text: 呢次恐怖襲擊冇組織認頭。
examples.jyutping: ni1 ci3 hung2 bou3 zaap6 gik1 mou5 zou2 zik1 jing6 tau4.
examples.translation: No terrorists claimed their responsibility on this assault.

senses.definition: 字面解即係一跌倒就起唔返身。引伸做遇到一次挫折之後就唔振作、唔興旺、頹廢。 (Become devastated and slump after experiencing a setback.（Literally, it means once a fall, somebody could not pick back up.）)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 自從個神射手轉會之後，成隊波就一蹶不振，成年都無拎過冠軍。
examples.jyutping: zi6 cung4 go3 san4 se6 sau2 zyun3 wui2 zi1 hau6, seng4 deoi6 bo1 zau6 jat1 kyut3 bat1 zan3, sing4 nin4 dou1 mou4 ling1 gwo3 gun3 gwan1.
examples.translation: Once the top scorer transferred to another football club, the whole team was devastated and they did not get any champion in the whole year.

senses.definition: 適合某節日 (appropriate for a particular festival)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 每逢過中秋，我都會食月餅應節。
examples.jyutping: mui5 fung4 gwo3 zung1 cau1, ngo5 dou1 wui3 sik6 jyut6 beng2 jing3 zit3.
examples.translation: Every Mid-Autumn Festival, I eat mooncake to celebrate.

senses.definition: #意識 中#領會 到（某啲冇明文講嘅嘢）。 (to realise (usually something implicit).)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我意會到佢有啲唔#開心。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ji3 wui6 dou2 keoi5 jau5 di1 m4 hoi1 sam1.
examples.translation: I realised that she was a bit unhappy.

senses.definition: 望向遠方；放眼望過去 (to look afar)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 每一個夜晚，我將會遠望，無涯星海，點點星光。
examples.jyutping: mui5 jat1 go3 je5 maan6, ngo5 zoeng1 wui5 jyun5 mong6, mou4 ngaai4 sing1 hoi2, dim2 dim2 sing1 gwong1.
examples.translation: Every night I will look at the boundless sea of scattered stars shining afar.

senses.definition: 畀指示人，做帶領嘅工作 (to guide; to lead)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 老師一步一步引導學生思考人生。
examples.jyutping: lou5 si1 jat1 bou6 jat1 bou6 jan5 dou6 hok6 saang1 si1 haau2 jan4 sang1.
examples.translation: The students think about life following the teacher's guidance step-by-step.

senses.definition: 控制流體、能量嘅流動方向 (to steer the flow of fluid, energy)

examples.jyutping: din6 lau4 jan5 dou6 hai6 jat1 mun4 hok6 man6.
examples.translation: There is a lot to learn in steering current.

senses.definition: 帶自己準備嘅食物，去露天户外有景色嘅地方食，作為休憩活動（量詞：次） (picnic)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋今個星期六去野餐啦！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 gam1 go3 sing1 kei4 luk6 heoi3 je5 caan1 laa1!
examples.translation: Let's go picnic this Saturday!

senses.definition: 兩個人或以上，預先安排嘅見面，多數係情侶之間；#拍拖 ((of people) date; appointment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好緊張啊，聽日同佢有個約會啊！
examples.jyutping: hou2 gan2 zoeng1 aa3, ting1 jat6 tung4 keoi5 jau5 go3 joek3 wui6 aa3!
examples.translation: I'm going on a date with him tomorrow. I'm so nervous now!

senses.definition: 兩個人或以上，預先安排見面，多數係情侶之間；#拍拖 (to date)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 好緊張啊，聽日要同佢約會喇！
examples.jyutping: hou2 gan2 zoeng1 aa3, ting1 jat6 jiu3 tung4 keoi5 joek3 wui6 laa3!
examples.translation: I'm going on a date with him tomorrow. I'm so nervous now!

senses.definition: 一種人造嘅太空飛行器，喺太空度圍繞地球或者其他星體運行（量詞：個／粒） (man-made satellite)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 人造衞星喺太空度搜集數據。
examples.jyutping: jan4 zou6 wai6 sing1 hai2 taai3 hung1 dou6 sau2 zaap6 zing3 geoi3.
examples.translation: The satellite collects data in the space.

senses.definition: 即時可以拎出嚟嘅#現金 (cash; ready money (to make a payment, etc.))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 zing6 hai6 sau1 jin6 cin2.
examples.translation: We accept cash only.

senses.definition: 唔同世間其他人爭執，迴避世間嘅紛爭 (to stand aloof from worldly affairs, particularly conflicts)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢份人與世無爭，唔理辦公室政治。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan6 jan4 jyu5 sai3 mou4 zang1, m4 lei5 baan6 gung1 sat1 zing5 zi6.
examples.translation: She stands aloof from conflicts and cares nothing about workplace politics.

senses.definition: 一個接一個，中間冇#間斷，通常講#時間。 (successive)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 今次呢個展覽一連十日開放。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 nei1 go3 zin2 laam5 jat1 lin4 sap6 jat6 hoi1 fong3.
examples.translation: This exhibition will remain open for 10 successive days.

senses.definition: 將液體（例如水、湯、酒）經過口，倒落喉嚨 (to drink something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我好頸渴啊，去飲啲嘢先！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 geng2 hot3 aa3, heoi3 jam2 di1 je5 sin1!
examples.translation: I am so thirsty, let me get something to drink.

senses.definition: 去酒吧飲酒 (to have a drink in bar)

examples.text: 我放工同咗同事去飲嘢，所以遲咗返嚟。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 fong2 gung1 tung4 zo2 tung4 si6 heoi3 jam2 je5, so2 ji5 ci4 zo2 faan1 lai4.
examples.translation: I had a drink with my colleague after leaving the company, so I went home late.

senses.definition: 用嚟顯示某啲嘢嘅#數值 嘅儀器（量詞：個） (instrument or meter, as in, a tool that displays values of relevant variables for the purpose of aiding human operation of a machine.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 機師一定要隨時留意住架#飛機 儀表板顯示嘅數據。
examples.jyutping: gei1 si1 jat1 ding6 jiu3 ceoi4 si4 lau4 ji3 zyu6 gaa3 fei1 gei1 ji4 biu1 baan2 hin2 si6 ge3 sou3 geoi3.
examples.translation: The pilot must keep an eye on the data shown by flight instruments.

senses.definition: 細力，僅僅足夠嘅力 (just enough force)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你要用陰力撳，先唔會整壞部機㗎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jiu3 jung6 jam1 lik6 gam3, sin1 m4 wui5 zing2 waai6 bou6 gei1 gaa3.
examples.translation: You have to apply just enough force so that the machine won't break.

senses.definition: 插手，參加一啲唔關你事嘅嘢 (to dabble in something that is none of one's business)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢間重工業集團今季無端端染指於娛樂事業，真係令人拗晒頭。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 cung5 gung1 jip6 zaap6 tyun4 gam1 gwai3 mou4 dyun1 dyun1 jim5 zi2 jyu1 jyu4 lok6 si6 jip6, zan1 hai6 ling6 jan4 aau1 saai3 tau4.
examples.translation: It is puzzling how this heavy industry corp. started to dabble in the entertainment industry this year.

phonetic.original: jau4 jyu4 bat1 kyut3:jau4 ji4 bat1 kyut3:jau4 jyu6 bat1 kyut3

senses.definition: 揸唔定主意、落唔到決定 (to hesitate; unable to make up one's mind)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你唔好咁猶豫不決啦，快啲揀完就走。
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 gam3 jau4 jyu6 bat1 kyut3 laa1, faai3 di1 gaan2 jyun4 zau6 zau2.
examples.translation: Stop hesitating! Just pick one then go.

keywords: jau4 jyu4 bat1 kyut3:jau4 ji4 bat1 kyut3:jau4 jyu6 bat1 kyut3

senses.definition: 用嚟製造其他產品嘅物質（量詞：種） (raw material)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 小麥係一種原料，麪粉就唔係喇。
examples.jyutping: siu2 mak6 hai6 jat1 zung2 jyun4 liu2, min6 fan2 zau6 m4 hai4 laa3.
examples.translation: Wheat is a kind of raw material, but flour is not.

senses.definition: 證明持有人有權進入某個場所參加活動嘅紙張（量詞：張） (admission ticket)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢張入場券可以俾你一日內無限次進出場館。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zoeng1 jap6 coeng4 gyun3 ho2 ji5 bei2 nei5 jat1 jat6 noi6 mou4 haan6 ci3 zeon3 ceot1 coeng4 gun2.
examples.translation: This ticket allows you unlimited entries for a day.

senses.definition: （引申義）加入某個團體或進入某個階層、領域嘅基本資格（量詞：張） (privilege or qualification to access a group, social level, or professional field)

examples.text: 而家人人都有大學學位，張沙紙只係揾工嘅入場券嚟咋。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 jan4 jan4 dou1 jau5 daai6 hok6 hok6 wai2, zoeng1 saa1 zi2 zi2 hai6 wan2 gung1 ge3 jap6 coeng4 gyun3 lai4 zaa3.
examples.translation: Everybody has an academic degree nowadays. A certificate is nothing more than an admission ticket for employment opportunities.

senses.definition: 喺 #議會 提出，俾其他成員投票表決嘅提議（量詞：份／項） (proposal; motion; bill; usually used in legislative or parliamentary contexts)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tai4 ceot1 ji5 on3
examples.translation: to put forward a motion

senses.definition: 形容一段長時間 (a long period of time)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢一年到晚都喺度畫畫。
examples.translation: He's been drawing here for ages.

senses.definition: 食煙嘅時候，支煙同個吸煙者釋放出嚟嘅有害氣體 (environmental tobacco smoke; literally: second-hand cigarette (smoke))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 最憎人食煙，啲二手煙好臭。
examples.jyutping: zeoi3 zang1 jan4 sik6 jin1, di1 ji6 sau2 jin1 hou2 cau3.
examples.translation: I hate people smoking. The second-hand smoke is intolerable.

senses.definition: #野外#生長 嘅，強調唔係人養、人種 (wild; undomesticated)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: je5 saang1 jan4 sam1
examples.translation: wild ginseng

senses.definition: 原本固定喺某啲場合出現嘅人物，突然喺意料之外嘅地方出現 (to describe people who usually on stage appear in somewhere unexpectedly)

examples.text: 我喺條街度捕獲咗野生發哥啊！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hai2 tiu4 gaai1 dou6 bou6 wok6 zo2 je5 sang1 faat3 go1 aa3!
examples.translation: I saw Chow Yun Fat on the street!

senses.definition: 加入一間公司或者組織並且成為主人 (to join and become the owner of a certain company or organisation)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢宣佈入主之後，呢間公司嘅股價就升咗五成。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 syun1 bou3 jap6 zyu2 zi1 hau6, ni1 gaan1 gung1 si1 ge3 gu2 gaa3 zau6 sing1 zo2 ng5 sing3.
examples.translation: After he announced to join and become the owner of this company, the stock price has increased by 50%.

phonetic.original: jyun4 ngaai4 lak6 maa5:jyun4 ngaai4 laak6 maa5

senses.definition: 喺情況急轉直下之前，及時停止 (to pull back before it is too late; literally: to stop the horse at the brink of a precipice by pulling its reint)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔好再繼續打劫喇，賺夠喇，懸崖勒馬啦。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 zoi3 gai3 zuk6 daa2 gip3 laa3, zaan6 gau3 laa3, jyun4 ngaai4 lak6 maa5 laa1.
examples.translation: It's time for you to stop robbing before it's too late. You've earned enough.

keywords: jyun4 ngaai4 lak6 maa5:jyun4 ngaai4 laak6 maa5

senses.definition: 原本嘅外表 (original appearance; original state)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 經過修復，間大屋終於恢復原貌。
examples.jyutping: ging1 gwo3 sau1 fuk6, gaan1 daai6 uk1 zung1 jyu1 fui1 fuk6 jyun4 maau6.
examples.translation: After the renovation, the building returns to its original state finally.

senses.definition: 件事嘅真相 (truth)

examples.text: 個偵探慢慢還原返事件嘅原貌。
examples.jyutping: go3 zing1 taam3 maan6 maan2 waan4 jyun4 faan1 si6 gin6 ge3 jyun4 maau6.
examples.translation: The detective discovers the truth gradually.

senses.definition: 透過某啲渠道去#認識、#理解 一啲複雜嘅事物、概念 (to comprehend; to grasp)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 人透過各種感官去認知呢個世界。
examples.jyutping: jan4 tau3 gwo3 gok3 zung2 gam2 gun1 heoi3 jing6 zi1 ni1 go3 sai3 gaai3.
examples.translation: Humans use different senses to understand the world.

senses.definition: 有發言權、有影響力 (to have a say; to have authority)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 青年人要有say，始終落手落腳投票最實際。
examples.jyutping: cing1 nin4 jan4 jiu3 jau5 sei1, ci2 zung1 lok6 sau2 lok6 goek3 tau4 piu3 zeoi3 sat6 zai3
examples.translation: For young people to have a say, it is most practical for them to personally cast their votes.

senses.definition: 兩樣嘢，響現實或者抽象咁，相隔一段好#長 嘅#距離 (far; far away)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 dou6 heoi3 saa1 tin4 dou1 hou2 jyun5 wo3!
examples.translation: It is quite far to go to Shatin from here.

senses.definition: 相隔一段好長嘅#時間 (for a long time)

examples.text: 嗰份報告咁遠，仲有成個星期先交，搞掂咗呢份先啦！
examples.jyutping: go2 fan6 bou3 gou3 gam3 jyun5, zung6 jau5 seng4 go3 sing1 kei4 sin1 gaau1, gaau2 dim6 zo2 ni1 fan6 sin1 laa1!
examples.translation: That report's far off—we still have nearly a week to deliver it. Why don't we focus on this one first?

senses.definition: 好似寫「一」字咁簡單 (extremely simple; as easy as ABC; literally: as easy as the character "one")
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 條問題有幾難啫？一字咁淺啦。
examples.jyutping: tiu4 man6 tai4 jau5 gei2 naan4 ze1? jat1 zi6 gam3 cin2 laa1.
examples.translation: How hard is the question? It's as easy as ABC.

senses.definition: 指交易、生意有得賺，或者有好處 (profitable; beneficial)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 pun4 saang1 ji3  jau5 sou3 wai4.
examples.translation: This business is profitable.

senses.definition: #收埋；#掩飾 (to hide; to conceal; to cover up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jan2 cong4 dong2 on3
examples.translation: hidden (computer) file

senses.definition: 喺香港，如果唔想打出電話有#來電顯示，可以先打「133」隱藏自己電話號碼；亦可以指無來電顯示嘅電話 (In Hong Kong, the caller can prevent the callee seeing the caller's phone number by first dialing 133; it also refers to calls without caller ID)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 尋晚又有人打133過嚟叫我起身屙夜尿，都唔知邊個咁無聊！
examples.jyutping: cam4 maan5 jau6 jau5 jan4 daa2 jat1 saam1 saam1 gwo3 lai4 giu3 ngo5 hei2 san1 ngo1 je6 niu6, dou1 m4 zi1 bin1 go3 gam3 mou4 liu4
examples.translation: Last night I received an anonymous prank call asking me to take a leak again. That person needs to get a life!

senses.definition: 準備好面對一個危機或者外敵，嚴肅戒備 (to be in the highest level of readiness; to be ready for action)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今次金融風暴，金管局已經嚴陣以待，準備咗八十億外匯。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 gam1 jung4 fung1 bou6, gam1 gun2 guk6 ji5 ging1 jim4 zan6 ji5 doi6, zeon2 bei6 zo2 baat3 sap6 jik1 ngoi6 wui6.
examples.translation: The Hong Kong Monetary Authority has amassed 80 billion USD worth of foreign reserve to stay afloat in this financial tsunami.

senses.definition: 將身處嘅地位交俾其他人接任 (to abdicate; to step down)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: wong4 dai3 zung1 jyu1 joeng6 wai6.
examples.translation: The king has finally abdicated.

senses.definition: 常見嘅書寫工具；筆芯裝住油墨，筆尖有一粒鐵珠塞住開口，寫嘢嗰陣，粒鐵珠會跟住筆尖嘅郁動，轆啲墨落張紙上面（量詞：枝／支） (ballpoint pen; ball pen; biro)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: haak1 sik1 jyun4 zi2 bat1
examples.translation: black ballpoint pen

senses.definition: 一年嘅第一日 (new year's day)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 慶祝元旦最好就係一班朋友出去倒數。
examples.jyutping: hing3 zuk1 jyun4 daan3 zeoi3 hou2 zau6 hai6 jat1 baan1 pang4 jau5 ceot1 heoi3 dou3 sou2.
examples.translation: Participating in the countdown event with friends is the best way to celebrate the new year.

senses.definition: 昆蟲拍翼嘅聲 (the sound of a flying insect flapping its wings)
senses.label: 擬聲詞

examples.text: 小蜜蜂，嗡嗡嗡（廣東話童謠）
examples.jyutping: siu2 mat6 fung1, jung1 jung1 jung1
examples.translation: little bee; buzz buzz buzz (Cantonese nursery rhyme)

senses.definition: 用簡短嘅説話講出重點 (to address the main point with a short phrase; to hit the nail on the head)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢話原因係今日啲家長太緊張啲細路，真係一語中的。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 waa6 jyun4 jan1 hai6 gam1 jat6 di1 gaa1 zoeng2 taai3 gan2 zoeng1 di1 sai3 lou6, zan1 hai6 jat1 jyu5 zung3 dik1.
examples.translation: The reason is that parents nowadays are over-caring their children, he says. That hit the nail on the head.

senses.definition: #英國、#美國 等國嘅主要語言、亦都係好多地方嘅人用嚟溝通嘅共通語，用拉丁字母書寫；喺香港，英文係法定語言，亦都係中小學嘅必修科目 (English language)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 幼稚園教嘅英文越嚟越深，有好多我都唔識讀。
examples.jyutping: jau3 zi6 jyun2 gaau3 ge3 jing1 man2 jyut6 lai4 jyut6 sam1, jau5 hou2 do1 ngo5 dou1 m4 sik1 duk6.
examples.translation: The level of English taught in kindergarten is getting more advanced. I don't know how to pronounce many of the words being taught.

senses.definition: #贏 或者#成功 嘅機會 (the chance to win or succeed; the probability of winning or succeeding)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢場比賽阿輝嘅贏面好高，我哋諗定點同佢慶祝都得喇。
examples.jyutping: nei1 coeng4 bei2 coi3 aa3 fai1 ge3 jeng4 min2 hou2 gou1, ngo5 dei6 nam2 ding6 dim2 tung4 keoi5 hing3 zuk1 dou1 dak1 laa3.
examples.translation: Fai's very likely to win this competition. We can think about how to celebrate for him in advance.

senses.definition: 以一點為中心，離中心距離不變噉運行一周畫成嘅形狀（量詞：個） (circle)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我個數學老師可以喺黑板徒手劃個圓形出嚟。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 go3 sou3 hok6 lou5 si1 ho2 ji5 hai2 haak1 baan2 tou4 sau2 waak6 go3 jyun4 jing4 ceot1 lai4.
examples.translation: My mathematics teacher can draw a perfect circle on a blackboard.

senses.definition: 開設#宴會 招待#客人 (to host a banquet)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: can4 fu2 jin3 haak3
examples.translation: Banquet Hosted by Chan's family (a common format usually used in banquet signage or as the backdrop)

senses.definition: #足球 比賽中，射失#十二碼 ((of soccer) to miss a penalty kick)
照顧一個人或一家人嘅生活；揾錢俾屋企人 (to raise, to rear; to bring home the bacon)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢為咗養活屋企人，一個人返幾份工。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 wai6 zo2 joeng5 wut6 uk1 kei2 jan4, jat1 go3 jan4 faan1 gei2 fan6 gung1.
examples.translation: He works multiple jobs to raise his family.

senses.definition: （比較常用喺負面事件）令事件發生 (to cause; to lead to)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gwo3 cung5 jung4 ji6 jan5 zi3 tong4 niu6 beng6.
examples.translation: Being overweight can easily lead to diabetes.

senses.definition: 開始染有 (to be infected, signifies the initiation of the process of being plagued by)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jim5 soeng5 zat6 beng6
examples.translation: to contract disease

senses.definition: 上癮 (to be addicted (to drugs))

examples.jyutping: keoi5 sap6 ng5 seoi3 zau6 jim5 soeng5 duk6 jan5
examples.translation: By the age of 15, he was addicted to drugs.

senses.definition: 好堅持地去完成一件睇落冇可能完成嘅事，比喻有克服困難嘅毅力同勇氣 (to be persistent in doing sth impossible to be finished)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 雖然呢件事好難做，但係只要我哋有愚公移山嘅精神，一定可以做到。
examples.jyutping: seoi1 jin4 ni1 gin6 si6 hou2 naan4 zou6, daan6 hai6 zi2 jiu3 ngo5 dei6 jau5 jyu4 gung1 ji4 saan1 ge3 zing1 san4, jat1 ding6 ho2 ji5 zou6 dou2.
examples.translation: Although this is very difficult, as long as we are persistent, we can make it.

senses.definition: #用嚟#做；喺比較正式嘅語境用 (to be used for)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢塊地會用作住宅用途。
examples.jyutping: ni1 faai3 dei6 wui5 jung6 zok3 zyu6 zaak2 jung6 tou4.
examples.translation: This land will be used for residential development.

senses.definition: 字面義指一個人做出啲好古怪嘅表情或者動作，或者大聲講嘢，令其他人感到困擾。引申出表達意見，尤其是過度表達意見嘅行為。 (to clench one's teeth or show weird gesture, which implies speaking improperly or with exaggerating manner.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 觀棋不語真君子，旁觀者不得𪘲牙聳䚗。
examples.jyutping: gun1 kei4 bat1 jyu5 zan1 gwan1 zi2, pong4 gun1 ze2 bat1 dak1 ji1 ngaa4 sung1 gong3.
examples.translation: Gentlemen observe the chess match with respectful silence. Spectators are not allowed to disturb the competitors.

senses.definition: 基於婚姻關係而產生嘅親屬關係，好似配偶嘅親人、親人嘅配偶嘅親人 (kinship, the relationship exists as a result of sb's marriage; in-law)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你個仔同我個女結婚，咁我地兩家人咪係姻親囉。
examples.jyutping: nei5 go3 zai2 tung4 ngo5 go3 neoi5 git3 fan1, gam2 ngo5 dei6 loeng5 gaa1 jan4 mai5 hai6 jan1 can1 lo1.
examples.translation: If your son and my daughter get married, yours and my family will be of kinship.

senses.definition: 如果唔係嘅話 (if not)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 你最好快啲俾錢，如果唔係你就同你個女天人相隔。
examples.jyutping: nei5 zeoi3 hou2 faai3 di1 bei2 cin2, jyu4 gwo2 m4 hai6 nei5 zau6 tung4 nei5 go3 neoi2 tin1 jan4 soeng1 gaak3.
examples.translation: You better hand me the money now, or you will be telling your daughter your last words.

senses.definition: #誣衊 一個冇做錯嘅人 (to wrong; to falsely accuse someone (of wrongdoing); to wrongly blame)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我冇做過，你唔好冤枉我啊！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 mou5 zou6 gwo3, nei5 m4 hou2 jyun1 wong2 ngo5 aa3!
examples.translation: I haven't done anything. Don't make false accusations against me!

senses.definition: （唔正式）形容一個活動#過癮，令人#開心。 ((Informal) amusing, usually used to describe an activity.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 尋晚我買咗隻新 #game，好有癮！
examples.jyutping: cam4 maan5 ngo5 maai5 zo2 zek3 san1 gem1, hou2 jau5 jan5.
examples.translation: Last night I bought a new game. It's fun!

senses.definition: 知道某啲事情有機會發生 (expected to)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: nei5 heoi3 dak1 zau6 jyu6 zo2 laa1.
examples.translation: You've already made a reservation for going there.

senses.definition: 爬蟲類動物，一種小型#蜥蜴 嘅通稱（量詞：隻／條） (gecko)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 隻檐蛇響天花板上邊爬嚟爬去，真係睇到我心都煩。
examples.jyutping: zek3 jim4 se2 hoeng2 tin1 faa1 baan2 soeng6 bin1 paa4 lei4 paa4 heoi3, zan1 hai6 tai2 dou3 ngo5 sam1 dou1 faan4.
examples.translation: That gecko gleefully dashing across the ceiling annoys me.

senses.definition: 好#熱 嘅#夏天（量詞：個） (hot summer)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 喺呢個炎夏，食番支雪糕就最啱喇。
examples.jyutping: hai2 ni1 go3 jim4 haa6, sik6 faan1 zi1 syut3 gou1 zau6 zeoi3 ngaam1 laa3.
examples.translation: Eating ice-cream is the best we can do in such a hot summer.

senses.definition: 剩係執着喺一樣嘢 (persistently; doggedly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢一味掛住做嘢，連飯都唔記得食。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 mei2 gwaa3 zyu6 zou6 je5, lin4 faan6 dou1 m4 gei3 dak1 sik6
examples.translation: He was working non-stop and forgot to eat.

senses.definition: 虐待致死，或殘忍咁殺害 (to abuse to death; to kill cruelly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 嗰個人虐殺咗幾隻貓，簡直變態！
examples.jyutping: go2 go3 jan2 joek6 saat3 zo2 gei2 zek3 maau1, gaan2 zik6 bin3 taai3!
examples.translation: That man has abused a few cats to death. What a psycho!

senses.definition: 道路上以斜線劃分嘅範圍；通常出現喺分叉位或匯合處，一般情況禁止車輛駛入 (hatched road markings)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jing2 sin3 faan6 wai4
examples.translation: hatched area

senses.definition: 起稿；起草 (to draft; to draw up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ji5 jat1 fan6 man4 gin2
examples.translation: to draft a document

senses.definition: 打算 (to plan)

examples.text: 政府擬於西貢建堆填區。
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 ji5 jyu1 sai1 gung3 gin3 deoi1 tin4 keoi1.
examples.translation: The government plans to develop a landfill in Sai Kung.

senses.definition: 為罪行負上責任 ((in trials) to be guilty)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 陪審團一致裁定佢有罪。
examples.jyutping: pui4 sam2 tyun4 jat1 zi3 coi4 ding6 keoi5 jau5 zeoi6.
examples.translation: The jury returned a unanimous verdict of guilty.

senses.definition: 形容人#木獨、反應遲鈍，#戇居居 咁 ((of a person) slow-witted; unresponsive; literally: a lump of wood)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 人哋問佢問題，佢就一嚿木咁坐咗喺度。
examples.jyutping: jan4 dei6 man6 keoi5 man6 tai4, keoi5 zau6 jat1 gau6 muk6 gam2 co5 zo2 hai2 dou6.
examples.translation: Instead of answering questions, he just sat there like a moron.

senses.definition: 形容左右搖曳，晃動不定嘅樣 (shaky; faltering; not able to stand still)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢行路搖搖晃晃噉，係咪飲醉咗？
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hang4 lou6 jiu4 jiu4 fong2 fong2 gam2, hai6 mai6 jam2 zeoi3 zo2?
examples.translation: He is staggering, is he drunk?

senses.definition: 同性有關嘅笑話；鹹濕笑話（量詞：個／段） (joke about sex; "fruity talk")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿偉啲同事都唔想聽佢啲有味笑話。
examples.jyutping: aa3 wai5 di1 tung4 si6 dou1 m4 soeng2 teng1 keoi5 di1 jau5 mei6 siu3 waa6.
examples.translation: All Wai's colleagues don't want to listen to his sex jokes.

senses.definition: 喺一條路線上面 (catchment area)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 鐵路沿線嘅風景都好靚。
examples.jyutping: tit3 lou6 jyun4 sin3 ge3 fung1 ging2 dou1 hou2 leng3.
examples.translation: You can enjoy the picturesque scenery along the ride on the train.

senses.definition: 透過郵寄或者互聯網#買嘢，而貨物亦以郵寄形式送到 (mail-order; a way of buying goods in which you choose what you want and it is sent to you by mail)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我前幾日郵購咗啲雜誌。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 cin4 gei2 jat6 jau4 kau3 zo2 di1 zaap6 zi3.
examples.translation: I ordered some magazines by mail a few days ago.

senses.definition: 喺協議書上面簽名確認購買，多數係#股票 或者#債券 (to subscribe, esp. stocks and bonds)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jing6 kau3 gu2 piu3
examples.translation: to subscribe stocks

senses.definition: 親生或者領養返嚟嘅女，而且年紀好細 (a young daughter)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 嗰個禽獸冇人性㗎，連自己幼女都搞！
examples.jyutping: go2 go3 kam4 sau3 mou5 jan4 sing3 gaa3, lin4 zi6 gei2 jau3 neoi2 dou1 gaau2!
examples.translation: He even harassed his own young daughter. What a bastard!

senses.definition: 泛指人嘅形象或者能力差 (to describe a negative image or poor ability)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你咁擪我哋公司好難請你。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam3 jaap3 ngo5 dei6 gung1 si1 hou2 naan4 ceng2 nei5.
examples.translation: You are too sloppy for our company to hire you.

senses.definition: 形容物品品質惡劣 ((of products) poor quality)

examples.text: 部電視咁擪嘅，半年就壞一次。
examples.jyutping: bou6 din6 si6 gam3 jaap3 ge2, bun3 nin4 zau6 waai6 jat1 ci3.
examples.translation: The quality of our television is poor.  It doesn't work every half year.

senses.definition: 令人覺得唔啱聽於是刻意唔理嘅説話 (gibberish; meaningless words or message; nonsense; wind by the ear)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你當我講嘅嘢係耳邊風？
examples.jyutping: nei5 dong3 ngo5 gong2 ge3 je5 hai6 ji5 bin1 fung1?
examples.translation: You think what I have told you is gibberish, don't you?

senses.definition: 提前購買或預訂商品或服務 (to preorder or pre-purchase goods or services in advance)
senses.label: 動詞

phonetic.original: jan4 hau2 git3 kau3:jan4 hau2 git3 gau3

senses.definition: 一個地方嘅人口按年齡、性別、職業、教育程度等條件嘅分佈情況 (population structure; the distribution of a population in a region or country, including age, gender, occupation, education level, etc.)
senses.label: 名詞

keywords: jan4 hau2 git3 kau3:jan4 hau2 git3 gau3

senses.definition: 攻擊並且侵佔 (to invade; to intrude)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 如果你休息唔夠，病菌就好易入侵身體。
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 nei5 jau1 sik1 m4 gau3, beng6 kwan2 zau6 hou2 ji6 jap6 cam1 san1 tai2.
examples.translation: If you don't have enough rest, germs can easily invade your body.

senses.definition: 一種中式#鬼節；傳説喺農曆七月，鬼門關大開，鬼魂可以嚟到人間，啲人會喺路邊焚燒紙錢 #香燭，用嚟超渡遊魂，農曆七月十四日係正日所以訂為節日。 (Ghost Festival, also known as Hungry Ghost Festival; held on the 14th day of the 7th lunar month. According to folklore, the door to the underworld opens on this day and all the "hungry ghosts" come out to roam the world of the living. Joss paper is burnt and offerings are made for the deliverance of the ghosts.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 盂蘭節就嚟到喇，夜晚唔好成日出街。
examples.jyutping: jyu4 laan4 zit3 zau6 lai4 dou3 laa3, je6 maan5 m4 hou2 seng4 jat6 ceot1 gaai1.
examples.translation: Hungry Ghost Festival is nigh; don't go out so often at night.

senses.definition: #活動；#移動 (to move)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔好淨係坐係個位度，要起身郁動下。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 zing6 hai6 co5 hai2 go3 wai2 dou6, jiu3 hei2 san1 juk1 dung6 haa5.
examples.translation: Don't stay on your seat for whole day, stand up and move around!

senses.definition: #改動 (to make changes)

examples.text: 份文件做好㗎喇，唔會再有任何郁動。
examples.jyutping: fan6 man4 gin2 zou6 hou2 gaa3 laa3, m4 wui5 zoi3 jau5 jam6 ho4 juk1 dung6.
examples.translation: The paper was done, no changes are needed.

phonetic.original: jiu4 mei5 hat1 lin4:jiu4 mei5 haat1 lin4

senses.definition: 拋棄尊嚴求饒 (to beg for pity; to plead for mercy; literally: to (be like a dog) wagging its tail and fawning)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 要殺就殺，我唔會向敵人搖尾乞憐。

senses.definition: 展現或者感受#幽默 嘅能力 (sense of humour)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 有幽默感嘅人比較受歡迎。
examples.jyutping: jau5 jau1 mak6 gam2 ge3 jan4 bei2 gaau3 sau6 fun1 jing4.
examples.translation: Those with a good sense of humour are more popular.

senses.definition: 一樣嘢可以娛樂大眾嘅程度 (the quality, state or character of being entertaining, amusing and enjoyable)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢套戲娛樂性豐富，值得一睇。
examples.jyutping: ni1 tou3 hei3 jyu4 lok6 sing3 fung1 fu3, zik6 dak1 jat1 tai2.
examples.translation: This film is highly entertaining and worth watching.

senses.definition: 估計嬰兒出生嘅時間 (expected date of delivery)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我預產期係12月24號，我哋仲諗緊改咩名。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jyu6 caan2 kei4 hai6 sap6 ji6 jyut6 ji6 sap6 sei3 hou6, ngo5 dei6 zung6 nam2 gan2 goi2 me1 meng2.
examples.translation: The baby is expected to be born on 24th December. We are still thinking about its name.

senses.definition: #型 ((of appearances, postures, designs) stylish; fashionable; smart; good-looking)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 zan1 hai6 hou2 jing4 gwan3 aa3!
examples.translation: He is really stylish!

senses.definition: 一直以嚟；由某個時候開始就係噉，冇變過 (all along; has always been; consistently)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 lou6 dou1 m4 zung1 ji3 sik6 coi3.
examples.translation: He has never liked vegetables.

senses.definition: 路途上 (all along the way)

examples.text: 呢架小巴一路都冇停站，直去旺角。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaa3 siu2 baa1 jat1 lou6 dou1 mou5 ting4 zaam6, zik6 heoi3 wong6 gok3.
examples.translation: There is no stop for this minibus route all along until it reaches Mongkok.

senses.definition: 要一啲時間去進行，所以要等下 (require time to proceed)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢殺人嘅動機有待調查。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 saat3 jan4 ge3 dung6 gei1 jau5 doi6 diu6 caa4.
examples.translation: Time is needed to investigate motive to murder.

senses.definition: 仲可以更進一步 (further)

examples.text: 呢件武器嘅威力有待加強。
examples.jyutping: nei1 gin6 mou5 hei3 ge3 wai1 lik6 jau5 doi6 gaa1 koeng4.
examples.translation: The weapon's power could be further increased.

senses.definition: 一種道路；繞過舊有嘅道路嘅道路 (bypass road)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gun1 tong4 jiu2 dou6
examples.translation: Kwun Tong Bypass

senses.definition: #食 (to eat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: gau3 zung1 jaak3 faan6 laa3!
examples.translation: It is time to have dinner!

senses.definition: 用手扶住人哋嘅上臂或肩膀 (to grip another person's upper arm or shoulder.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to support

senses.definition: 捲起（衫袖或者褲腳） (to roll up (sleeves or trouser legs))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jip3 jat1 jip3 zek3 zau6 aa1.
examples.translation: Roll up your sleeves.

senses.definition: 估計出嚟或者經過調整，只係接近而唔完全準確嘅數字，通常都係縮短咗而方便講出嚟 (approximation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jyun4 zau1 leot2 ge3 joek3 sou3 hai6 saam1 dim2 jat1 sei3.
examples.translation: Pi is approximately 3.14.

senses.definition: 一連串而且逐漸嘅變化 (to develop; to evolve)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jin2 bin3 sing4 bou6 lik6 si6 gin2
examples.translation: to descend into an outburst

senses.definition: 質感好似#油 (oily)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 將抽象嘅事物或者知識喺現實生活中使用 (to apply; to use (in the real world))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jing3 jung6 sou3 hok6
examples.translation: applied mathematics

senses.definition: 大學術語，指校內學生組織現屆幹事 (committee member of the current session of a university-based student organization, a university jargon)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 聽講學生報現莊啲莊員做嘢好多甩漏喎，你嚟緊同佢哋合作要小心啲喇。
examples.jyutping: teng1 gong2 hok6 saang1 bou3 jin6 zong1 di1 zong1 jyun4 zou6 je5 hou2 do1 lat1 lau6 wo3, nei5 lai4 gan2 tung4 keoi5 dei6 hap6 zok3 jiu3 siu2 sam1 di1 laa3.
examples.translation: It's heard that the committee members in charge of the students' publication often make mistakes. You'd better pay more attention when cooperating with them.

senses.definition: 成為一個國家嘅公民 (to become a citizen of a country; to naturalise)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 雖然佢喺呢個國家住咗十年，但係佢唔想入籍。
examples.jyutping: seoi1 jin4 keoi5 hai2 ni1 go3 gwok3 gaa1 zyu6 zo2 sap6 nin4, daan6 hai6 keoi5 m4 soeng2 jap6 zik6.
examples.translation: Although he has been living in this country for 10 years, he does not want to naturalise.

senses.definition: #適合 (suitable; appropriate)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: sik1 ji4
examples.translation: suitable; fit

senses.definition: 強勁有力氣。 (strong)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 有財力或權威勢力 (powerful)
#如果 (if)
senses.label: 連詞

senses.definition: #好似 (as if; be like)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: pong4 joek6 mou4 jan4
examples.translation: to act as if nobody was around

senses.definition: #月入 達到一百萬（一#球）嘅人 (person who makes a million dollars a month)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 由私人執業嘅#醫生 營運，專做#門診 嘅小型醫療設施（量詞：間） (medical clinic, usually a private practice)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 含有好多油嘅食物 (greasy; fatty; oily)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: jau4 nei6 ge3 sik6 ban2
examples.translation: fatty food

senses.definition: 無論聽到同睇到嘅嘢都有種以前冇嘅感覺，覺得新鮮 (to feel fresh and new; literally: one hears and sees something new)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢間餐廳裝修過之後，真係耳目一新啊。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 caan1 teng1 zong1 sau1 gwo3 zi1 hau6, zan1 hai6 ji5 muk6 jat1 san1 aa3.
examples.translation: The restaurant feels refreshing after renovation.

senses.definition: 形容人洗咗啲唔需要洗嘅錢，造成浪費，引申為上當、錢財被騙去嘅人 (person who was ripped on; person deceived on account of generosity)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今次比佢呃到，做咗冤大頭，絕對無下次！
examples.translation: He swindled me this time. I bought a pig in a poke but there will be no next time.

senses.definition: 能夠發揮作用；可以幫助達到目的 (usefulness)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: jau5 jung6
examples.translation: useful; literally, to have use

senses.definition: 愉快噉使用、消耗，通常係食物 ((usually of food) to have; to enjoy)

examples.jyutping: hoeng2 jung6
examples.translation: to enjoy and use

senses.definition: 用於某啲地方、用途 (for a specific use)

examples.translation: for business use

senses.definition: 對未來嘅事做嘅估計、推算，或者期望 (expectation; anticipation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我成績都算比預期好㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 sing4 zik1 dou1 syun3 bei2 jyu6 kei4 hou2 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: Well, I scored better than I thought I would.

senses.definition: 形容境況非常樂觀 (bright; usually describing the future)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: a bright future

senses.definition: 同其他人共同去做一件事 (together)
senses.label: 副詞

senses.definition: 見#有一手 (see #有一手 jau5 jat1 sau2)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 遲疑不決；諗好耐未決定到 (to hesitate; to pause before making a decision)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你唱歌咁好聽，快啲報名參加歌唱比賽啦，唔好猶疑喇。
examples.jyutping: nei5 coeng3 go1 gam3 hou2 teng1, faai3 di1 bou3 meng2 caam1 gaa1 go1 coeng3 bei2 coi3 laa1, m4 hou2 jau4 ji4 laa3.
examples.translation: You can sing very well. Why don't you join the singing contest? Don't hesitate!

senses.definition: 去唔同地方周圍睇吓，通常係正面嘅，包含放鬆、去玩嘅意思 (to travel; to go on a voyage)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: jau4 teng5
examples.translation: yacht

senses.definition: 形容人既有膽量又有謀略 (to be brave and astute)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 神秘嘅 (mysterious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢最近啲行蹤咁隱秘，應該係做咗虧心事。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zeoi3 gan6 di1 hang4 zung1 gam3 jan2 bei3, jing1 goi1 hai6 zou6 zo2 kwai1 sam1 si6.
examples.translation: His movements are so mysterious recently. He must have done some remorseful deeds.

senses.definition: 本來只係對於信奉#基督教 嘅人嘅戲稱，後來專指一啲行為差劣、對於性、#同性戀 態度極端#保守 嘅基督徒 (Christard, originally used as a slang term referring to Christians, now specifically referring to Christians with bad behaviour and/or extremely conservative attitudes towards sex or homosexuality)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 研究人類行為、文化、社會等方面嘅學科 (anthropology)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 身體有比較多嘅#脂肪，但係又未到#肥；多數形容女仔 ((often of females) chubby)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢鍾意有啲肉地嘅女仔。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zung1 ji3 jau5 di1 juk6 dei2 ge3 neoi5 zai2.
examples.translation: He likes chubby girls.

senses.definition: 海洋、湖泊或者河流等水域同陸地交接嘅範圍 (along the coast; along the shore)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個地方沿岸會有鯊魚出沒。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 dei6 fong1 jyun4 ngon6 wui5 jau5 saa1 jyu4 ceot1 mut6.
examples.translation: We have sharks here in the shallow water.

senses.definition: #醫療#保險 (health insurance)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zi6 jyun6 ji1 bou2
examples.translation: voluntary health insurance

senses.definition: 醫療#保障 (healthcare)

examples.jyutping: cyun4 man4 ji1 bou2
examples.translation: universal healthcare; universal health coverage

senses.definition: 即係「#人」，比較隨意甚至有時唔多禮貌嘅用法（量詞：條／班／兜） (guy; dude; bloke; fellow; a colloquial and sometimes slightly impolite way to refer to a person)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zi6 gei2 jau2
examples.translation: one of us

senses.definition: 同你有交情，通常志趣相投，會互相幫助，但係未必有任何血緣關係嘅人，即係 #朋友 (friend; companion)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: lou5 jau5
examples.translation: good friend; old friend

senses.definition: 用作相近團體關係嘅稱呼嘅前綴，有友好之意 (used as a prefix in addresses of similar groups to express a friendly attitude)

examples.jyutping: jau5 fong1
examples.translation: friendly side/party

senses.definition: 願意面對任何艱苦同埋怨，隨時為其他人付出 (to work hard regardless of criticism; to be willing to bear the burden)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 媽媽每日照顧我哋嘅生活，任勞任怨，真係偉大啊！
examples.translation: Mom takes care of our lives every day regardless of any hardship and our mean words. What a great person she is.

senses.definition: 比喻水平#有限、#麻麻、唔係太好 (limited capacity; at a so-so level; wordplay of its literal meaning "limited company")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我啲英文？有限公司㗎咋。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 di1 jing1 man2? jau5 haan6 gung1 si1 gaa3 zaa3.
examples.translation: My English? Just so-so.

senses.definition: 一件事已經去到結尾，冇再延續落去嘅空間 (to come to end; to finish; to end)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 考咗成個月，個公開試終於完結咗。
examples.jyutping: haau2 zo2 sing4 go3 jyut6, go3 gung1 hoi1 si5 zung1 jyu1 jyun4 git3 zo2.
examples.translation: The public exam has lasted for a month and is finally over.

senses.definition: #公司 其中一種形式；有限公司對外所負嘅財務責任，以出資者所投入嘅資本為限，公司 #股東 唔需要為公司嘅債務負額外嘅責任（量詞：間） (limited company; limited liability company)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 原本嘅著作；#改編 所取材嘅#原創 文字作品來源 (original work, particularly literary)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 電影編劇正正就係原著小説嘅作者。
examples.jyutping: din6 jing2 pin1 kek6 zing3 zing3 zau6 hai6 jyun4 zyu3 siu2 syut3 ge3 zok3 ze2.
examples.translation: The playwright of the movie is exactly the author of the original novel.

senses.definition: 新創作出嚟，以前冇出現過嘅 (to originally make; to create)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 jau4 hei3 hai6 ngo5 jyun4 cong3 gaa3.
examples.translation: The game is created by me.

senses.definition: 原本嘅作品；#改編 作品所取材嘅#原創 來源 (original work, as distinguished from derivative works)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你有冇睇過原作先？唔同㗎噃。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jau5 mou5 tai2 gwo3 jyun4 zok3 sin1? m4 tung4 gaa3 bo3.
examples.translation: So have you ever watched the original work? They're not the same.

senses.definition: 形容男子瀟灑而俊俏 (to describe men who are elegant, handsome and with a good figure like a tall tree)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 舊時嘅豆釘已經係玉樹臨風嘅少男。
examples.jyutping: gau6 si4 ge3 dau6 deng1 ji5 ging1 hai6 juk6 syu6 lam4 fung1 ge3 siu3 naam4.
examples.translation: The then kid has now become a handsome young man.

senses.definition: 指弦樂器，因為弦震動而發出聲音嘅樂器，例如小提琴、中提琴等等；同時引申為由弦樂器拉出嚟嘅音樂 (string instrument; music played by a string instrument)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jin4 ngok6 sei3 cung4 zau3
examples.translation: string quartet

senses.definition: 距離好長 (distant; remote; far)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 uk1 kei2 hou2 jiu4 jyun5
examples.translation: His home is very far away.

senses.definition: 企響台上單方面咁對觀眾講話，通常係圍繞一個比較專門而嚴肅嘅題目 (speech; lecture; talk)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢位博士嘅演講真係有趣。
examples.jyutping: ni1 wai2 bok3 si6 ge3 jin2 gong2 zan1 hai6 jau5 ceoi3.
examples.translation: The lecture by this professor is amusing.

senses.definition: 將一啲嘢吊喺空中；令一啲嘢停留喺空中 (to hang; to suspend; to hoist)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jyun4 gwaa3 gwok3 kei4
examples.translation: to hoist the national flag

senses.definition: 家鄉以外嘅地方 (place alien to one's hometown; foreign place)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ji6 dei6 lyun2
examples.translation: long-distance romance; long-distance relationship

senses.definition: 加喺動詞後面，表示對行為嘅不屑 (suffix to a verb to indicate disdain)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.translation: to do mischief

senses.definition: 以儘量少嘅痛苦，人為結束動物嘅生命 (animal euthanasia)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 被遺棄或者嚴重受傷嘅動物，好大機會俾人人道毀滅。
examples.jyutping: bei6 wai4 hei3 waak6 ze2 jim4 zung6 sau6 soeng1 ge3 dung6 mat6, hou2 daai6 gei1 wui5 bei2 jan4 jan4 dou6 wai2 mit6
examples.translation: Unwanted or severely injured animals will probably be euthanized.

senses.definition: 另一啲意見；立場唔一樣、反對嘅意見 (difference in opinion; dissent)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 如果大家冇異議，就咁決定㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 daai6 gaa1 mou5 ji6 ji5, zau6 gam2 kyut3 ding6 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: We would do so if there are no more dissents.

senses.definition: #月球 表面比較深色嘅大型#隕石坑 (lunar mare)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 情緒低落，有好多煩惱 (sorrowful; sad)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 唔好咁憂愁啦，女朋友走咗咪揾過個囉。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 gam3 jau1 sau4 laa1, neoi5 pang4 jau5 zau2 zo2 mai6 wan2 gwo3 go3 lo1.
examples.translation: Don't be sad. You can always find another girlfriend.

senses.definition: 有可能，而且可能性唔低 (hopefully; optimistically; possibly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 jau5 mong6 zoi3 hap6 zok3.
examples.translation: We can probably cooperate again.

senses.definition: 一件如果發生咗，會令你覺得開心嘅事，所以你會想佢發生（量詞：個） (wish; desire; aspiration)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jyun6 mong6 sing4 zan1
examples.translation: dream comes true.

senses.definition: 智力未能達到正常水平 (mentally challenged; mentally deficient; retarded)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zung1 dou6 joek6 zi3 jan4 si6 suk1 se5
examples.translation: Hostel for Moderately Mentally Handicapped Persons

senses.definition: 用嚟鬧人蠢、唔識嘢、冇用 (used to disparage people for their stupidity, lack of common sense, or uselessness)

examples.jyutping: nei5 joek6 zi3 gaa4?
examples.translation: Are you retarded?

senses.definition: 承接原因同埋結果之間嘅連詞 (therefore; consequently; for this reason)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 佢成績唔好，因此去咗麥當勞打工。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 sing4 zik1 m4 hou2, jan1 ci2 heoi3 zo2 mak6 dong1 lou4 daa2 gung1
examples.translation: He did not perform well academically.  Therefore, he ends up working at McDonald's.

senses.definition: 咩都唔理，大搖大擺噉走開 (to swagger off)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢揸車撞低個阿叔之後，望都無望就揚長而去。
examples.translation: He drove away callously after hitting a middle-aged man with his car.

senses.definition: #衣食住行 入面嘅衣食，指衣服同飲食，借指生活水平 (clothes and food; metaphor for quality of life)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ji1 sik6 fung1 zuk1
examples.translation: (in a state of) abundance

senses.definition: 配合「有」或「冇」嚟用，前者指善用生活飲食同穿著嘅資源，唔浪費，後者就相反 (not being wasteful on food)

examples.jyutping: mou5 ji1 sik6
examples.translation: to be wasteful on food

senses.definition: 氣勢威猛，令人抵擋唔到 (unable to be held back)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢位新晉拳手嘅攻勢鋭不可當，已經連贏五輪賽事。
examples.translation: This new boxer's attack is unstoppable, and he has already won five consecutive matches.

senses.definition: 水準高；表現傑出 (outstanding; excellent; splendid)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: jau1 sau3 zok3 ban2
examples.translation: outstanding piece of work

senses.definition: 仍然好似以前一樣 (as before; still; to remain the same as compared to some point in the past)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 今年書展依舊人頭湧湧。
examples.jyutping: gam1 nin4 syu1 zin2 ji1 gau6 jan4 tau4 jung2 jung2
examples.translation: The book exhibition this year is still (as before) crowded with people.

senses.definition: 蛇類行走嘅樣，引申為曲折延伸 (zigzag; winding; twisty)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: The mountain path twists and turns.

senses.definition: 將影像（通常指一張紙、文件）利用電子掃描好快噉印喺另一張紙上 (to photocopy; to xerox; to take a photocopy)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔該將呢份文件影印三份。
examples.jyutping: m4 goi1 zoeng1 nei1 fan6 man4 gin2 jing2 jan3 saam1 fan6.
