senses.definition: 借喻有少少冒險精神嘅人 (metaphor for somebody daring to take a small risk)

examples.text: 聽講呢間餐廳好難食，有冇勇士想去試下？
examples.translation: I hear this restaurant is terrible. Any brave soul volunteer to try it out?

senses.definition: 呢一刻；呢個時候 (now; at present; at this moment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 ji4 gaa1 heoi3 bin1?
examples.translation: Where are you going now?

senses.definition: 今時今日 (nowadays)

examples.text: 而家嘅社會比以前開放。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 ge3 se5 wui2 bei2 ji5 cin4 hoi1 fong3.
examples.translation: The society has become more open nowadays.

senses.definition: 嬰兒嘅牀，可以順住一條軸左右搖動，哄細路瞓覺 (cradle; a baby's bed that is usually capable of being rocked back and forth to facilitate sleeping)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一樣嘢嘅發源哋；孕育出一樣嘢嘅環境 ("cradle", a metaphor for being the place of origin and development of something)
達到預期嘅結果 (effective; able to achieve an expected result)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: jau5 haau6 jat6 kei4
examples.translation: expiry date

senses.definition: 有#食煙 習慣嘅人 (smoker)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 自己國家以外嘅地方 (foreign country)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 靠住 (to lie on; to rely on)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: ji2 kau3
examples.translation: to depend on

senses.definition: 仗恃（權勢；有勢力嘅人） (to rely on the rich and powerful)

examples.jyutping: ji2 sai3
examples.translation: to rely on the rich and powerful

senses.definition: 偏向一邊；歪 (partial; biased)

examples.jyutping: bat1 pin1 bat1 ji2
examples.translation: impartial; unbiased

senses.definition: #印度 嘅簡稱 (shorthand for India)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: jan3 baa1 gwaan1 hai6
examples.translation: India-Pakistan relations

senses.definition: #印度尼西亞 (#印尼) 嘅簡稱 (shorthand for Indonesia)

examples.jyutping: jan3 jung4
examples.translation: Indonesian domestic helper

senses.definition: 用墨水呈現文字或者圖案嘅印記嘅工具；#印章；#圖章 (chop; stamp)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 麻煩你喺信封上面扱印。
examples.jyutping: maa4 faan4 nei5 hai2 seon3 fung1 soeng6 min6 kap1 jan3.
examples.translation: Please put a chop on the envelope.

senses.definition: 印記；痕跡；疤痕 (print; mark; scar)

examples.jyutping: sau2 jan3
examples.translation: handprint

senses.definition: 好似數緊自己屋企收埋嘅#寶物 咁，比喻某人對某啲嘢好#熟識 (very familiar with certain subjects, as if enumerating one's family treasures)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 毒男阿松一講起萌娘上嚟就如數家珍。
examples.jyutping: duk6 naam4 aa3 cung4 jat1 gong2 hei2 mang4 noeng4 soeng5 lei4 zau6 jyu4 sou2 gaa1 zan1.
examples.translation: The nerd A-chung acts like he is counting the treasures at his home when he's talking about Moe anime girls. (i.e., he's very familiar with Moe anime girls.)

senses.definition: #嚴密 嘅規格 (rigorous; strict)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢對啲員工非常嚴格，遲到一分鐘都會俾佢#照肺。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 deoi3 di1 jyun4 gung1 fei1 soeng4 jim4 gaak3, ci4 dou3 jat1 fan1 zung1 dou1 wui2 bei2 keoi5 ziu3 fai3.
examples.translation: He is really strict with the punctuality of his employees. Just one minute late for work then off you go for a scold.

senses.definition: 對人生嘅價值、意義、目的等嘅睇法 (perspective on life; philosophy of life)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 每個人嘅人生觀都唔同。
examples.jyutping: mui5 go3 jan4 ge3 jan4 sang1 gun1 dou1 m4 tung4.
examples.translation: Everyone has a different perspective on life.

senses.definition: 幼條如絲形狀嘅#塑膠 原料，如#尼龍 (artificial fibre; synthetic fibre)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 堅決咁相信一件事 (to believe; to set one's mind on doing something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 如果你認定自己做得到，你就做得到。
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 nei5 jing6 ding6 zi6 gei2 zou6 dak1 dou2, nei5 zau6 zou6 dak1 dou2
examples.translation: If you'd put your mind to it, you could do it.

senses.definition: 離市區有一段距離嘅地方，通常會有好多植物 (the wilderness; the countryside; the outdoors)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: je5 ngoi6 jau5 hou2 do1 kwan1 cung4.
examples.translation: There are lots of insects outdoors.

senses.definition: 形容所在環境會令聲音回音好大 (with loud echoes)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢啲嘢我哋轉個地方先講啦，呢度好應聲㗎。
examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 je5 ngo5 dei6 zyun3 go3 dei6 fong1 sin1 gong2 laa1, ni1 dou6 hou2 jing3 seng1 gaa3
examples.translation: Let's go somewhere else to talk about these things. The echoes are quite loud here.

senses.definition: 人嘅蹤跡 (trace of human)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 入嚟呢度條路好崎嶇，所以人跡罕至。
examples.jyutping: jap6 lei4 ni1 dou6 tiu4 lou6 hou2 kei1 keoi1, so2 ji5 jan4 zik1 hon2 zi3.
examples.translation: The road to get here is very bumpy, so not many people come here.

senses.definition: 一個人話曬事、唔聽人講嘅地方 (a place where only one person has the say)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋呢度唔係一言堂，個個都可以發表意見。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ni1 dou6 m4 hai6 jat1 jin4 tong2, go3 go3 dou1 ho2 ji5 faat3 biu2 ji3 gin3.
examples.translation: Nobody dictates here. Every one of us has a say.

senses.definition: 發癲；失控 (crazy; out of control; out of one's mind)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: hung4 dang1 nei5 dou1 cung1? nei5 jau5 beng6 aa4?
examples.translation: You even rush red lights? Are you out of your mind?

senses.definition: 由聲音組合而成嘅藝術 (music)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: teng1 jam1 ngok6
examples.translation: listen to music

senses.definition: 昏暗 (cloudy; gloomy; sombre)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 go3 tin1 sik1 hou2 jam1 cam4
examples.translation: The sky is cloudy and gloomy today.

senses.definition: 性格負面; 內向 (depressive; introverted)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 sing3 gaak3 jat1 hoeng3 hou2 jam1 cam4
examples.translation: He has a constantly depressive personality.

senses.definition: 受歡迎；擁立；愛戴 (to adore;to support somebody)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 sau6 dou3 hou2 do1 jan4 ge3 jung2 daai3.
examples.translation: He is adored and supported by many.

senses.definition: 喺度冷嘲熱諷，#單打 (to tease and to deride)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 有事咪照直講囉，使唔使成日對我又翳又諦呀？
examples.jyutping: jau5 si6 mai6 ziu3 zik6 gong2 lo1, sai2 m4 sai2 seng4 jat6 deoi3 ngo5 jau6 ngai3 jau6 dai3 aa3?
examples.translation: If he wants to complain he can talk to me in person, is it really necessary to tease me for the whole day?

senses.definition: 形容招手嚟引起人留意 (to wave at someone (to signal the person); to beckon)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢擪我過去，好似想同我講嘢噉！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jaap3 ngo5 gwo3 heoi3, hou2 ci5 soeng2 tung4 ngo5 gong2 je5 gam2!
examples.translation: He beckoned to me, as if he wanted to speak to me.

senses.definition: 捲 (to roll (sleeves); to cuff (pant legs))

examples.jyutping: cau1 hyut3, m4 goi1 jaap3 gou1 saam1 zau6.
examples.translation: I'll take a blood sample. Please roll up your sleeves.

senses.definition: #著（尿片） (to wear (a nappy))

examples.jyutping: jaap3 niu6 pin2
examples.translation: to wear a diaper

senses.definition: 文學入面，客觀形象同主觀心靈結合而帶有特殊意藴啲表達方式 (imagery)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢首詩入面用咗好多唔同嘅意象去描寫「擁抱」嘅感覺。
examples.jyutping: ni1 sau2 si1 jap6 min6 jung6 zo2 hou2 do1 m4 tung4 ge3 ji3 zoeng6 heoi3 miu4 se2 "jung2 pou5" ge3 gam2 gok3.
examples.translation: There are a lot of examples of imagery in this poem to describe the feeling of embracing.

senses.definition: 形容食物嘅口感，#韌 嘅程度令到可以將件食物拉長，延展性高，係一個正面評價;食物有彈性 ((texture of food or material) chewy, similar to "al dente")
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢間甜品店嘅湯圓好煙韌。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 tim4 ban2 dim3 ge3 tong1 jyun4 hou2 jin1 ngan6
examples.translation: The sweet rice balls in this dessert shop are very chewy.

senses.definition: 戀人之間如膠似漆嘅甜蜜樣 (intimate; having intimate behaviour e.g. grooming, feeding, fondling, petting between a couple)

examples.text: 成日見佢哋好似好煙韌噉，估唔到原來成日嗌交。
examples.jyutping: seng4 jat6 gin3 keoi5 dei6 hou2 ci5 hou2 jin1 ngan6 gam2, gu2 m4 dou3 jyun4 loi4 seng4 jat6 aai3 gaau1.
examples.translation: They seems so intimate but few people know there are plenty of arguments between them.

senses.definition: 一種只要#前提 啱#結論 就一定正確嘅#論證 (deductive argument)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 前提一，所有身分證上面嘅性別寫住男性嘅人，法律上都係男人。前提二，方方身分證上面嘅性別寫住男人。結論就係，方方法律上係男人。呢個就係演繹論證嘅例子。
examples.jyutping: cin4 tai4 jat1, so2 jau5 san1 fan2 zing3 soeng6 min6 ge3 sing3 bit6 se2 zyu6 naam4 sing3 ge3 jan4, faat3 leot6 soeng6 dou1 hai6 naam4 jan2. cin4 tai4 ji6, fong1 fong1 san1 fan2 zing3 soeng6 min6 ge3 sing3 bit6 se2 zyu6 naam4 jan2. git3 leon6 zau6 hai6, fong1 fong1 faat3 leot6 soeng6 hai6 naam4 jan2. ni1 go3 zau6 hai6 jin2 jik6 leon6 zing3 ge3 lai6 zi2.
examples.translation: The first premise, is that everyone with their gender on their ID card written as male, are legally males.

senses.definition: 由始至終都冇改變過嘅，多數形容做法、作風 (consistent; persistent; all along, usually describing a usual practice)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 重播受歡迎嘅劇集係電視台一貫嘅做法。
examples.jyutping: cung4 bo3 sau6 fun1 jing4 ge3 kek6 zaap6 hai6 din6 si6 toi4 jat1 gun3 ge3 zou6 faat3.
examples.translation: Reruning popular TV episodes is a consistent practice of television broadcast companies.

senses.definition: 冇任何部分缺少 (complete; intact; unbroken)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 fu3 hung2 lung4 gwat1 fei1 soeng4 jyun4 zing2
examples.translation: This is a very complete skeleton of a dinosaur.

senses.definition: 逐點提出理據，第一點前面用「一來」，第二點就係「二來」，如此類推 (firstly)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 如果喺度住，一來近學校，二來又住得舒服啲。
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 hai2 dou6 zyu6,  jat1 loi4 kan5 hok6 haau6,  ji6 loi4 jau6 zyu6 dak1 syu1 fuk6 di1.
examples.translation: If I live here, firstly I can be close to school, and secondly I can live more comfortably.

senses.definition: 人體入面連接口腔同食道嘅部分 (pharynx)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 被水覆蓋 (to drown)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 好多沙灘上嘅人都畀突如其來嘅洪水淹沒。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 saa1 taan1 soeng6 ge3 jan4 dou1 bei2 dat6 jyu4 kei4 loi4 ge3 hung4 seoi2 jim1 mut6.
examples.translation: Many people on the beach were drowned by the sudden tidal wave.

senses.definition: 掩蓋；遮蓋；埋 (to bury)

examples.text: 呢次山泥傾瀉淹沒咗大約二百間屋。
examples.jyutping: nei1 ci3 saan1 nai4 king1 se3 jim1 mut6 zo2 daai6 joek3 ji6 baak3 gaan1 uk1.
examples.translation: The landslide had buried about 200 houses.

senses.definition: 一件有研究價值嘅可重複事件，呢件事件會按照既定嘅規則發生，畀人類去觀察同研究係點樣運作；譬如日蝕係一種可重複事件，規則就係祇要太陽畀月球遮住咗就會發生；所以日蝕係一種現象 （量詞：個） (phenomenon)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: se5 wui2 jin6 zoeng6
examples.translation: social phenomena

senses.definition: 向上 (to face upward)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: joeng5 mong6
examples.translation: to look upward

senses.definition: #尊敬；#仰慕 (to respect; to admire)

examples.jyutping: ging2 joeng5
examples.translation: to admire

senses.definition: 缺乏經驗；#簡單；#天真，帶貶義 (naive)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 乜你咁大個人都咁幼稚㗎。
examples.jyutping: mat1 nei5 gam3 daai6 go3 jan4 dou1 gam3 jau3 zi6 gaa3.
examples.translation: How are you so naive even as an adult?

senses.definition: 形容#空氣 有大量污染物時現象，嚴重影響#能見度，生物呼吸困難 (smog; misty and often polluted air)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 北京嘅天空經常煙霧彌漫。
examples.jyutping: bak1 ging1 ge3 tin1 hung1 ging1 soeng4 jin1 mou6 nei4 maan6.
examples.translation: The sky in Beijing is full of smog.

senses.definition: #煙，帶有#懸浮粒子 嘅氣體，通常由燃燒產生 (smoke)

examples.jyutping: jin1 mou6 taam3 caak1 hei3
examples.translation: smoke detector

senses.definition: 面對面咁遇上某啲嘢 (to encounter something face-to-face)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: di1 fung1 jing4 min6 ceoi1 lai4.
examples.translation: The wind is blowing at my face.

senses.definition: 一啲#植物#根 嘅總稱，形狀好似人咁樣，常用#藥材，呈啡黃色或啡紅色條狀（量詞：枝／條） (ginseng; the general term of root of plant which looks like human, in yellowish-brown or reddish-brown)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 韓國嘅人蔘雞湯好出名。
examples.jyutping: hon4 gwok3 ge3 jan4 sam1 gai1 tong1 hou2 ceot1 meng2.
examples.translation: Ginseng chicken soup from Korea is very famous.

senses.definition: 植物分類人參屬 (panax)
詼諧風趣，而且帶有深意 (humorous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢成日講嘢都好好笑，真係幽默。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 seng4 jat6 gong2 je5 dou1 hou2 hou2 siu3, zan1 hai6 jau1 mak6.
examples.translation: He always makes us laugh. What a humorous man!

senses.definition: 指人類文明冒起之前嘅歷史時期 (remote antiquity; primeval times)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 遠古嗰陣，原始人用手磨石製造石器。
examples.jyutping: jyun5 gu2 go2 zan2, jyun4 ci2 jan4 jung6 sau2 mo4 sek6 zai3 zou6 sek6 hei3.
examples.translation: Back in the primeval age, our ancestors made stone tools by bashing rocks together.

senses.definition: 提供座位及遮陰設施嘅户外公共場地（量詞：個） (sitting-out area)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺一個細小空間逼滿人時發生嘅意外，當前面嘅人突然行得慢，後面嘅人唔知而繼續向前行，推跌前面嘅人，後面嘅人再跌喺前面啲人上面，形成好多人#沓起 情況，做成傷亡 (human stampede leading to trampling)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 比喻當股市大跌時，越嚟越多人賣貨將股價推低 (figuratively, a stock market crash, where more and more people sell such that the price falls faster)
熱嘅能量；温度越高，能量越多，呢啲能量就叫熱能 (thermal energy; heat energy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 大部分發電機都係將熱能轉換為電能。
examples.jyutping: daai6 bou6 fan6 faat3 din6 gei1 dou1 hai6 zoeng1 jit6 nang4 zyun2 wun6 wai4 din6 nang4.
examples.translation: Most generators convert thermal energy to electric energy.

senses.definition: #農曆 中十二個月份嘅日數加埋起來同地球公轉一年周期唔同，為咗令每年月份同地球相對太陽位置唔會越差越遠，會每十九年大約加七個月，嗰年有十三個月，多出嘅月份就叫閏月，去消除差距 (leap month, especially in Chinese calendar)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gam1 nin2 jau5 jeon6 ji6 jyut6.
examples.translation: There is a leap month after the second month in Chinese calendar this year.

senses.definition: 阿媽嘅姊妹 (mother's sister; aunt)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 50至70年代黑白畫質嘅粵語長篇港產電影 (the long black and white movies produced in Hong Kong from the 50s to the 70s)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢啲粵語長片好反映到當其時低下階層嘅生活境況㗎。
examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 jyut6 jyu5 coeng4 pin2 hou2 faan2 jing2 dou2 dong1 kei4 si4 dai1 haa6 gaai1 cang4 ge3 sang1 wut6 ging2 fong3 gaa3
examples.translation: These Cantonese black and white films are a good reflection of the living conditions of the lower classes at that time.

senses.definition: 維持生命同健康嘅物質，多數用喺植物 (nutrient; nourishment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 植物嘅根會吸取泥土入面嘅養分。
examples.jyutping: zik6 mat6 ge3 gan1 wui5 kap1 ceoi2 nai4 tou2 jap6 min6 ge3 joeng5 fan6.
examples.translation: Roots of plants absorb nutrients from the soil.

senses.definition: 對待某啲人、物件或者事件應有嘅愛心、同情心等等 (humane; compassion)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢件事簡直係慘無人道！
examples.jyutping: nei1 gin6 si6 gaan2 zik6 hai6 caam2 mou4 jan4 dou6!
examples.translation: This is so cruel and inhumane!

senses.definition: #綿羊 身上嘅毛髮（量詞：執／嚿） (sheep's wool; wool; fleece)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: joeng4 mou4 pei5
examples.translation: wool blanket

senses.definition: 對未來作出估計，而且公開呢啲資料 (to forecast)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cat1 jat6 tin1 hei3 jyu6 bou3
examples.translation: week weather forecast

senses.definition: 非常少嘅 (very small quantity of; a sliver of)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 sin3 sang1 gei1
examples.translation: a small chance of survival

senses.definition: 睇文章、書籍、報紙等文字刊物 (to read)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jyut6 duk6 sat1
examples.translation: study room

senses.definition: 喺有#靈魂 嘅概念下，出世之前、死亡之後嘅生活嘅空間 (the world of the dead; Hades; underworld)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 每年嘅農曆七月就係陰間鬼門關大開嘅時候。
examples.jyutping: mui5 nin4 ge3 nung4 lik6 cat1 jyut6 zau6 hai6 jam1 gaan1 gwai2 mun4 gwaan1 daai6 hoi1 ge3 si4 hau6.
examples.translation: The realm of the world of the dead opens in the seventh lunar month every year.

senses.definition: #遇上 一啲意料之外嘅、唔好彩嘅事（例如俾人偷嘢、遇到#意外 等等） (to encounter something bad and unexpected (e.g. a theft or an accident))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 出國遇事唔使太驚青。揾就近嘅大使館就得。
examples.jyutping: ceot1 gwok3 jyu6 si6 m4 sai2 taai3 geng1 ceng1, wan2 zau6 gan6 ge3 daai6 si5 gun2 zau6 dak1.
examples.translation: There is no need to panic if you encounter something expected when travelling abroad. Contact the nearest embassy.

examples.jyutping: dak1 haan4 heoi3 jau4 zing3 guk2 gei3 zo2 fung1 seon3 keoi5.
examples.translation: Go to the postal office and send the letter when you are free.

senses.definition: 植物名；一種常綠喬木，樹冠大，有細長#氣根（量詞：樖） (banyan)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 聽過好多次，對內容非常之熟悉 (sth that is often heard and therefore well remembered)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個故仔我聽到耳熟能詳喇。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 gu2 zai2 ngo5 teng1 dou3 ji5 suk6 nang4 coeng4 laa3.
examples.translation: I have heard this story plenty of times. I know every detail about it.

senses.definition: 辦理#郵政 事務，畀市民寄#信、寄#包裹 嘅地方；香港嘅郵局同時會提供繳費同賣郵票等等嘅服務 (post office)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 zan6 gaan1 jiu3 heoi3 jau4 guk2 gei3 seon3.
examples.translation: I will go to the post office to send a letter a while later.

senses.definition: 高質素 (first-class; top-notch; top-quality; first-rate)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 lau4 zok3 ban2
examples.translation: top-quality piece of work

senses.definition: #遮 嘅書面語；由一塊弧形嘅防水布幕，加上用嚟支撐嘅遮骨同手柄而成，係用嚟擋風雨或者遮太陽嘅工具 (umbrella in Standard Written Chinese, equivalent to #遮 in Cantonese)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lok6 jyu5 jiu3 daai3 ze1.
examples.translation: One needs to bring an umbrella if it rains.

senses.definition: 表達種類、款式嘅量詞 (type; kind)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: loeng5 joeng6 gung1 fo3
examples.translation: two assignments

senses.definition: 「#嘢」嘅量詞 (measure word for #嘢)

examples.text: 你係咪同我諗緊同一樣嘢？
examples.jyutping: nei5 hai6 mai6 tung4 ngo5 nam2 gan2 tung4 jat1 joeng6 je5?
examples.translation: Are you thinking the same thing as I am?

senses.definition: #扱印 嗰陣畀#印章 上#顏料 嘅工具（量詞：個） (ink pad)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 扱印嗰陣小心唔好掂到個印台，唔係隻手就污糟晒。
examples.jyutping: kap1 jan3 go2 zan6 siu2 sam1 m4 hou2 dim3 dou2 go3 jan3 toi4, m4 hai6 zek3 sau2 zau6 wu1 zou1 saai3.
examples.translation: Do not touch the ink pad when you are using the stamp. Otherwise, your hand will get dirty.

senses.definition: 附近嘅區域，通常會配合地方名詞嚟用 (area around a particular place; the surrounding area)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zoi1 keoi1 jat1 daai3 hou2 do1 caak3.
examples.translation: Thieves appear in the disaster area.

senses.definition: 進食正餐 ((formal) to have a meal; to dine)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jung6 caan1 lai5 ji4
examples.translation: table manners

senses.definition: 進食正餐 ((of formal) to have a meal; to dine)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jyun4 gung1 jung6 sin6 si4 gaan3
examples.translation: lunch hours for staff

senses.definition: 有可以被#使用 嘅#價值；#用 得着 (useful; helping one to do or achieve something)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zou6 go3 jau5 jung6 ge3 jan4.
examples.translation: Be a useful person.

senses.definition: 有好多人鍾意；受歡迎 (popular; craze; mania; fad)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: jit6 waa6
examples.translation: hot topic

senses.definition: 一晚嘅時間 (the duration of one night)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 je5 zi1 gaan1
examples.translation: within a night (figuratively meaning a short period of time)

senses.definition: 自己作為人哋嘅榜樣 (to set oneself as a good example to others)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 做父母嘅應該以身作則，教導子女。
examples.jyutping: zou6 fu6 mou5 ge3 jing1 goi1 ji5 san1 zok3 zak1, gaau3 dou6 zi2 neoi5.
examples.translation: Parents should set themselves as good examples to their children.

senses.definition: 字面解竹枝一俾刀刃劈到就會斷開，形容問題一遇到某個解決方法就立即被解決 ((of problems) to get readily solved; literally: (bamboo) splits as it meets the edge of a knife)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你真係好嘢，一出手問題就迎刃而解。
examples.jyutping: nei5 zan1 hai6 hou2 je5, jat1 ceot1 sau2 man6 tai4 zau6 jing4 jan6 ji4 gaai2.
examples.translation: You are such a saviour, tackling the problem with such swiftness.

senses.definition: #圖章；圖章印出嚟嘅圖案（量詞：個） (seal; stamp; mark)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢份合約要補返個公司印章。
examples.jyutping: ni1 fan6 hap6 joek3 jiu3 bou2 faan1 go3 gung1 si1 jan3 zoeng1.
examples.translation: The company's stamp should be put on this contract.

senses.definition: 冇禮貌，唔講道理 (unreasonable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: je5 maan4 jan4
examples.translation: barbarian

senses.definition: 形容處於一個空間較深嘅位置 (to describe a long or significant distance from the outer edge)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我部電話喺櫃底攝得好入，我掂唔倒。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 bou6 din6 waa2 hai2 gwai6 dai2 sip3 dak1 hou2 jap6 ngo5 dim3 m4 dou2.
examples.translation: My phone is stuck deep under the cabinet, I can't reach it.

senses.definition: 由外面去裏面 (to go into; to enter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jap6 ging2
examples.translation: to enter a country

senses.definition: #錄取；成為一份子 (to be admitted into; to become a member of)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 jap6 zo2 sap6 daai6 aa3!
examples.translation: I've made it into the final ten!

senses.definition: #參加；#加入 (to join; to participate)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 jap6 zo2 ni1 go3 hok6 wui2
examples.translation: I joined this student club.

senses.definition: #購買、#囤積 (to buy; to stock up on)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 jap6 zo2 sap6 sau2 wui6 fung1
examples.translation: I've bought 10 lots of HSBC stock.

senses.definition: #啱、#夾、#襯 (to conform to; to agree with)

examples.jyutping: jap6 si4
examples.translation: fashionable

senses.definition: 到咗某一個時間、日子 (to reach a specific time, season)

examples.jyutping: jap6 dung1
examples.translation: to enter winter

senses.definition: 一種氣候現象；某個地區嘅氣温會突然升高，比起正常嘅熱好多（量詞：股） (heatwave)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 美國北部嘅熱浪令好多人中暑。
examples.translation: Many people suffered from heat stroke when the heatwave roamed North America.

senses.definition: 舊時用嚟運送#郵件 嘅船；依家係指喺海上提供娛樂嘅大型船隻，有#酒店、#餐廳、#賭場、#泳池 等設施，亦會載遊客去唔同地方（量詞：艘／隻） (cruise ship)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gwo3 loeng5 jat6 ngo5 wui3 soeng5 jau4 leon4 waan2.
examples.translation: I am going on a cruisecation a few days later.

senses.definition: 限制某人或事物唔超出指定範圍 (to restrain; to bind)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: joek3 cuk1 lik6
examples.translation: binding force

senses.definition: 只係諗著一樣嘢，冇其他念頭 (wholeheartedly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 sam1 wai6 jan4 man4 fuk6 mou6.
examples.translation: He serves the people wholeheartedly.

senses.definition: 同之前冇分別，繼續原本咁樣 (as usual)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 jyu4 gei3 wong5 gam3 wut6 joek3.
examples.translation: She is active as usual.

senses.definition: 隱藏；掩飾；瞞住；唔畀其他人知道 (to conceal; to hide; to cover up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢作咗好多個大話去隱瞞佢犯罪嘅事實。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zok3 zo2 hou2 do1 go3 daai6 waa6 heoi3 jan2 mun4 keoi5 faan6 zeoi6 ge3 si6 sat6.

senses.definition: #有啲 (a little; a bit)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: jau5 di1 sat1 mong6
examples.translation: a little bit disappointed

phonetic.original: jan4 bat1 ho2 ji5 maau6 soeng3
jyutping: jan4 bat1 ho2 ji5 maau6 soeng3

senses.definition: 唔可以單靠人嘅外貌，就判定佢嘅內涵 (cannot judge somebody by appearance; can't judge a book by its cover)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢個樣賊眉賊眼，估唔到佢咁好人，真係人不可以貌相啊。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 go3 joeng2 caak6 mei4 caak6 ngaan5, gu2 m4 dou3 keoi5 gam3 hou2 jan4, zan1 hai6 jan4 bat1 ho2 ji5 maau6 soeng3 aa3.
examples.translation: Although he looks roguish, he is unbelievably kind. You can't judge him by his face.

keywords: jan4 bat1 ho2 ji5 maau6 soeng3
jan bat ho ji maau soeng

senses.definition: 人始終唔係草同樹呢啲植物，會有感情，會受感動 (Men, not like grass and trees, have feelings and emotions)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 人非草木，少少唔捨得點都會有嘅。
examples.jyutping: jan4 fei1 cou2 muk6, siu2 siu2 m4 se2 dak1 dim2 dou1 wui5 jau5 ge3.
examples.translation: We have feelings, after all. It is usual that we miss them somewhat.

senses.definition: 核對之後領收 (to claim; to collect)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: sat1 mat6 jing6 leng5
examples.translation: lost and found

senses.definition: 快樂噉度過晚年 (to spend one's remaining days happily)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 爺爺退咗休之後，返鄉下頤養天年，每日散步、捉棋。
examples.jyutping: je4 je2 teoi3 zo2 jau1 zi1 hau6, faan1 hoeng1 haa2 ji4 joeng5 tin1 nin4, mui5 jat6 saan3 bou6, zuk1 kei2.
examples.translation: After retirement, grandpa returns to his native place and spends his late years there by strolling and playing chess every day.

senses.definition: 蘿藦科夜來香屬嘅攀藤植物，又叫夜來香、夜蘭香、月見草 (Chinese violet, Telosma cordata)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 呢種植物嘅花，可以食用 (the flower of Telosma cordata, which can be consumed as a vegetable)

examples.text: 滾湯落夜香花，清肝明目呀。
examples.jyutping: gwan2 tong1 lok6 je6 hoeng1 faa1, cing1 gon1 ming4 muk6 aa3.
examples.translation: Add some Chinese violet flowers into the soup. It's medicinal for the liver and the eyes.

senses.definition: 冇分別 (one and the same; exactly alike)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢同佢阿媽生得一模一樣。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 tung4 keoi5 aa3 maa1 saang1 dak1 jat1 mou4 jat1 joeng6.

senses.definition: 提出希望對方以某種身份出現嘅請求 (to invite; to request someone's presence)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jiu1 cing2 haam4

senses.definition: 頭撞頭 (directly; face-to-face; head-on)

examples.jyutping: loeng5 gaa3 ce1 jing4 tau4 soeng1 zong6.

examples.jyutping: neoi5 zai2 jat1 bun1 ji4 jin4 zung1 ji3 daai6 zek3 ge3 naam4 zai2.

senses.definition: 一樣嘢嘅內部 (in; inside)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 落雨嘞，快啲返去入面啦。
examples.jyutping: lok6 jyu5 laak3, faai3 di1 faan1 heoi3 jap6 min6 laa1.

senses.definition: 一種自然地貌；形容一個地勢嘅高度落差非常大，角度接近垂直（量詞：個） (cliff; precipice)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 有啲人係鍾意去懸崖攀石，咁鍾意玩命嘅。
examples.jyutping: jau5 di1 jan4 hai6 zung1 ji3 heoi3 jyun4 ngaai4 paan1 sek6, gam3 zung1 ji3 waan2 meng6 ge2.
examples.translation: Some people just love to do dangerous stuff like climbing up a cliff.

senses.definition: 冇事實根據而流傳嘅説話 (rumour; groundless allegation; gossip)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jiu4 jin4 zi2 jyu1 zi3 ze2
examples.translation: Rumours will stop at wise people

senses.definition: 兩樣嘢嘅相逢；不過畀人遇見嘅嘢要用眼睇到 (to meet; to come across; to encounter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我去日本旅行嗰陣竟然遇見佢。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 heoi3 jat6 bun2 leoi5 hang4 go2 zan6 ging2 jin4 jyu6 gin3 keoi5

senses.definition: 表演做戲 (to act; to perform in a theatrical display)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jin2 hei3 jin2 dak1 zan1 hai6 hou2.
examples.translation: She is really good at acting.

senses.definition: 假扮 (to impersonate a character)
根據對人或事物嘅睇法而判斷 (to think; to consider)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 jing6 wai4 ngo5 ho2 ji5 dim2 zou6?
examples.translation: What do you think I can do?

senses.definition: 去#見面 並且#接送 (to meet; to welcome; to greet)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你負責去機場迎接貴賓。
examples.jyutping: nei5 fu6 zaak3 heoi3 gei1 coeng4 jing4 zip3 gwai3 ban1.
examples.translation: You will be in charge of picking up our guests at the airport.

senses.definition: 有咁嘅…#存在 (indicates the existence of what follows; there is/are; to be available)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jau5 dak1 maai6
examples.translation: in stock; available for sale

senses.definition: 由原本住嘅地方搬咗去另一個地方住，可以指係同一個國家唔同地區之間嘅搬遷 (to move to; to emigrate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 lai4 gan2 wui5 ji4 geoi1 heoi3 jat6 bun2.
examples.translation: She is going to move to Japan.

senses.definition: 仔女 (children; son and daughter)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 di1 zai2 neoi2 hou2 haau3 seon6.
examples.translation: His sons and daughters are filially pious to him.

senses.definition: 男女 (men and women)

examples.jyutping: ji4 neoi5 si1 cing4
examples.translation: men and women's romantic relationship

senses.definition: 喺兩件事之間加上因果關係，用嚟解釋行為 (so; therefore; hence; to attribute the sense of causality to explain a certain behavior)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 佢聽到不遠處傳嚟警笛聲，於是佢就走夾唔唞噉逃離現場。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 teng1 dou2 bat1 jyun5 cyu3 cyun4 lai4 ging2 dek6 sing1, jyu1 si6 keoi5 zau6 zau2 gaap3 m4 tau2 gam2 tou4 lei4 jin6 coeng4.
examples.translation: He made his escape when he heard siren blaring from a distance.

senses.definition: 對人或事物放咗好深嘅感情 (to fall deeply in love or to be passionately devoted)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 雖然我對佢一往情深，但佢一啲都冇畀我感動。
examples.jyutping: seoi1 jin4 ngo5 deoi3 keoi5 jat1 wong5 cing4 sam1, daan6 keoi5 jat1 di1 dou1 mou5 bei2 ngo5 gam2 dung6.
examples.translation: I am passionately devoted to her but she has never been touched.

senses.definition: 好重要，同人嘅性命有關嘅事，關係住一個人嘅生死 (human life is of paramount importance; as a matter of life and death)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢件事人命關天㗎，快啲報警啦。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gin6 si6 jan4 meng6 gwaan1 tin1 gaa3, faai3 di1 bou3 ging2 laa1.
examples.translation: This is a matter of life and death, call the police now!

senses.definition: 可以証明件事真實情況嘅人（量詞：個／名） (witness)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jan4 zing3 mat6 zing3
examples.translation: oral testimony and material evidence

senses.definition: 之前；喺較早時間 (before; previously; at an earlier time)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: ji5 cin4 ngo5 hou2 fei4.
examples.translation: I was very fat before.

senses.definition: #容許 同#忍耐 一啲令人不快或錯誤嘅嘢，唔去#出聲 或者#反抗 (to tolerate; to put up with sth unpleasant or wrong; to condone)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我唔會再容忍佢呢啲咁無恥嘅行為。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 wui5 zoi3 jung4 jan2 keoi5 ni1 di1 gam3 mou4 ci2 ge3 hang4 wai4.
examples.translation: I won't put up with his shameless conduct anymore.

senses.definition: （遊戲）嬉戲；（旅行）遊覽玩樂 (to go sight-seeing; to stroll about)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 出國玩不失為一個散心嘅好方法。
examples.jyutping: ceot1 gwok3 waan2 bat1 sat1 wai4 jat1 go3 saan3 sam1 ge3 hou2 fong1 faat3.
examples.translation: Travelling abroad is a good way to relieve stress.

senses.definition: 有相同嘅情況或者屬性；並行 (also; too; as well; either)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 mui4 mui2 dou1 hai6 go3 sau6 fo3 jyun4.
examples.translation: My sister is also a shop assistant.

senses.definition: #依然；唔受轉折影響 (still; regardless of any contrast)

examples.text: 就算你哋唔講，我都大概知道嗰日發生咩事。
examples.jyutping: zau6 syun3 nei5 dei6 m4 gong2, ngo5 dou1 daai6 koi3 zi1 dou3 go2 jat6 faat3 sang1 me1 si6.
examples.translation: Even you guys don't talk to me, I can roughly know what happened that day.

senses.definition: 徹徹底底；冇任何遺漏 (totally; completely)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 架小巴完全失控，撞咗入油站。
examples.jyutping: gaa3 siu2 baa1 jyun4 cyun4 sat1 hung3, zong6 zo2 jap6 jau4 zaam6.
examples.translation: The minibus was totally uncontrollable and crashed into the gas station.

senses.definition: 俾提議嗰陣成日會用嘅詞 ((a word frequently used when making suggestions) how about; what about; why not)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 jat1 hai6 ting1 jat6 zoi3 lai4 gwo3 laa1.
examples.translation: Why not come again tomorrow?

senses.definition: 連接兩個選項，而兩個選項當中必須選擇其中一個；用喺選項前面 (either...or)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 你一係就死，一係就投降。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jat1 hai6 zau6 sei2, jat1 hai6 zau6 tau4 hong4.
examples.translation: Either you die or surrender.

senses.definition: 有可以依靠嘅嘢，所以冇嘢好怕；含貶義 ((usu. negative in meaning) to fear nothing as one has strong support; to be arrogant and dauntless)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 個殺人犯賄賂咗個法官，所以佢有恃無恐，唔怕會判死刑。
examples.jyutping: go3 saat3 jan4 faan2 kui2 lou6 zo2 go3 faat3 gun1, so2 ji5 keoi5 jau5 ci5 mou4 hung2, m4 paa3 wui5 pun3 sei2 jing4.
examples.translation: The murderer has no fear of being sentenced to death because he bribed the judge.

senses.definition: 呢一刻 (hereby; the present)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我現在宣佈，冠軍嘅得主係陳大文先生。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jin6 zoi6 syun1 bou3, gun3 gwan1 ge3 dak1 zyu2 hai6 can4 daai6 man4 sin1 saang1.
examples.translation: I hereby announce that Mr. Chan Tai Man is the champion.

senses.definition: 剩低或者額外嘅數量 (remaining or excessive amount)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 免收學費嘅舊式民辦#學校，一般提供基礎教育（量詞：間） ("free school"; (privately-built, old-style) public (elementary) school without school fees)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 文武廟義學喺1880年創辦，後來歸東華醫院管理，成為東華第一間義學。
examples.jyutping: man4 mou5 miu2 ji6 hok6 hai2 jat1 baat3 baat3 ling4 nin4 cong3 baan6, hau6 loi4 gwai1 dung1 waa4 ji1 jyun2 gun2 lei5, sing4 wai4 dung1 waa2 dai6 jat1 gaan1 ji6 hok6.
examples.translation: The Man Mo Temple Free School, founded in 1880, was later managed by Tung Wah Hospital and became the first Tung Wah free school.

senses.definition: 形容技巧好快上手，難在做得出色精湛 (describing a skill which can be learnt easily but is hard to excel in)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我睇人哋做就以為係手板眼見工夫，實情係易學難精。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 tai2 jan4 dei6 zou6 zau6 ji5 wai4 hai6 sau2 baan2 ngaan5 gin3 gung1 fu1, sat6 cing4 hai6 ji6 hok6 naan4 zing1.
examples.translation: I thought it would be quite simple to pick up by the looks of it, but in truth it is hard to excel in.

senses.definition: 形容文字或者畫像描繪得非常生動逼真 ((of writing or drawing) to stand vividly revealed on the paper)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 魔鬼博聞強記、雄辯滔滔嘅印象躍然紙上。
examples.jyutping: mo1 gwai2 bok3 man4 koeng4 gei3, hung4 bin6 tou1 tou1 ge3 jan3 zoeng6 joek3 jin4 zi2 soeng6.
examples.translation: The devil's vast knowledge, good memory and eloquent speech are portrayed vividly in words.

senses.definition: 為咗報答對方，承諾同佢結婚，將成個人奉獻畀佢 (to pledge to marry someone (as an act of gratitude or to repay a big favour))
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 加速然後從後邊追上向前邊嘅嘢 (to catch up; to overtake a party in front)

senses.definition: 即係#熱情 (passion)

examples.translation: radiating passion

senses.definition: 憂愁患難 (distress; misery)

examples.translation: awareness of past hardship (that informs current decisions)

senses.definition: 一件事發生嘅時間比預計嘅遲咗 (to delay)

examples.text: 因颱風關係，好多班機都延誤。

examples.translation: Due to the typhoon, planes are stuck in the airport.

senses.definition: #但係；#不過 (but; however; yet)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 子宮頸癌係常見嘅癌症，但係好多女人對呢個病一無所知。
examples.translation: Cervical cancer is quite a common cancer; however, most women do not know much about the illness.

senses.definition: 向其他人提出一啲自己想得到嘅嘢，係語氣強硬嘅措辭 (to ask; to demand; to require; to claim)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jiu1 kau4 gaa1 san1
examples.translation: to demand a pay rise

examples.text: 我要求你哋每星期睇一本書。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jiu1 kau4 nei5 dei6 mui5 sing1 kei4 tai2 jat1 bun2 syu1.
examples.translation: You have to read one book every week.

senses.definition: 更加早或者重要 (priority; first; preferential)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: bun2 dei6 jau1 sin1

senses.definition: 因為身體重要器官得唔到足夠血液供應，導致器官無法正常運作，嚴重可以導致死亡 ((medical) shock)

examples.jyutping: gwo3 man5 sing3 jau1 hak1
examples.translation: anaphylactic shock

senses.definition: 突然失去知覺；呢個唔係醫學層面嘅標準用法 (loss of consciousness; nonstandard terminology (usage discouraged in medical fields))

examples.jyutping: dat6 jin4 jau1 hak1
examples.translation: sudden loss of consciousness

senses.definition: 泛指燕科嘅#雀鳥，係一種#候鳥，體型細，有又長又尖嘅#翼 同埋分叉嘅#尾，主要靠食#昆蟲 維生（量詞：隻） (swallow)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 春天到咗，今朝我見到有燕子喺樓下嗰樖榕樹上面起咗個巢。
examples.jyutping: ceon1 tin1 dou3 zo2, gam1 ziu1 ngo5 gin3 dou2 jau5 jin3 zi2 hai2 lau4 haa6 go2 po1 jung4 syu6 soeng6 min6 hei2 zo2 go3 caau4.
examples.translation: Spring has arrived. This morning I saw swallows build a nest on the banyan tree on the ground floor.

senses.definition: 喺海上面嘅養魚建築物；香港嚟講，魚排會同陸地完全分開，係一啲主要用木頭同膠桶搭建嘅水上屋，間開一格格養魚（量詞：個） (mariculture raft)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 亦即#鬼佬 ，對外國白人嘅貶稱 （量詞：個） (Caucasian (commonly used as a pejorative))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 量度温度差別，單位係#焦耳 (amount of energy)

senses.definition: 營養學入面表達食物所含有嘅能量，單位係#卡路里 ((nutrition) food energy)
會影響一件事情嘅參數（量詞：個／項／種） (factor; element)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今次火燭好大機會有人為因素。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 fo2 zuk1 hou2 daai6 gei1 wui6 jau5 jan4 wai4 jan1 sou3
examples.translation: It is very likely that human factors are involved in this fire.

senses.definition: 有可喜可賀嘅嘢發生嗰陣會用嘅短句 (an expression used when something worth celebration happens)

examples.text: 佢終於成功喇！有請小鳳姐！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zung1 jyu1 sing4 gung1 laa3, jau5 ceng2 siu2 fung2 ze1
examples.translation: He has finally succeed! Let's celebrate!

keywords: jau5 ceng2 siu2 fung2 ze1:jau5 cing2 siu2 fung2 ze1

senses.definition: 即係風乾咗嘅#魚泡，一個可以充氣嘅魚內臟，用嚟調節浮沉 (fish maw; fish bladder)

examples.jyutping: suk1 mai5 jyu4 tou5 gang1

senses.definition: 將搣成一個圈嘅洋葱油炸嘅小食（量詞：件／個） (onion ring)

senses.definition: #任由，#隨得，根據某人嘅意願去做 (let it be, never mind, ignore)

examples.jyutping: jau2 dak1 keoi5 gai3 zuk6 fan3 laa1.
examples.translation: Just let him continue sleeping.

senses.definition: 用係陳述句末，表示限止語氣，有沖淡語意作用，多數同「#只是」、「#不過」、「#僅僅」連用，類似粵語句末助詞「#啫」同「#之嘛」 (only; just)
senses.label: 助詞

examples.text: 我唔係唔開心，只係有啲失望啫。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 hai6 m4 hoi1 sam1, zi2 hai6 jau5 di1 sat1 mong6 ze1.
examples.translation: I ain't unhappy. I'm just a little bit disappointed.

senses.definition: 靠捕魚或者養魚為生嘅人（量詞：個） (fisherman)

examples.jyutping: sai1 gung3 zung6 jau5 m4 siu2 jyu4 man4.
examples.translation: There are still many fishermen in Sai Kung.

senses.definition: 衣服；通常係指比較華麗或者隆重嘅服飾（量詞：襲／件／套） (apparel, garment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 點解啱身嘅衫，而家我都着唔落嘅？
examples.jyutping: dim2 gaai2 ngaam1 san1 ge3 saam1, ji4 gaa1 ngo5 dou1 zoek3 m4 lok6 ge2?

examples.text: 買影音器材嘅時候要考慮實際需要，例如你個廳勁細，你冇理由買部大電視。
examples.translation: When you buy audio & visual gadgets, you should think about your needs. For example, if your sitting room is small, you should not buy a big TV.

senses.definition: 一種質地薄又貼身嘅褲，原先係為咗專畀做#瑜伽 嗰陣着（量詞：條） (yoga pants)

examples.text: 酒店啲浴巾通常都係白色。
examples.jyutping: zau2 dim3 di1 juk6 gan1 tung1 soeng4 dou1 hai6 baak6 sik1.
examples.translation: Bath towels provided by hotels are usually in white.

senses.definition: 落喺#浸浴 嘅水入面嘅粉狀水溶性礦物質 (bath salt)

senses.definition: 即係#梳打水 (sparkling water)

examples.text: 上堂偷食糖唔可以食軟糖，唔係咬下咬下會畀老師發現。

senses.definition: 同 #佣金 （量詞：筆） (commission fee)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 ji5 ging1 lei4 hoi1 zo2 jan4 sai3.

senses.definition: 紙幣；唔係硬幣 (banknotes (as opposed to coins); literally 'soft stuff')

examples.jyutping: cing2 gau3 deoi2 soeng4 si3 jung6 sing4 mong5 lai4 jing4 gau3 soeng1 ze2.

senses.definition: 房屋業權嘅持有人（量詞：個） (owner of real estate)

senses.definition: 貓嘅品種，英國短毛貓嘅簡稱 (British shorthair)

senses.definition: #日蝕 發生時當#月球 行到一個位置，喺#地球 睇倒部份#太陽 嘅情況 (partial solar eclipse)

senses.definition: #耳仔 分泌出嚟嘅污垢，通常係啡黃色 (ear wax)

examples.translation: He attends this ceremony pro forma.

senses.definition: #羽毛球 嘅別稱 (badminton)

senses.definition: 研究點樣將科學知識實踐嘅學科 (applied science)

senses.definition: 喺立法機關入面，負責提出、審核法案，決定批唔批准公共開支同埋監察政府嘅人員。（量詞：位／名／個） (legislator; councillor)

senses.definition: 唔尋常嘅事件，通常係講一啲可以透過肉眼或者儀器觀察嘅#異常#景象。 (abnomal phenomenon)

examples.translation: astronomical abnormalities

senses.definition: 喺基督教教義中一個常見嘅詞彙，指一種從天上而來、特別咁睇見嘅啓示同引導，意思相似於《聖經》中其他嘅「啓示」、「默示」等詞。《聖經》中記載嘅好多異象都係睇到超自然嘅景象，或者有關未來嘅預言。 (Vision)

可食用動物肝臟。「#肝」、「#乾」同音，廣東盛產水稻，乾旱係大忌，乾旱相反詞係濕#潤，所以為咗避諱而創造新字「膶」。 (animal liver as food; the Cantonese word for "liver" sounds like "dry", a big taboo in Canton as many farmers rely on plenty of water to grow rice, so the word for "moist" is used as a euphemism to represent "liver"; 膶, the new character created to represent "liver", replaces the "water" radical in the word for "moist" (潤) with a "meat" radical.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zyu1 jeon2
examples.translation: pig liver

senses.definition: 「#乾」嘅避諱字，原因同上。 (for the same reason as the above, it work as an euphemism in Cantonese to replace "dry" with "moist")

examples.jyutping: 豆腐乾
examples.translation: dried tofu

senses.definition: 未滿足；唔 #夠喉 (to have not given full expression; to still want some more)

senses.definition: 歇後語：死跟。意指基礎差，實力弱，只能跟風，難以獨當一面。源自#話事啤 （#沙蟹） 玩法，二仔係最細，若底牌係二仔，難有機會贏，只好跟其他對手落注，靜待機會。 (sandwich pun of which latter part is "follow until die" (being obligated to follow). Means someone whose foundations are weak, who is weak in strength, or who can only be a follower but not a pioneer. Originated from poker game Five Card Stud (Show Hand); when dealt a 2 (the lowest value) as the face-down card, the only course of action is to follow along what others are betting. Literally: dealt a 2 as face-down card)

examples.text: 我係屋邨仔出身，二仔底，唔勤力啲實聽乞食。

senses.definition: 無論咩要求都可以滿足 (to respond to every plea; to grant whatever is requested)

examples.text: 阿嫲咁錫你，梗係對你有求必應啦。
examples.jyutping: aa3 maa4 gam3 sek3 nei5, gang2 hai6 deoi3 nei5 jau5 kau4 bit1 jing3 laa1.
examples.translation: Grandma loves you so much that she would grant your every wish.

senses.definition: 傷天害理嘅事（量詞：樣／件） (immoral or sinful things one has done, especially in the context of karma)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你做埋咁多陰質嘢會有報應㗎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 zou6 maai4 gam3 do1 jam1 zat1 je5 wui5 jau5 bou3 jing3 gaa3.
examples.translation: You have done too many immoral things. Karma will get to you.

senses.definition: 形容人做嘢好有責任感，令人信賴 (responsible; trustworthy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 好羨慕你有個咁有交帶嘅仔，唔使令人操心。
examples.jyutping: hou2 sin6 mou6 nei5 jau5 go3 gam3 jau5 gaau1 daai3 ge3 zai2, m4 sai2 ling6 jan4 cou1 sam1.
examples.translation: I am envious of you having such a responsible son. You need not worry about him.

senses.definition: 刀鋭利嘅部分 (the sharp end of a knife)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: dou1 jan6
examples.translation: a knife

senses.definition: 喺#廣東 一帶紮根並且發揚嘅傳統表演藝術 (Cantonese opera)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 以#粵語 演唱、流行於粵語地區嘅傳統曲藝，同#粵劇 關係密切；形式包括清唱、説唱、彈唱等（量詞：首） (traditional Cantonese tunes)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 內容有條理，唔凌亂 ((of contents) organised)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢位小姐講説話有條不紊。
examples.jyutping: ni1 wai2 siu2 ze2 gong2 syut3 waa6 jau5 tiu4 bat1 man5.
examples.translation: This lady speaks in an organized way.

senses.definition: 人嘅數量 (number of people; headcount)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢份工好受歡迎，申請人數好多。
examples.jyutping: ni1 fan6 gung1 hou2 sau6 fun1 jing4, san1 cing2 jan4 sou3 hou2 do1.
examples.translation: This job is very popular that many people have applied for it.

senses.definition: 有好多；有好充裕、好豐富嘅份量 (to have plenty of)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 daai6 baa2 cin2.
examples.translation: He has loads of money.

senses.definition: 漫無目的噉喺啲公眾地方度行嚟行去 (to wander around the streets)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我唔想返屋企，所以喺街度遊蕩咗兩個鐘。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 soeng2 faan1 uk1 kei2, so2 ji5 hai2 gaai1 dou6 jau4 dong6 zo2 loeng5 go3 zung1.
examples.translation: I didn't want to go back home, so I wandered around the streets for two hours.

senses.definition: 唔發出任何聲音 (to keep totally silent; noiselessly)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢喺呢度一個人都唔識，俾我都一聲不響坐埋一邊啦。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 ni1 dou6 jat1 go3 jan4 dou1 m4 sik1, bei2 ngo5 dou1 jat1 seng1 bat1 hoeng2 co5 maai4 jat1 bin1 laa1.
examples.translation: He don't even know a single person in here, if I were him, I would also keep totally silent.

senses.definition: 同市場大致走勢相反 (against the market trend)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: jik6 si5 kwong3 zoeng1
examples.translation: to expand after the economic downturn

senses.definition: 豬嘅大髀（量詞：隻） (ham hock; pork knuckle)

jap6 dak1 ceoi4 fong2 ceot1 dak1 teng1 tong4

senses.definition: 形容一個女人做家務做得好，社交上亦唔失禮，係一個理想伴侶 (to describe a woman who is both a good housewife and socially accomplished, i.e. an ideal wife; literally, can go into the kitchen or the living room)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你娶到呢個老婆真係羨慕死人喇，入得廚房，又出得廳堂。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ceoi2 dou2 nei1 go3 lou5 po4 zan1 hai6 sin6 mou6 sei2 jan4 laa3, jap6 dak1 cyu4 fong2, jau6 ceot1 dak1 teng1 tong4.
examples.translation: I envy you so much that you married such a good wife; she is both socially accomplished and a good housewife.

senses.definition: 一種多#層#住宅，原本泛指唔係#唐樓 嘅住宅建築物，有既定間隔，一梯多伙；近依幾十年已經冇再起唐樓，「洋樓」只係常見於已落成嘅單幢大廈名稱（量詞：幢／層） (mansion; non-tenement house)

senses.definition: 同#露台（量詞：個） (balcony)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: He refused our invitation indirectly.

senses.definition: 一個人 (alone; by oneself)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 一丁友食飯幾好吖，可以靜靜哋諗嘢，雖然係毒咗少少。
examples.jyutping: jat1 ding1 jau2 sik6 faan6 gei2 hou2 aa1, ho2 ji5 zing6 zing2 dei2 nam2 je5, seoi1 jin4 hai6 duk6 zo2 siu2 siu2.

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jung6 zo2 seng4 maan6 gei2 man1 zou6 go3 ceoi4 jik6 mou4 liu4 cing4.
examples.translation: He spent over ten thousand on an underarm hair removal treatment.

senses.definition: 兒童遊樂場嘅設施，長板搖擺而#支點 固定，兩個人坐喺長板兩端會輪流一上一落（量詞：塊） (seesaw)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 行政主任嘅俗稱；特別係講緊#公務員 行政主任成個職系入面，相對低級嘅行政主任（量詞：個） (short for Executive Officer)

senses.definition: 比喻進步神速 (to advance at a high speed; to improve fast)

examples.jyutping: ji1 hok6 ge3 faat3 zin2 jat1 jat6 cin1 lei5.
examples.translation: There have been huge strides in the medical sciences.

senses.definition: 用#乳房 夾住#陰莖 磨擦嚟獲得快感嘅性行為 (mammary intercourse)

examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 lyun6 zaak6 je5 faa1 aa3!
examples.translation: Don't pick wild flowers!

senses.definition: 新生力量或者派別突然興起 ((of a new power or party) to rise in an unexpected manner)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢間學校喺近年區內排名異軍突起，多咗唔少家長幫佢哋嘅子女報讀。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 hok6 haau6 hai2 gan6 nin4 keoi1 noi6 paai4 ming4 ji6 gwan1 dat6 hei2, do1 zo2 m4 siu2 gaa1 zoeng2 bong1 keoi5 dei6 ge3 zi2 neoi5 bou3 duk6.
examples.translation: The school has been having a sharp rise in their ranking in the district these years. A lot more parents apply for admission for their children.

examples.translation: Z

senses.definition: #釣魚 嘅工具，係一支又長又幼嘅棍，上面鑲住魚絲，有魚上釣就可以拉條魚上嚟 （量詞：枝） (fishing rod)

examples.jyutping: jau1 hau5 ge3 san1 nin4

examples.text: 佢哋嚟到香港，買嘢唔會忍手。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 lai4 dou3 hoeng1 gong2, maai5 je5 m4 wui5 jan2 sau2.
examples.translation: When they came to Hong Kong, they didn't restrain themselves from buying things.

senses.definition: 有條「人」字形嘅帶隔開腳指公同其他腳指嘅#拖鞋（量詞：隻／對） (flip-flops; the type that has strips that resemble the character 人, separating the big toe and other toes)

examples.translation: I don't regard someone as a middle class unless they have a six-figure paycheck per month.

senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢間學校實行小組教學，因材施教，提高咗學生嘅學習興趣。

examples.translation: Teaching in a small group and in accordance to students' abilities and aptitudes is the strategy of this school. It successfully increased their interests in learning.

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ge3 gaau3 juk6 seoi1 jiu3 jyu5 si4 bing6 zeon3.

senses.definition: 熱心嘅人 (kind-hearted people)

examples.text: 好多有心人捐款俾窮人。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 jau5 sam1 jan4 gyun1 fun2 bei2 kung4 jan4
examples.translation: Many kind-hearted people donate money to the poor.

examples.jyutping: nei5 gam3 daan1 seon4, siu2 sam1 bei2 jau5 sam1 jan4 lei6 jung6.

examples.translation: salt and pepper squid

senses.definition: 如果唔係；如果冇；唔係……嘅話 (if not; if ... isn't there)

examples.translation: If he hadn't lazed around, he wouldn't have failed this test.

senses.definition: 畀小朋友坐，有圍欄包住嘅#凳（量詞：張） (X; literally "chair cage")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 唔會挑選學生，平等咁向所有學生傳授知識 (to teach everybody without bias or discrimination)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zou6 lou5 si1 jiu3 jau5 gaau3 mou4 leoi6.
examples.translation: To teach everybody without bias or discrimination is what every teacher should.

senses.definition: 多數人唔知道，冇正式記錄或者宣佈嘅事，多數關於名人（量詞：件） (anecdote)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個網誌上載咗好多不為人知嘅名人軼事。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 mong5 zi3 soeng6 zoi3 zo2 hou2 do1 bat1 wai4 jan4 zi1 ge3 ming4 jan4 jat6 si6.
examples.translation: This blog has uploaded a lot of anecdotes of celebrities that people commonly do not know.

senses.definition: 不斷煩擾、纏擾住對方，好似隻#冤鬼 咁 (to pester, to keep on disturb, stalking on someone, just like a grudged ghost)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你成日冤住我都冇用𠿪，我冇錢借畀你呀。
examples.jyutping: nei5 seng4 jat6 jyun1 zyu6 ngo5 dou1 mou5 jung6 gaa2, ngo5 mou5 cin2 ze3 bei2 nei5 aa3.
examples.translation: It is no use pestering me all the time. I don't have money to lend you.

senses.definition: 飲剩湯 (to have leftover soup)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 任對方自由選擇，唔引導或者加以阻撓 (to allow; to let one do as one pleases)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jau2 nei5 gaan2
examples.translation: to choose whatever you want

senses.definition: 呢樣唔鍾意果樣又唔鍾意，成日投訴同挑剔啲嘢，令人覺得好麻煩；有貶義 (to complain a lot, often unnecessarily; to bitch)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 咪再嫌三嫌四啦，廉價酒店係咁㗎啦。
examples.jyutping: mai5 zoi3 jim4 saam1 jim4 sei3 laa1, lim4 gaa3 zau2 dim3 hai6 gam2 gaa3 laa1.
examples.translation: Please stop bitching. This is what cheap hotels are like.

senses.definition: 公元前3世紀至公元1世紀一個民族名稱。早期以游牧為生，住喺北亞，並經常同#匈奴 發生衝突，其後西遷至中亞，慢慢發展成國家。由於位處於#絲綢之路，控制東西貿易，令佢慢慢變得強大。後來俾匈奴攻擊，一分為二：西遷至伊犁嘅，被稱為大月氏；南遷至今日嘅中國#甘肅、#青海 一帶嘅，被稱為小月氏。 (Yuezhi, an ancient people first described in Chinese histories as nomadic pastoralists living in an arid grassland area in the western part of the modern Chinese province of Gansu, during the 1st millennium BC)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 為咗；用嚟帶出某件事嘅原因、動機 (because of)
senses.label: 介詞

examples.jyutping: jan1 wai6 nei5 ngo5 sin1 zi3 lau4 dai1 gaa3.
examples.translation: I am staying because of you.

senses.definition: 同#食屎 (to eat shit)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: nei5 jaak3 ke1 laa1!
examples.translation: Eat shit!

senses.definition: 用嚟鬧人，即係#食屎 (a vulgar way to express contempt or to tell someone to leave, "go eat shit", "eat shit and die!".)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 將一個約定好嘅時間推後，只會形容推後至少一日嘅事 (to postpone, at least by a day)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 因天氣關係，比賽要延期舉行。
examples.translation: Due to bad weather, the match will be postponed.

senses.definition: 冇任何缺點 (perfect; flawless)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: jyun4 mei5 mou4 haa4
examples.translation: perfect in every way

senses.definition: #遠 (far; distant)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: far; distant

senses.definition: 改寫、翻譯、轉發分享、作出解釋嗰時嘅文字根據（量詞：篇／段） (original text; master copy; source text)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 做文學分析一定要引用原文。
examples.jyutping: zou6 man4 hok6 fan1 sik1 jat1 ding6 jiu3 jan5 jung6 jyun4 man4.
examples.translation: You must quote the original text when doing literature analysis.

senses.definition: #和好；#和解；#諒解 (to make peace; to be reconciled)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 由相同祖先語言演化而嚟嘅一組語言（量詞：個） (language family)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hon3 zong6 jyu5 hai6
examples.translation: Sino-Tibetan languages

senses.definition: 非常開心，開心到癲咗噉 (to be wild with joy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 贏咗冠軍之後，佢欣喜若狂。
examples.jyutping: jeng4 zo2 gun3 gwan1 zi1 hau6, keoi5 jan1 hei2 joek6 kwong4.
examples.translation: He is wild with joy after he won the champion.

senses.definition: 以前木門整個門恤嘅結構 (in old days, the entire latch component of door pair)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #元寶、#蠟燭、#香 嘅統稱 (ceremonial paper money, candles and incense, means all the burnt offerings for the  ancestors)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 掃墓嗰陣，小祝燒啲元寶蠟燭香畀祝叔叔。
examples.translation: While tomb sweeping, Little Jok burnt some paper money, candle and incense for Uncle Jok.

senses.definition: 對於一種語言入面自然用法嘅直覺 (Sprachgefühl, the intuitive grasp of the natural idiom of a language)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 學一種語言要培養語感，一定要多睇多聽。
examples.jyutping: hok6 jat1 zung2 jyu5 jin4 jiu3 pui4 joeng5 jyu5 gam2, jat1 ding6 jiu3 do1 tai2 do1 teng1.
examples.translation: To nurture the intuitive grasp of a second language, it is essential to read and listen more.

senses.definition: 形狀似煙仔嘅#餅乾（量詞：條） (cigar biscuits)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 因人而異，並唔係全部 (not everything; not everyone; it depends)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 一啲啲人啦，唔係個個都鍾意食榴槤。
examples.jyutping: jat1 dit1 dit1 jan4 laa1, m4 hai6 go3 go3 dou1 zung1 ji3 sik6 lau4 lin4.
examples.translation: It depends, not everyone likes durians.

senses.definition: 本指機械送返工廠維修，後借指入#醫院。唔正式嘅講法 ((informal) to go to a hospital; to be hospitalised; literally: to enter a factory)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jap6 cong2 daai6 sau1
examples.translation: to be hospitalised for a serious illness or injury

senses.definition: 人哋用過嘅嘢 (second-hand goods/product)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 樓上間舖頭專賣二手貨。
examples.jyutping: lau4 soeng6 gaan1 pou3 tau2 zyun1 maai6 ji6 sau2 fo3.
examples.translation: The shop upstairs sells second-hand goods exclusively.

senses.definition: 用#相機 將畫面紀錄落嚟 (to take a picture with a camera)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: m4 goi1 bong1 ngo5 dei6 jing2 zoeng1 soeng2 aa1!
examples.translation: Can you please take a photo for us?

senses.definition: 形容事物有時出現，有時又唔喺度噉；有時睇到，有時睇唔到 (to appear indistinctly; literally, to be partly hidden and partly visible)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 喺濃霧之中，對面嘅高山若隱若現。
examples.jyutping: hai2 nung4 mou6 zi1 zung1, deoi3 min6 ge3 gou1 saan1 joek6 jan2 joek6 jin6.

senses.definition: 原本嘅諗法；通常係俾人誤解咗之後，用嚟講原本想表達嘅意思 (original meaning; original sense; original intention)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我原意唔係想傷害任何人㗎。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jyun4 ji3 m4 hai6 soeng2 soeng1 hoi6 jam6 ho4 jan4 gaa3.

senses.definition: 個個都讚 (praised by everyone)

examples.translation: He cooks so well that everyone appreciates it.

senses.definition: 香港#高等法院 嘅一部份，處理嚴重刑事案件、高金額嘅民事訴訟、#司法覆核 等等，亦會處理某啲上訴案件，例如地區裁判法院、小額錢債審裁處嘅上訴 (the Court of First Instance; part of the High Court of Hong Kong, which handles serious criminal cases, high stakes civil cases, juridicial review cases, etc. It also handles appeals, for example from magistrate courts, the small claims tribunal)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 朗讀書本內容畀讀者聽嘅錄音（量詞：本） (audible book)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 煙葉嘅葉柄同葉脈 (the stem and leaf veins of a tobacco leaf)

senses.definition: 對中年以上女性嘅稱呼，通常用喺詞尾（量詞：個） (aunt; form of address to a middle-aged female person; usually at the end of the word)

examples.translation: auntie

senses.definition: 同阿媽嘅姐妹相關嘅親戚 (maternal aunt)

examples.jyutping: ji4 maa1

senses.definition: 形容位置或者擺法好難發現 ((of placement of an object) concealed; shrouded; hidden from view)

examples.text: 呢座山入面有個隱蔽嘅廢墟。
examples.jyutping: ni1 zo6 saan1 jap6 min6 jau5 go3 jan2 bai3 ge3 fai3 heoi1.

senses.definition: 做唔到確實嘅決定，而家#揀 好咗一樣嘢，轉頭又想揀第二樣 (indecisive, always changing one's mind, fickle)

senses.definition: 指信奉#耶教、即係#基督教，而一般熱衷於教會活動同傳教嘅嘅青年；因為同#椰青 食字而得名 (Christian youth, especially those passionate in their faith)

senses.definition: #耶和華見證人 嘅簡稱 (abbreviation for Jehovah's Witnesses; JW)

senses.definition: 好似蚯蚓咁移動 (to creep; to crawl; to wiggle; like worms; (medic.) peristalsis)

jyutping: jau5 gam1 sang1 mou5 loi4 sai3

examples.text: 呢球波有今生冇來世呀！美斯好波！
examples.jyutping: ni1 kau4 bo1 jau5 gam1 sang1 mou5 loi4 sai3 aa3! mei5 si1 hou2 bo1!

senses.definition: 同其他人訂一個時間，一齊做一啲嘢（比「約」更加正式） (to make an appointment (more formal than「約」))

examples.translation: If you want to meet Mr. Chan, you have to make an appointment in advance.

senses.definition: 向一啲提供服務嘅機構訂一個時間，接受佢哋嘅服務，例如餐廳、診所 (to book, to reserve (e.g. a table))

examples.text: 我想預約星期一嘅自助餐。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 soeng2 jyu6 joek3 sing1 kei4 jat1 ge3 zi6 zo6 caan1.

senses.definition: #番石榴 嘅一個品種；皮上面有好似胭脂紅嘅顏色 (a species of guava with red skin)

senses.definition: 人哋嘅幫助 (favour; bounty)

examples.text: 受人恩惠就應該諗辦法去報答。

senses.definition: 經過口攝入奶類飲品 (to drink milk)

senses.definition: 喺某個地方突出自己嘅存在 (to appear; to arrive)

senses.definition: 一個方法解決問題，唔考慮個別嘅情況 (to prescribe a single solution in solving different problems; literally: to cut everything in one slice)

senses.definition: 一個活動，或者比賽嘅完結 ((of activity or event) to be finished)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ji6 bei2 ji6 jyun4 coeng4
examples.translation: the match ends with 2:2

senses.definition: 用身體近距離同敵人交手，唔依靠任何工具 (to fight hand-to-hand)

senses.definition: 同#做愛 (to make love; to have sex)
（正式場合用）唔好意思去#麻煩 人；好有禮貌咁#唔該 ((formal) to feel sorry to bother or trouble someone; "thank you" in a very formal manner)

examples.jyutping: jau5 lou4 nei5 bong1 ngo5 gaau1 gung1 fo3.
examples.translation: Sorry to trouble you for handing in my homework for me.

senses.definition: 做嘢開咗個頭，就會完成咗佢嘅#態度 (the attitude of wrapping up something nicely which has started)

examples.text: 好心你有頭有尾啲，搞掂份功課啦！

senses.definition: 露出真面目 (to unmask and expose the full picture)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢喺靚女面前扮有禮貌，唔夠兩分鐘就原形畢露。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 leng3 neoi2 min6 cin4 baan6 jau5 lai5 maau6, m4 gau3 loeng5 fan1 zung1 zau6 jyun4 jing4 bat1 lou6.
examples.translation: He pretended to be polite in front of pretty girls, but he soon exposed his true character within two minutes.

senses.definition:
一筆畀某個人嘅錢，換取佢保守某啲秘密，唔好講出去 (a fee paid to someone to keep quiet, to not report something(e.g. to the police) or to not give evidence in court, "hush money";

senses.definition: 泛指任何人類可以讀嘅電腦指令，通常係純文字文件 (source code)

jyutping: jau5 gwo3 zi1 ji4 mou4 bat1 kap6

senses.definition: 只會超越某個人或者某樣嘢，而唔會比唔上佢 (to be only better if not equal; to outshine)

examples.text: 佢畫畫嘅技巧比起佢師父，真係有過之而無不及。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 waak6 waa2 ge3 gei6 haau2 bei2 hei2 keoi5 si1 fu2, zan1 hai6 jau5 gwo3 zi1 ji4 mou4 bat1 kap6.

keywords: jau5 gwo3 zi1 ji4 mou4 bat1 kap6
jau gwo zi ji mou bat kap

senses.definition: （中醫術語）熱感冒，由感染風熱、焗親或#中暑 而引起嘅#感冒 ((Traditional Chinese Medicine) “hot flu”, influenza caused by heatstroke)

examples.text: 你呢隻係熱感，要解暑散熱，冷毛巾敷前額啦。

senses.definition: 有刺激性嘅流體流入隻眼，引起不適。 (some irritating liquid entered the eye, causing uncomforts)

senses.definition: 檢查物業單位有冇安全問題或裝修問題等等，通常喺買樓嘅時候會做 (to inspect a piece of property for safety or structural issues, etc.; usually done during purchase or sale of property)

examples.jyutping: jyun4 fau4 nap1 zi2

senses.definition: 難打嘅比賽；#逆境（量詞：場） (uphill battle; adversity; literally: unfavourable match)

examples.text: 打逆境波要冷靜有耐性。

senses.definition: 非常 #擔心，好多心事咁嘅樣 (to be deeply worried)

examples.jyutping: mau4 saat3 can4 saang1 ge3 jyun4 hung1 zau6 hai6 nei5!

senses.definition: 行喺前面為其他人指引方向 (to lead)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 jan5 ling5 ngo5 dei6 zau2 ceot1 kwan3 ging2.
examples.translation: He led us out of the touchy situation.

senses.definition: 缺乏主張，或者為咗討好人而模仿或者追隨人哋 (to imitate or follow somebody's every move)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢啲文章內容亦步亦趨，一啲主見都冇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 di1 man4 zoeng1 noi6 jung4 jik6 bou6 jik6 ceoi1, jat1 di1 zyu2 gin3 dou1 mou5.
examples.translation: The content of his articles always follow others without his own opinions.

jyutping: jau5 cin4 mou5 hau6 daa2 sei2 baa6 zau6

senses.definition: 豁出去，勇往直前，唔會退縮 (to go ahead bravely at all costs and never retreat)
senses.label: 語句

keywords: jau5 cin4 mou5 hau6 daa2 sei2 baa6 zau6
jau cin mou hau daa sei baa zau

senses.definition: 喺#懷孕 嘅#子宮 入面兩層堅韌、薄同透明嘅#膜，裝住#羊水 同#胚胎 或者#胎兒（量詞：塊） (amniotic sac, amniotic membranes)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 借助肢體動作，喺水中前進嘅運動同技能 (to swim)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 聽日個游泳比賽之前，你記得做足熱身。
examples.jyutping: ting1 jat6 go3 jau4 wing6 bei2 coi3 zi1 cin4, nei5 gei3 dak1 zou6 zuk1 jit6 san1.
examples.translation: Before the swimming competition tomorrow, don't forget to do enough warm-up exercise.

senses.definition: 一念之間嘅時間，表示極之短嘅時間。 (an instant; a very short moment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我有一剎那諗過要幫你。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jau5 jat1 saat3 naa5 nam2 gwo3 jiu3 bong1 nei5.
examples.translation: For a very short moment, I thought of helping you.

senses.definition: 夜盜蛾嘅幼蟲；晝伏夜出，雜食性，會隨住年齡由灰綠色變做黑色（量詞：條） (tobacco cutworm larva; cotton leafworm larva)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 以文字模擬#聲音 嘅詞（量詞：個） (onomatopoeia)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容女性身材性感 (sexy, seductive (of females, especially body shape); literally: inflammable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 san1 coi4 je5 fo2 dou3 bat1 dak1 liu5.
examples.translation: Her figure couldn't be sexier.

senses.definition: 形容言論、行為好大爭議 (controversial (of speech, action); flamebait)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 di1 jin4 leon6 hou2 je5 fo2
examples.translation: His comments were highly controversial.

senses.definition: 負責收集同遞送信件包裹嘅#郵政局 人員（量詞：個） (postman)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我好期待郵差派信俾我。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 kei4 doi6 jau4 caai1 paai3 seon3 bei2 ngo5.
examples.translation: I look forward to receiving a letter from the postman.

senses.definition: 一個人或者一堆人由一個地方走去另一個地方，引申為一個活動嘅舉行地點由一個地方變做另一個地方 (to move/shift; to be relocated to)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 由於天雨關係，比賽會移師到室內舉行。
examples.jyutping: jau4 jyu1 tin1 jyu5 gwaan1 hai6, bei2 coi3 wui5 ji4 si1 dou3 sat1 noi6 geoi2 hang4.
examples.translation: The competition is relocated to indoors because of the heavy rain.

senses.definition: 一個人條#腰 嘅圓周，係量度人體嘅圓周#三圍 之一 (waistline)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: dok6 jiu1 wai4
examples.translation: to measure one's waistline

senses.definition: 望住好遠嘅嘢；口頭少用 (to look far into distance from a high place; seldom used colloquially)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 從山頂遠眺維港景色，係特別浪漫嘅。
examples.jyutping: cung4 saan1 deng2 jyun5 tiu3 wai4 gong2 ging2 sik1, hai6 dak6 bit6 long6 maan6 ge3.
examples.translation: It is really romantic to enjoy the neon vista of Victoria Harbour from the Peak.

senses.definition: 露出牙齒，嘴角向外 (to show one's teeth)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢依起棚牙，笑得好開心。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ji1 hei2 paang4 ngaa4, siu3 dak1 hou2 hoi1 sam1.
examples.translation: She showed her teeth and laughed happily.

senses.definition: 方型嘅#喇叭 (loudspeaker)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #剔號 中間打斜向右下加一點而形成嘅符號，表示部份正確 ("half tick half cross" meaning partly correct (not to be confused with a crossed out check mark "⍻"))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 好容易（就）；成日都會 (easily; frequently; at every turn)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢俾人縱慣晒，郁啲就發脾氣。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bei2 jan4 zung3 gwaan3 saai3, juk1 di1 zau6 faat3 pei4 hei3.

senses.definition: #郵政 同#電訊 (post and telecommunications)

senses.definition: 有生命危險嘅意外；遇到血光之災 (to encounter life-threatening accidents; literally "winter melon and tofu")
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你唔好去當兵啦。萬一有咩冬瓜豆腐，我都唔知點算。
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hou2 heoi3 dong1 bing1 laa1. maan6 jat1 jau5 me1 dung1 gwaa1 dau6 fu6, ngo5 dou1 m4 zi1 dim2 syun3.
examples.translation: Can't you just give up on being a soldier? I don't know what to do if anything happens to you.

examples.jyutping: tai2 jing2 daai2
examples.translation: to watch a video tape

senses.definition: #格式；有相同嘅設定或者框架 (sample; template; format)

examples.translation: Her clothes are pure in style.

examples.translation: to insult

senses.definition: 長時間唔開心，收埋自己 (vexed; depressed; heavy-hearted)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢自從屋企人過身之後，一直都好憂鬱。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zi6 cung4 uk1 kei2 jan4 gwo3 san1 zi1 hau6, jat1 zik6 dou1 hou2 jau1 wat1.
examples.translation: He has been in depression since his family member passed away.

senses.definition: #有身己 嘅女人；#懷孕 嘅女人（量詞：個） (pregnant woman)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 jiu3 joeng6 zo6 bei2 jan6 fu5.
examples.translation: We should give our seats to pregnant women.

senses.definition: 暫停一個會議 (to adjourn a meeting)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 主席，劉議員仲未返嚟，我想申請休會十五分鐘。
examples.jyutping: zyu2 zik6, lau4 ji5 jyun4 zung6 mei6 faan1 lai4, ngo5 soeng2 san1 cing2 jau1 wui2 sap6 ng5 fan1 zung1.
examples.translation: Chairman, since Councillor Lau hasn't arrived here yet, I request to adjourn the meeting for 15 minutes.

senses.definition: 人為嘅#災難（量詞：次／場） (man-made calamity)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: saam1 fan1 tin1 zoi1, cat1 fan1 jan4 wo6
examples.translation: 30% of natural disaster and 70% of man-made calamity

senses.definition: 精彩；生動；令人讚歎 (vivid and dramatic; impressive; literally: having sound and colour)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 今次嘅晚會搞得有聲有色喎。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 ge3 maan5 wui2 gaau2 dak1 jau5 sing1 jau5 sik1 wo3.
examples.translation: The evening party tonight was so impressive.

senses.definition: 形容伴侶關係親密，感情深厚 (having a close and deep relationship with one's lover; joined at the hip; literally: as glue and as paint)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢哋兩個感情如膠似漆，好恩愛。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 loeng5 go3 gam2 cing4 jyu4 gaau1 ci5 cat1, hou2 jan1 oi3.
examples.translation: They love each other and have a close and deep relationship.

senses.definition: 理由正當，措詞嚴厲 (to speak sternly with the ground of justice)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 阿正義正辭嚴噉喝止嗰班童黨。
examples.jyutping: aa3 zing3 ji6 zing3 ci4 jim4 gam2 hot3 zi2 go2 baan1 tung4 dong2.
examples.translation: Ah Ching shouted sternly at the child gang to stop their wrongdoing.

senses.definition: 墊響#胚胎 或者#胎兒 同#羊膜 之間嘅#液體，胎兒可以響羊水之中活動 ((med.) amniotic fluid)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢穿咗羊水，佢老公就急急腳送咗佢去醫院。
examples.translation: Her husband hurried her to the hospital after her water broke.

senses.definition: 有冇（做過、做到）（比較正規） ((more formal) whether someone has done something or not)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 政府有冇將兒童當做有主見、有思考嘅獨立個體，睇重佢哋嘅意見？
examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 jau5 mou5 zoeng1 ji4 tung4 dong3 zou6 jau5 zyu2 gin3, jau5 si1 haau2 ge3 duk6 laap6 go3 tai2, tai2 cung5 keoi5 dei6 ge3 ji3 gin3?
examples.translation: Has the Government treated children as independent entities capable of forming their own views and independent thinking and given due weight to their views?

senses.definition: 出席#聆訊 (to attend hearing)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 被告由親友陪同到庭應訊。
examples.jyutping: bei6 gou3 jau4 can1 jau5 pui4 tung4 dou3 ting4 jing3 seon3.
examples.translation: Accompanied by relatives and friends, the defendant attended the court hearing.

senses.definition: 一件事發生嘅原因（量詞：個） ((of an incident) reason; cause)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 台灣警方正係調查粉塵爆炸嘅緣由。
examples.jyutping: toi4 waan1 ging2 fong1 zing3 hai6 diu6 caa4 fan2 can4 baau3 zaa3 ge3 jyun4 jau4.
examples.translation: The police in Taiwan is investigating into why the dust explosion happened.

senses.definition: 對中年或者老年男人嘅稱謂 (middle-aged and elderly men)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: jyu4 jung1
examples.translation: old man who is fishing

senses.definition: 自1940-1950年代興起同發展嘅一種音樂類型，主要以結他、低音結他及鼓為音樂骨幹；發展到後來，亦加有其他樂器嘅形式 (a music genre starting developing since the 1940s or the 1950s, which name, firstly used in the U.S., comes from "rock and roll")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 避免死亡 (to be saved; to be cured)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 而家有隻新藥可以醫倒佢，佢終於有救嘍！
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 jau5 zek3 san1 joek6 ho2 ji5 ji1 dou2 keoi5, keoi5 zung1 jyu1 jau5 gau3 lo3!
examples.translation: Now they have a new medicine to cure him, he can finally be saved.

senses.definition: 避免一啲災禍嘅發生 (to be avoid a bad situation)

examples.text: 呢次有救喇，陳生肯借錢畀我哋呀！
examples.jyutping: ni1 ci3 jau5 gau3 laa3, can4 saang1 hang2 ze3 cin2 bei2 ngo5 dei6 aa3!
examples.translation: Here comes Mr Chan to the rescue! He's willing to lend us money!

senses.definition: 明白事理；有智慧嘅（多數形容領導人） ((usually of leaders) wise and able; sagacious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 老細係一個賢明嘅領導人，我好享受幫佢做嘢。
examples.translation: My boss is a wise and sagacious leader. I enjoy working for him.

senses.definition: 好無辜咁俾人捲入一啲壞事、為無關嘅某人或物帶嚟負面影響 (to be involved into something bad as an innocent, to cause collateral damage to someone)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to involve / to cause collateral damage to the innocent (lit.: to involve the fish in the pond)

senses.definition: 去到一個地方，順從嗰度嘅風俗習慣 ("When in Rome, do as the Romans do."; to follow the customs or rules of a certain place; literally: to follow a village's customs when entering it)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 入鄉隨俗，你去到日本，應該入屋除鞋。
examples.jyutping: jap6 hoeng1 ceoi4 zuk6, nei5 heoi3 dou3 jat6 bun2, jing1 goi1 jap6 uk1 ceoi4 haai4.
examples.translation: In Japan, you should take off your shoes when entering a house, so as to follow the custom.

senses.definition: 對一樣嘢或者一個人，所有評價都係好嘅，冇唔好嘅嘢 (to have nothing but praise)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 老闆份人好好，啲員工個個對佢都有讚冇彈。
examples.jyutping: lou5 baan2 fan6 jan4 hou2 hou2, di1 jyun4 gung1 go3 go3 deoi3 keoi5 dou1 jau5 zaan3 mou5 taan4.
examples.translation: The boss is a nice person. All employees have nothing but praise for him.

senses.definition: 好多人都覺得好驚同不安 (panic in the community)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: #沙士 流行期間，市民人心惶惶。
examples.jyutping: saa1 si2 lau4 hang4 kei4 gaan1, si5 man4 jan4 sam1 wong4 wong4.
examples.translation: There was panic in the community during the period of SARS.

phonetic.original: jau5 ji6 sing3 mou5 jan4 sing3
jyutping: jau5 ji6 sing3 mou5 jan4 sing3

senses.definition: 異性戀者以心儀對象為先，就忽略咗自己嘅朋友 ((of heterosexuals) to ignore one's friend when one has found a boy or girlfriend)
senses.label: 語句

jau ji sing mou jan sing

senses.definition: 軍裝 (military uniform)

examples.jyutping: go3 wong4 zi2 fuk1 soeng2 cyun4 san1 jung4 zong1, jing2 zan1 wai1 seoi2

senses.definition: 切除雄性生殖器官 (to castrate)

senses.definition: 除去最重要果部分 (to deprive sth of its essential parts; to delete important parts of something)

senses.definition: 對男性平輩嘅尊稱（量詞：位） ((usu. used to address males) my dear friend; fellow)

senses.definition: 形容大部分人持同一傾向 (lopsided; one-sided)

examples.translation: Lopsided result shows the voters' support to the Republican Party in this round of election.

senses.definition: 明明冇罪畀人誣告變成有罪 (injustice; false accusation; unfair treatment; persecution; defamation)

examples.translation: I am attending a party, so I will skip dinner tonight.

senses.definition: 同#容納 (to contain; to be able to hold)

senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢件係最後一件現貨喇。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gin6 hai6 zeoi3 hau6 jat1 gin6 jin6 fo3 laa3.

senses.definition: 管理#監獄 嘅職員，佢哋主要職責係看守犯人，維持監獄嘅秩序 (prison officer; correctional officer; penal officer)

examples.text: 獄警同啲#監躉 嘅阿頭都會打好關係。

senses.definition: 放蕩淫賤嘅婦女 (slut)

senses.definition: 巴士術語，泛指樣版車，或車隊編號系列排第一嘅巴士 ((bus) prototype or the first bus in a fleet number series.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺#植物 園區裏面#照顧 植物嘅人（量詞：個／名） (gardener)

examples.text: 多得園丁落足心機照顧啲花草，個花園先可以咁靚。
examples.jyutping: do1 dak1 jyun4 ding1 lok6 zuk1 sam1 gei1 ziu3 gu3 di1 faa1 cou2, go3 faa1 jyun2 sin1 ho2 ji5 gam3 leng3.

senses.definition: 帶有#威嚇 嘅公開#聲明、預言 (to intimidate/threaten by public announcement)

examples.text: 恐怖分子揚言要為佢哋戰死嘅兄弟報復。
examples.jyutping: hung2 bou3 fan6 zi2 joeng4 jin4 jiu3 wai6 keoi5 dei6 zin3 sei2 ge3 hing1 dai6 bou3 fuk6.
examples.translation: The terrorists threaten to avenge their fallen brothers with blood.

senses.definition: 食物名，泛指源自#印度 嘅餅食 (Indian bread; literally: Indian flatbread, an umbrella term that includes naan, roti, parotta and other similar Indian bread)

senses.definition: 一種低級嘅靈異生物，通常有惡意 (evil spirit)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: ogre

senses.definition: 根據前文嘅規律 (in sequence with the above mentioned)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 你而家開始一個月儲三千蚊，如是者，三十年後你就夠畀首期。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ji4 gaa1 hoi1 ci2 jat1 go3 jyut6 cou5 saam1 cin1 man1, jyu4 si6 ze2, saam1 sap6 nin4 hau6 nei5 zau6 gau3 bei2 sau2 kei4.

jyutping: jat1 si3 bin6 zi1 lung4 jyu5 fung6

senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: (中醫)指體內#陰 液不足，#陽 氣變得相對旺盛，引起#虛火 嘅徵狀，稱為「陰虛內熱」或「陰虛火旺」；呢種徵狀要用#滋陰 嘅方法去平衡，唔可以靠#清熱 (deficiency of Yin, means one is leak of fluid in internal organs, so the Qi of Yang (the flow of heat) is relatively too high, that shows a symptom of excessive heat, but it is just a fake heat caused by imbalance of Yin Yang; this symptom has to be remedied by replenish the fluid, but not putting out the heat)

examples.text: 人老咗少不免會陰虛，無以前咁捱得，最好就早睡早起，多飲湯水少捱日夜。

senses.definition: 一種分析一系列連續序列數據既工具，透過將一連續序列數據分成一定長度既區間，並各自取平均值，最後將其平均值串連成線。如有10個數據(n1,n2...n9,n10)，以4個數據作一區間，則取n1,n2,n3,n4之平均值a1，再取n2,n3,n4,n5之平均值a2，順移再取n3,n4,n5,n6之平均值a3......最後取n7,n8,n9,n10之平均值a7，並將所有平均值a1至a7串連成線，就係移動平均線。 (moving average (of number series))

senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 1962年有套西片《Lolita》香港譯做《一樹梨花壓海棠》，內容係講老少不倫戀。而Lolita呢個名因此被用嚟形容具有性魅力嘅早熟少女。
examples.translation: In 1962 there's a foreign movie "Lolita", Hong Kong has translated the name using a sentence in So Tung Bo's peom, which is also telling the story of love affair between a young girl and old man. And the name Lolita is then used to describe early-maturing young girls who have sexual attraction.

examples.text: 我哋唔係成日出街食嘅，一時時嘅啫。

examples.translation: We don't always eat out. Only occasionally.

senses.definition: 每年嘅第一個月，喺西曆入面有三十一日 (January)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 jyut6 jau5 saam1 sap6 jat1 jat6.
examples.translation: There are thirty-one days in January.

senses.definition: 喺某件事發生之前 (in advance; beforehand)

examples.jyutping: jyu6 sin1 tung1 zi1
examples.translation: to notify in advance

senses.definition: #一係⋯#就⋯；一係 (either...or...)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 一係你批鬥你父母，一係就你自己俾人批鬥。
examples.jyutping: jat1 hai6 nei5 pai1 dau3 nei5 fu6 mou5, jat1 hai6 zau6 nei5 zi6 gei2 bei2 jan4 pai1 dau3.
examples.translation: Either you publicly humiliate your parents, or you get the same treatment.

senses.definition: 一件事對唔同人會有唔同嘅效果 (to vary with each individual)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 呢個療程嘅效果因人而異。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 liu4 cing4 ge3 haau6 gwo2 jan1 jan4 ji4 ji6.
examples.translation: The effect of this treatment varies with each individual.

senses.definition: #生果 嘅一種，類似#柑 同#橙，傳統會係中秋節食（量詞：個） (grapefruit)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 中秋節就嚟到喇喎，不如你去街市買個柚返嚟吖。
examples.jyutping: zung1 cau1 zit3 zau6 lai4 dou3 laa3 wo3, bat1 jyu4 nei5 heoi3 gaai1 si5 maai5 go3 jau2 faan1 lai4 aa1.
examples.translation: The Mid-Autumn Festival is coming. Why don't you buy a grapefruit from the market?

senses.definition: 急促而連續。 (hurriedly and continuously; in one breath)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 今日我一條氣走咗兩堂路。

senses.definition: 一段短時間，時間長度可以用#分鐘 計算嘅 (a while; a moment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 waan2 zo2 jat1 zan6.
examples.translation: I've played for a while.

senses.definition: 一句話就將人哋嘅秘密或者心事爆晒出嚟。 (to lay bare the truth with one penetrating remark; to hit the nail on the head; to expose someone's ulterior motive by a single remark)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 《西遊記》寫咗咁多妖魔鬼怪嘅故事，至於作者嘅用意何在，邊個都無法一語道破。
examples.translation: There were so many spectra's stories written in "Journey to the West". However, nobody could hit the nail on the head regarding  the writer's motive to write this book.

senses.definition: #懵盛盛；形容啲唔知發生緊咩事嘅人 (stupid; muddle-headed; unable to think clearly; literally, a cloud)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 喬恩一嚿雲噉乜都唔知。
examples.jyutping: kiu4 jan1 jat1 gau6 wan4 gam2 mat1 dou1 m4 zi1.
examples.translation: Jon knows nothing at all.

senses.definition: 離開原本身處嘅位置，俾其他人企或者通過 (to get out of the way; to make way; to step aside)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: jau5 ce1 lai4 aa3! faai3 di1 joeng6 hoi1!
examples.translation: There's a car coming! Get out of the way quickly!

senses.definition: #掁眼；形容啲嘢發出光芒，令人擘唔大眼 ((of lights or colours) dazzling; glaring)

examples.jyutping: jiu6 ngaan5 ge3 joeng4 gwong1

senses.definition: #投資；將#錢 放落某個#市場 (to invest in the market)

examples.jyutping: jat1 mong6 mou4 zai3 ge3 daai6 hoi2

senses.definition: 含有#藥材，有調理身體用途嘅餸菜  （量詞：餐） (food with herbal ingredients; food cooked with medical herbs)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: Jang-geum is good at using herbal ingredients to cook.

senses.definition: 文雅噉指去廁所大小便 (to use the washroom)

examples.jyutping: jyu4 ci3 hau6 cing2 cung1 ci3.

senses.definition: 存在咗好耐、起源係好耐以前嘅事 (long-standing)

examples.text: 農曆新年派利是係一個由來已久嘅習俗。

examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 ho2 ji5 jau4 gei3 jin6 gam1 bei2 ngo5.

examples.text: 你唔舒服，要去睇醫生先得喇。
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 syu1 fuk6, jiu3 heoi3 tai2 ji1 sang1 sin1 dak1 laa3.

senses.definition: 用嚟帶出某個行動要考慮到嘅#變化 (in response to; according to; depending on)

senses.definition: 黑暗；昏暗；好多時用嚟形容抽象嘅嘢 (dark; gloomy; usually used to describe abstract things)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zing3 zi6 ge3 jam1 am3 min2
examples.translation: the dark side of politics

senses.definition: 由#胰臟 分泌，用嚟控制#血糖 嘅一種#激素 (insulin)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 表示陳舊、不合時宜嘅思想／想法 (dogmatic and behind the times)

examples.text: 女子無才便是德呢啲迂腐嘅思想，應該盡早撲滅。

examples.jyutping: sat6 jim6 sat1 leoi5 min6 baai2 zo2 go3 jan4 tai2 mou4 jing4.

examples.jyutping: keoi5 loeng5 nin4 cin4 hoi1 ci2 ji5 ging1 daam6 ceot1 jing2 hyun1.

一件過，冇分開上下兩截嘅泳衣（量詞：件） (one-piece swimsuit)

examples.jyutping: nei5 zou6 je5 gam3 mou5 lei4 daap3 saap3, tung4 nei5 lou5 dau6 jat1 daam3 daam1 aa3!

指語言運用上嘅錯誤；通常指成份殘缺、配詞唔恰當、文句不通之類問題（量詞：個） (language issues, e.g. issues with grammar, collocation or coherence; literally, language sickness)

senses.definition: 農曆正月十五夜晚嘅傳統節慶，呢晚係過年之後第一個月圓之夜，習俗上會去綵燈晚會賞花燈、解燈謎，喺屋企食湯圓，祝願團圓美滿；又叫做「中國情人節」 (Lantern Festival; the first full moon after the Lunar New Year; on that day, people traditionally eat Tong-jyun (湯圓), and go out at night to see paper lanterns and solve riddles on the lanterns. It is also nicknamed "Chinese Valentine's Day", as it is a special occasion for lovers and couples to spend time together.)
