examples.text: 你老婆真係賢淑啊，娶到佢你三生有幸啦。
examples.translation: Your wife is wise and virtuous. You are so lucky to have married her.

senses.definition: 吞下一啲嘢 (to swallow)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to chew but cannot bear to swallow

senses.definition: 用燕麥軋製成嘅穀物，通常係煲成燕麥粥或者配上牛奶或乳酪 (oatmeal)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 人體入面連接口腔同食道嘅部分 (pharynx)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 不言苟笑，非常認真 (serious; solemn; inexorable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: He is serious and earnest.

senses.definition: 因為外在環境因素而致病 (to contract a disease; to be infected)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我阿媽之前冇戴口罩去醫院探病，因而染病。
examples.translation: My mother caught a flu when she was visiting someone in the sick ward without a mask.

senses.definition: 唔鍾意某事或者人而拒絕接受或者遺棄 (to detest and reject)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 只係過咗幾日，啊女就厭棄咗呢個公仔。
examples.translation: My daughter has detested this doll just after a few days.

senses.definition: 對外貿易輸出少過輸入，而構成嘅虧損 (deflicit)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: trade deflicit

senses.definition: 以相反方向行動 (to go against)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to go against the current

senses.definition: 違抗；唔聽從 (to disobey)

examples.translation: to be rebellious

senses.definition: 唔相信某啲嘢，對某啲嘢抱有問題 (to doubt; to disbelieve; to suspect)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: to suspect

senses.definition: 有唔肯定，唔清楚 (doubtful; uncertain)

examples.translation: mystery

senses.definition: 聽到一啲唔係由聲波產生嘅聲音，同 #幻聽 有分別，耳鳴聽到嘅祇係紊亂嘅雜音，幻聽可以聽到一啲平時熟悉嘅聲音，例如講嘢聲 ((med.) tinnitus)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: I got a tinnitus after riding the plane.

senses.definition: 根據地球公轉嘅偏差，調整曆法而比普通曆法多咗嘅時間，例如多咗嘅秒叫「閏秒」，多咗嘅日叫「閏日」，有「閏日」嗰個月叫閏月，有「閏月」嗰年叫「閏年」 (intercalary)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 每隔四年嘅二月廿九號就係一個閏日。
examples.translation: The 29 February once in four years is an intercalary day.

senses.definition: 這麼 (this)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: this big

senses.definition: 有道理或者證據支持 (supported by reasons or evidences)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: Right to resist

senses.definition: 利用一啲手段或者美色去令人哋做某啲事情 (to lure; to entice)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to lure; to entice

senses.definition: 勸導；指導； 教導 (to guide; to lead)

examples.translation: to teach with skill and patience; to give guidance and induction to students

senses.definition: 有作為；有成就；有前途 (promising; likely to be successful)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個男仔年輕有為，係一個唔錯嘅對象。
examples.translation: He is young and promising. It would be nice if you can date him.

senses.definition: 用説話取笑或者#窒 人哋 (tease; make fun of, esp. verbally)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: tease

senses.definition: 尤其嚴重 (most seriously)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢隻腳成日痛，落雨個陣尤甚。
examples.translation: His leg is always painful, most seriously on rainy days.

senses.definition: 一種樹木，又叫胭脂樹，係珍貴嘅木材，有「萬木之王」之稱 (teak)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個書櫃係用柚木造嘅，好貴㗎。
examples.translation: This bookcase is made of teak. It is expensive.

senses.definition: 用腳踩 (to step on)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: to trample; to annihilate; to devastate

senses.definition: 寄出去；傳遞 (post; mail; postal)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: mail

senses.definition: 冇正式記錄嘅 (not recorded officially)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: an anecdote

senses.definition: 多數形容女性淫亂放蕩 ((usu. For women) loose morals; lascivious; licentious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 以前淫蕩嘅女人要浸豬籠。
examples.translation: In the past, lascivious women were drowned to death.

senses.definition: 普羅大眾，泛指普通嘅人 (ordinary people)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 一般人嘅收入都唔超過兩萬。
examples.translation: Oridinary people's salaries do not exceed 20,000.

senses.definition: 喊得太犀利，講嘢都講唔到 (to choke with sobs)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢交通意外之後仍然好鎮定，不過一見到媽媽就即刻泣不成聲。
examples.translation: He was calm after the accident.  But when he saw mum he was choked with sobs.

senses.definition: 唔明顯、斷斷續續嘅痛苦 (indistinct or faint pain)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 手術三個月之後，傷口仍然隱隱作痛。
examples.translation: There is still indistinct pain after my surgery three months ago.

senses.definition: 唔情願地 (reluctantly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢都唔再愛我啦，我係時候要忍痛離去。
examples.translation: He doesn't love me anymore. It's time for me to leave reluctantly.
